story:
PRESS COVERAGE

Cool Mom Tech: Piquing Our Geek: A smart faucet you can check with your smartphone

Wired: The Future Of Water Is Zuvo

CNET: Stay connected with your Zuvo Stratus kitchen faucet

Engadget: Zuvo Water's Stratus cleans your H2O with WiFi filters, cloud-connected app

Home Crux: Zuvo unveils the world’s first ‘smart’ water filtration and faucet system

PandoDaily: A big data, crowdfunded, connected device: Zuvo’s water filter tackles all three buzz words

EcoChunk: Zuvo Water debuts world’s first cloud-connected water filtration and faucet system

Apartment Geeks: Stratus Water Filtration System by Zuvo Water

voxclever: Putting Water Back In The Cloud

MSNBC: Zuvo Water's Stratus cleans your H2O with WiFi filters, cloud-connected app 

 

ABOUT US & OUR INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN

Three years ago we brought the Zuvo Water Filtration System to market because we knew there had to be a better alternative to expensive and environment-destroying bottled water. We knew that if we could provide a way for people to enjoy drinking their tap water again and trust it, then we could help people stay hydrated without having to rely on bottled water. Today we have three years of manufacturing experience under our belt and a community of customers and evangelists who love our product.

Now with Indiegogo, we want to launch a revolutionary ecosystem we call STRATUS. As a start-up company, creating breakthrough products and launching them in the marketplace used to be incredibly difficult. But now with the Indiegogo crowdfunding community a company like ours has the opportunity to bring disruptive technologies to the market.

By becoming a backer, your help will enable us to put STRATUS into production, develop the largest database of water-quality information in the world and bring customized filter solutions into your home.

STRATUS - A WATER ECOSYSTEM THAT TAKES WATER FILTRATION TO THE NEXT LEVEL

Combining stunning faucet design, the Zuvo Water Filtration System, and a Cloud-connected app, STRATUS is the most intelligent water system that exists today. We're asking you to help us launch it by becoming an early invester and to make it possible for us to ultimately make it available to a much bigger market.

Here is a first look at STRATUS which includes: 1) the Zuvo Water Filtration System (countertop or under-counter setup), 2) a stunning Zuvo Beverage Faucet and 3) the Zuvo cloud-connected smartphone app. Together these three components comprise STRATUS which is at the nexus of the water ecosystem we're working to bring to market.

 

 

 

 

Stylish and Intelligent Faucets

Zuvo has been working for the last year with one of the leading Silicon Valley design firms, D2M, who also created the crowdfunding sensation Instacube. D2M designed and tested STRATUS and created a full range of innovatively designed and styled, intelligent faucets. Faucets will be available in Bamboo and Acacia tri-flow and Hibiscus beverage faucet styles in chrome, brushed nickel and oil-rubbed-bronze finishes.

Hibiscus Beverage Faucet
Chrome
2.75"W x 4.5"D x 11"H		 Bamboo Tri-Flow Faucet
Brushed Nickel
2.5"W x 8.5"D x 15"H		 Acacia Tri-Flow Faucet
Brushed Nickel
5.5"W x 11.5"D x 18"H
Hibiscus Beverage Faucet
Oil-Rubbed Bronze
2.75"W x 4.5"D x 11"H		 Bamboo Tri-Flow Faucet
Oil-Rubbed Bronze
2.5"W x 8.5"D x 15"H		 Acacia Tri-Flow Faucet
Oil-Rubbed Bronze
5.5"W x 11.5"D x 18"H

 

The intelligent, touch-sensing faucets not only turn on the filtered water but also show users the filter status with intuitive LED lights. Filter status is also provided on the Zuvo Water Filtration System availabile in either an under-counter or countertop set up. The end result is the world’s first intelligent, drinking water system right in your home.

Under-Counter Zuvo System

4"W x 5"D x 18"H

Compact Countertop Zuvo System (attaches to existing faucet)

4"W x 5"D x 11"H

Much More than a Carbon Filter

The Zuvo Water Filtration System is already is in production and independently tested to NSF/ANSI Standards 42, 53 and 55 Class B for Drinking Water Treatment Units by an accredited third-party laboratory. What makes it unique is that it goes beyond simple carbon filtration, by combining ultraviolet light (UV), ozone, and a carbon filter in a patented five-step process. Zuvo recreates nature's way of cleansing water. The ozone/UV combination is not only effective at killing bacteria; the two-pass setup also prevents bacterial film from growing on the filter and contaminating the water. It is the only filter system in the world that is self cleaning. Simple pitcher and faucet filters can't do this!

 

Water Information Via the Cloud

The combination of Wi-Fi communication built into the Zuvo system and a Cloud-connected app deliver to your smartphone a host of important information about your water such as the remaining life of the filter, the reduction of contaminants in water based on local water quality, and the daily rate of water consumption in your household.

 

 

Water Quality Database & Hydration Coach App

Leveraging ease of access through your smartphone and the largest database of water quality information in the world, the STRATUS app provides real-time filter status, online filter purchases and important information about your local water. With the personalized, hydration coaching feature, you can precisely manage all of your daily water consumption requirements. By inputting age and weight, it will give you an approximate daily hydration target.

 

 

 

 

 

Customized Filters

Our filter product line today offers solutions for reducing a variety of water contaminants including chlorine, lead, cysts, particulates and volatile organic compounds (VOCs). By leveraging the information available through the national water-quality database, we will greatly expand our filter solutions and offer customized filters to reduce contaminants that are common/prevalent in particular regions of the country.

 

No More Guessing When it's Time to Change Your Filter

Check your filter status via your smartphone app and order replacement filters or sign up for a filter subscription with just a few clicks. The app tells you when your filter is good (blue), close to needing to be changed (yellow), or that it’s time to change your filter (red). Filter status is also displayed on the Zuvo system as well as on the STRATUS faucets.

Eco-Consciousness

Zuvo Water is 100% committed to reducing the global consumption of bottled water and raising consciousness about the value of water. The Stratus reduces the expense and waste of bottled water by not adding to the more than 50 billion plastic water bottles Americans used last year, 40 billion of which ended up in landfills. Additionally, STRATUS is designed according to sustainability principles. Non-painted and BPA-free plastics were chosen for durability, health considerations, and recyclability.

AWESOME PERKS & DISCOUNTS

 

Stainless Steel Zuvo Water Bottle

Be the first to get this custom-designed, stylish, Zuvo branded water bottle. The curved design and sport cap make it ideal to grab and take this water bottle with you wherever you go. The specs: beautiful ocean-blue color, stainless steel and BPA-free.

 

 

 

Test My Water Kit

The Test My Water Kit gives you a comprehensive analysis of exactly what's in your tap water. Conducted in Zuvo's own water quality test lab and supervised by Dr. Ulrich Reimann-Philipp. It's a good starting point for taking action towards enjoying and trusting your tap again.

 

STRATUS Compact Countertop Zuvo System (Connects to Existing Faucets)

Introducing the NEW compact countertop Zuvo system! By popular demand, the lower-profile Zuvo system sits just 11" high, is Wi-Fi enabled and blends in perfectly with your other kitchen appliances. Includes the STRATUS smartphone app. Get in early and get a great price! Dimensions: 4"W x 5"D x 11"H.

 

STRATUS Under-Counter Zuvo System (Connects to Zuvo's Intelligent Faucets)

Get the under-counter, Wi-Fi enabled Zuvo Water Filtration System with the stunning, Hibiscus beverage faucet, Bamboo or Acacia Tri-Flow faucet (hot, cold, filtered) AND the Zuvo water quality database & hydration smartphone app. But wait, there's more! We'll throw in a FREE Test My Water Kit with all orders for a STRATUS under-counter Zuvo system. Get in early and get a great price! Finishes: Chrome, Brushed Nickel and Oil-Rubbed Bronze. Faucet Dimensions: Hibiscus Beverage Faucet 2.75"W x 4.5"D x 11"H, Bamboo Tri-Flow Faucet 2.5"W x 8.5"D x 15"H, Acacia Tri-Flow Faucet 5.5"W x 11.5"D x 18"H. Zuvo Water Filtration System Dimensions: 4"W x 5"D x 18"H.

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS (FAQ)

Does the app work on an IOS or Android platform?

The app works on both platforms.

 

How do I send in my water sample for my home water analysis test?

We will send you a water test kit 30 days after the campaign ends that has a vial to fill with a small amount of your water tap. We will then send you the analysis 30 days after we receive your sample.

 

What is the estimated cost of the filters and where will they be sold?

The replacement filters we currently offer today retail for about $40 a piece. They are available for purchase through a number of retailers http://www.zuvowater.com/where_to_buy.html and through our the Zuvo Water online store http://www.zuvowater.com/store.

 

On average, how long do the filters last?

Currently we offer 250 gallon (Standard Capacity Filter and VOC Filter) and 400 gallon (High Capacity Filter) filters that last for 3 and 5 months, respectively. The Zuvo systems that are part of the Indiegogo Perks come with a Standard Capacity Filter (250 gallons).

 

Will the water connection tube come with a standard screw thread that will work in Europe?

Our systems come with multiple plumbing adaptors to connect the water tube to standard US plumbing. For a European system, you will need an adaptor that converts a US adaptor to a metric system adapter.

 

Will the Stratus system be 220v complaint?

Yes.

 

Which water contaminants does the Zuvo system reduce?

Our current system has carbon filter solutions that reduce VOCs, chlorine, lead, cysts and tiny particles in the water. Additionally, the photo oxidation and UV process of the system removes microbiological contaminants such as viruses and bacteria. We will also customizing your water system to your needs. We will provide solutions to eliminate fluoride, ammonia and other contaminants suited to your preferences.

 

Will the app recognize multiple filters?

The app will recognize more than one filter if a house has multiple Stratus’ installed and be able to push status information of all the filters to you.

 

Is it possible to hook up the under-counter system to both a Stratus faucet and a second line to feed a refrigerator ice maker?

Yes. A Stratus system will include a “smart box” that allows you to connect directly to an ice maker and to the Stratus faucet.

 

Does the Super Early Birds Countertop Perk include the water test kit?

Yes.

 

WE NEED YOUR HELP

STRATUS is more than just a stunning faucet and high-tech filter, it’s an ecosystem designed to revolutionize tap water.

We've built our prototypes. We’ve figured out our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to put STRATUS into production, develop the largest database of water-quality information in the world and bring customized filter solutions to market. We know what we’re doing. We've been developing and manufacturing the Zuvo Water Filtration System for several years, so we know exactly what's required to pull this off. You are getting in early, and getting a premium product ahead of everyone else.

Please contribute and help spread the word about STRATUS.

Team Zuvo: Ulrich, Ryan, Tristen, Elizabeth. Julie, Tetua, Andy, Shirley, Esterina, Jim, Betty, Ray, Nefeesa, John, Alex & Don

Thank you for helping us to revolutionize the enjoyment of and trust in your tap water!

 

MORE PRESS AND BLOG COVERAGE

mediabistro: Recycable Zuvo Filters Water According to Your Municipality’s Contaminants

Puroserve: New Water Filtration System Promises to Keep You Connected to Your Faucet

Born2Impress: Stratus by Zuvo Water-The World's First Intelligent Faucet & Cloud-Connected Water Filtration System

Week99er: Zuvo Launches the World's First Intelligent Faucet & Water Filtration Sytem!

Crowdfunding World: Faveoly Crowdfunding Project of the Day: Stratus (by @ZuvoWater)

Postscapes: Intelligent Faucet: Stratus, Putting water back in the cloud

Matters of Grey: Zuvo Is Making Water Smarter 

FoodBev.com: Stratus cloud-connected water filtration ecosystem from Zuvo Water 

WallStreetInsanity: STRATUS By Zuvo Water Crowdfunding On Indiegogo

PM Engineer: Faucet water filtration system with Wi-Fi

Logrithmic: Stratus by Zuvo Water [Tech] via @ZuvoWater

Yes.
 
Which water contaminants does the Zuvo system reduce?
Our current system has carbon filter solutions that reduce VOCs, chlorine, lead, cysts and tiny particles in the water. Additionally, the photo oxidation and UV process of the system removes microbiological contaminants such as viruses and bacteria. We will also customizing your water system to your needs. We will provide solutions to eliminate fluoride, ammonia and other contaminants suited to your preferences.
 
Will the app recognize multiple filters?
The app will recognize more than one filter if a house has multiple Stratus’ installed and be able to push status information of all the filters to you.
 
Is it possible to hook up the under-counter system to both a Stratus faucet and a second line to feed a refrigerator ice maker?
Yes. A Stratus system will include a “smart box” that allows you to connect directly to an ice maker and to the Stratus faucet.
 
Does the Super Early Birds Countertop Perk include the water test kit?
Yes.
 
WE NEED YOUR HELP
STRATUS is more than just a stunning faucet and high-tech filter, it’s an ecosystem designed to revolutionize tap water.
We've built our prototypes. We’ve figured out our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to put STRATUS into production, develop the largest database of water-quality information in the world and bring customized filter solutions to market. We know what we’re doing. We've been developing and manufacturing the Zuvo Water Filtration System for several years, so we know exactly what's required to pull this off. You are getting in early, and getting a premium product ahead of everyone else.
Please contribute and help spread the word about STRATUS.

Team Zuvo: Ulrich, Ryan, Tristen, Elizabeth. Julie, Tetua, Andy, Shirley, Esterina, Jim, Betty, Ray, Nefeesa, John, Alex & Don
Thank you for helping us to revolutionize the enjoyment of and trust in your tap water!
 
MORE PRESS AND BLOG COVERAGE

story:
LOOK BEYOND.  SEE DIFFERENT...


Short Summary

We are working from many years with renewable energy. Pay attention to the environmente trying to use better everything around us but always respecting the nature. Now we want to realize this special tables, even very particular for the design, but mostly more useful than a common one.  Making them with a photovoltaic solar panel those could become an renewable energy source for many electric devices of our homes, gardens, offices, bars and many other places which people are using always more and everywhere. 


What We Need & What You Get

    We have produced just some samples to get the patent for them and we need now funding to innovate and develop better this idea. It would be great if we can make more samples, using not only wood to make them but even other recyclable materials, for different locations and improve their utility. The purpose is to get more clean energy sources and less pollution!

    The Impact

      Example:

      Cell Phone or tablet: 8 Watt absorption for each charge

      8 Watt x 365 days = 2.920 Watt (annual consumption of recharge)

      0,5310 Kg of CO2 spared for each Kwh produced from renewable source

      2.920 Watt : 0,53 Kg = spare of 1,54 Kg of CO2 in one year


      Cell Phones in Italy = 73.200.000 (Eurostat 2007)

      73.200.000 x 1,54 Kg/CO2 = 112.728,00 Tons of CO2

      Emission from 1 car in one year = 2.940 Kg of CO2 (“Transport & Environment 2009” media of the models sold in Europe)

      T. 112.728,00 : T. 2,94 = pollution of 38.342 cars in one year

      ------------------------------------------


      Perks:

      Thank you so much for helping my project.


      €500 - Eco-friendly plastic:

      "Eco-friendly plastic that dissolves in water"
      Video preview of the next developing project.
      Plastic made ​​from starch and 100% natural,
      ultra-resistant and fade rapidly in contact with liquids.

      €1,000 - Laila Red:



      €5,000 - Relax Series

story:
Hello,

 

Hello, my name is Greta Jourdane, I am 61 years old and a carer for my 89 year old mother who lives with me. I am a writer, author and artist. Together over the past 4 years, we have managed to pull together just on $30,000 towards a deposit for a house and we are needing another $12,000 for a descent deposit. I have approached the banks about a  home loan but can only obtain a 10-year loan due to my age ( 61 ) which would make the repayments very high without a hefty deposit. $12,000 is not a lot of money these days but it is difficult to obtain by saving a bit here and there out of what is left over after paying bills and we need some help please. We have come this far over a 4 year period. For us a home of our own would mean an end to having to rent places and having to move on all the time due to the owner's wanting to sell their investment properties. We can't keep doing this as we get older. There will come a day when we just won't be able to shift on at all.  Helping us over that line into home ownership would mean peace of mind for us in so many ways. Renting has affected both our health especially my mother. she and I both suffer an autoimmune disease which affects the connective tissue in the body and also the immune system. 

  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Our campaign might be over, but you can still purchase a Nuzzie Knit on our website.

Hi there, we're Nuzzie!

We're obsessed with designing the perfect weighted blanket.

We've been in business for over three years and have sold thousands of weighted blankets.

Although our blankets get rave reviews from our customers, we weren't satisfied. We wanted to do better.

We totally reimagined how a weighted blanket looks, feels and is made. 

To preorder Nuzzie Knit at a steep discount to our future retail price, click Back This Project, or read on.  

 

What's Wrong with Traditional Weighted Blankets?

Not familiar with weighted blankets? We explain their benefits and the science behind them later on, but want to start with what we did to make Nuzzie Knit better than other weighted blankets.

 

Traditional weighted blankets are:

  • Filled with glass beads which can shift around and even leak (no one likes cleaning thousands of glass beads out of their bed)
  • Not very breathable, trapping in excess body heat (sweaty nights, gross)
  • Not machine washable or machine dryable (what century is this?)
  • Not very stylish 

We set out to fix all these problems, and more...

No More Pesky Glass Beads

Nuzzie Knit ditches the glass beads for our patent pending high density fabric filling, DuraFill™. By using fabric to add weight to the blanket instead of beads, Nuzzie Knit is more comfortable and durable.

 

Say Goodbye to Sleepless, Sweaty Nights

Our open knit design allows air to circulate, for better temperature regulation—you'll stay cooler in the summer and warmer in the winter

Easy Cleaning

Traditional weighted blankets need to be hand washed to prevent them from fraying, ripping and leaking. Nuzzie Knit's beadless design and durable fabrics allows you to just throw it in the washer or dryer—worry free.

Benefits of Weighted Blankets

Say goodbye to tossing, turning and counting sheep. Nuzzie Knit will help you fall asleep faster, stay asleep longer and wake up feeling refreshed.

Like other weighted blankets, Nuzzie Knit applies gentle weight to pressure points around your body making you feel instantly calm, grounded and stress-free...just like a swaddled baby. (It’s the same science!)

Can a Weighted Blanket Help You? 

On a scale of 1 to 10, how well did you sleep last night?

We hope it’s a 10...but if you’re anything like the average adult, you’re not getting enough sleep. Restful and restorative sleep is crucial for your body to operate at peak performance throughout the day. In fact, the CDC declared sleep disorders a “public health epidemic”

That’s right, a public health epidemic. Getting enough sleep is a big deal.

→ The good news: Weighted blankets have been scientifically shown to improve your sleep quality. The gentle weight targets pressure points around your body, in a process called DPS or "Deep Pressure Stimulation". DPS activates the central nervous system, modulating its hormone production in beneficial ways. Specifically, it boosts serotonin (happy hormone) and melatonin (sleepiness), while reducing cortisol (stress).

Happy + Sleepy - Stress, completely natural and drug free! Now that's amazing.

 

→ The great news: The Nuzzie Knit can be of value to anyone in the following groups:

  • Anyone looking to improve their sleep quality 
  • People who have trouble falling asleep 
  • Remote workers who want to focus and destress during their work day
  • Adults and children with ADHD, anxiety, autism, restless leg syndrome, insomnia, and PTSD 

Product Details

 

Specs

Please see the FAQ for a discussion on choosing the best weight.  We have 3 size choices: Child, Queen, and King. The child size comes in 8lbs, the Queen in 15lbs and 20lbs, and the King in 25lbs. The fabric material is made of our proprietary patent pending DuraFill™ which is a high density fiber that is long-lasting and ultra durable. 

Care Instructions

Machine wash warm, tumble dry low.

Colors

We know, we know... we all love colors! The more the merrier and that's why we have 3 to choose from! You will be able to choose your color after the campaign is complete. We will be sending out a survey to all our backers which will allow you to choose your color.

We're No Newbies

With over three years of experience designing and making weighted blankets, we're confident that we can deliver. With hundreds of five-star reviews on our traditional weighted blankets, you can trust that we have the manufacturing capability and the customer service experience to make sure that you love your Nuzzie Knit purchase. 

 

What Our Beta Testers Have to Say

We gave Nuzzie Knit prototypes to some of our past customers to stress test the product and find opportunities to improve and collect feedback. Here's what they have to say:

Join the movement

Help us bring this magical product to life! We’re offering steep discounts for our early backers. Seriously, you won’t see these prices from us again. 

Nuzzie Knit comes in 4 sizes:

8 lbs Child (60" x 41")
15 lbs Queen (80" x 60")
20 lbs Queen (80" x 60")
25 lbs King (87" x 80")

To preorder Nuzzie Knit at a steep discount to our future retail price, click Back This Project.

 

A Message From the Founders

Nuzzie was born out of our own frustration with sleep. Like many of you, we suffered from insomnia and felt the negative effects during our waking hours. We tried every natural remedy out there, but nothing worked...until we tried sleeping with a weighted blanket.

After personally experiencing their therapeutic benefits, we were hooked and even launched our own blanket in 2017. Since then, we’ve become obsessed with customer feedback, researching materials and improving our product. It’s about time weighted blankets got a major design upgrade.

That’s where Nuzzie Knit comes in. We know it’s going to be a hit. We just need your help to help us get there. Thank you in advance for your backing, you won't regret it!

Thank you in advance for your backing, you won't regret it! Get Your Project Funded Today!   Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!

story:
Short Summary

     Greetings! My name is Kara Macro and I am an Assistant Innkeeper and have been for the past seven years on beautiful Cape Cod in Massachusetts. I currently work at the Beechwood Inn located in Historic Barnstable Village, MA. The Beechwood Inn is for sale and my husband, Frank and I would like to purchase this property. We have been planning and saving for many years to buy a business on Cape Cod. We have both lived here for 20+ years.  The prices are right for buying and we are ready BUT it appears the financial world is a bit broken right now.  We have the down payment covered and plenty of money to start off with but the lending world does not agree and would like us to secure MORE money in order to back us on purchasing this business. As honest and hard working Cape Cod residents, we could not just ask people for money because we want a business. We would like to offer you a great deal on a room in exchange for your financial support and patience while we purchase the Beechwood Inn. We would like you to consider relaxing on Cape Cod!

What We Need & What You Get

     What we need is to satisfy the requirement of the lender of having 25% of the purchase price in the bank at the time of purchase, in CASH. We have some of the money but need to raise $100,000- $120,000 more. The monies raised from this campaign will go solely towards the operation of the Inn itself after the purchase is complete.

     We could think of no better way to get the money we need other than to offer people an exceptional deal on a room at the Beechwood Inn on Cape Cod!! All of the perks to the right are about a 40% discount off the current prices at this Inn and others on Cape Cod! We hope this discount will allow many people who have been unable to afford a trip to the Cape in the past couple of years a chance to visit also. Everyone will get a box of Famous Cape Cod Saltwater Taffy and a Postcard of thanks from us! PLUS- whichever perk you are entitled too under the amount of support you are willing to lend.


Here is what you can expect to happen...

-Pledge your money and pick your perk

-At the end of this campaign (December) when our goal has been met, we will start the process of purchasing the Beechwood Inn. We expect this to take 30-90 days before we are official owners.

-Once we are officially owners(by March of 2013)- we will contact you and offer to redeem your stay! If you are not ready to visit Cape Cod - we will mail you a Gift Certificate detailing your perk/stay. You may keep this until you are ready to use OR you may gift it to someone else to use!

-THE ONLY RESTRICTION- We will have no restrictions or certain times or days you must stay- as Inn and Motels on Cape Cod often do- you may redeem your perk in the Summer or weekend or whenever you would like. The only restriction we must enforce is that we do not allow children under 12 years of age at the Inn. We are willing, however to deal with this on a case by case basis. If you have children and are interested in supporting us- please do not hesitate to ask!

 Beechwood Inn Website- PLEASE DO NOT CONTACT- For viewing only!!

http://beechwoodinn.com/

 

*** IMPORTANT: We want you to know that there is every possibility that someone could purchase the Beechwood Inn before we are able too. We do have a back up plan!! There are currently 5 other Inn's (same price) with similar amenities for sale on Cape Cod and all within a short distance from this Inn. This campaign is about YOU getting to relax on Cape Cod and US buying an Inn. We want you to feel secure about supporting us. We didn't just drive by an Inn and decide it might be fun- this has been my very satisfying career for the past seven years and my husband is a Restaurant General Manager- we enjoy serving people and helping them to enjoy Cape Cod. No matter what happens- we aim to own an Inn and give you a great place to relax on Cape Cod! Should we be unable to purchase an Inn by March 2013- we would happily REFUND all monies back to you! ****

The Impact

    How does your support of us buying an Inn help? Cape Cod is a seashore community made up of about one dozen towns. The cost of living is very high here and the pay rates are lower than the rest of our state. Year round residents are being eaten alive by this bad economy. Many residents have moved off of Cape Cod and out of State- others have moved in with each other in one home. For each year round resident lost to this bad economy- there is not a new resident to replace them. Instead, we have a bunch of people buying properties (especially historic) for private use for vacation purposes and only using them for two weeks out of the year. These grand historic properties are no longer available to the public or local residents, as they should be. Consider your support of us buying an Inn as a step in saving the year round population of Cape Cod and allowing one of our grand historic properties to stay in the right hands and be open to the public for all to enjoy! Cape Cod's history is where America's history began!!

Other Ways You Can Help

     No money? No problem! What we could use most of all is help in getting these great deals for a stay on Cape Cod to the people who will use them!

PLEASE pass this campaign to anyone you know who loves Cape Cod or travels! The great deals speak for themselves!

This campaign is about YOU getting to relax on Cape Cod and US buying an Inn. We want you to feel secure about supporting us. We didn't just drive by an Inn and decide it might be fun- this has been my very satisfying career for the past seven years and my husband is a Restaurant General Manager- we enjoy serving people and helping them to enjoy Cape Cod. No matter what happens- we aim to own an Inn and give you a great place to relax on Cape Cod! Should we be unable to purchase an Inn by March 2013- we would happily REFUND all monies back to you! ****


The Impact
    How does your support of us buying an Inn help? Cape Cod is a seashore community made up of about one dozen towns. The cost of living is very high here and the pay rates are lower than the rest of our state. Year round residents are being eaten alive by this bad economy. Many residents have moved off of Cape Cod and out of State- others have moved in with each other in one home. For each year round resident lost to this bad economy- there is not a new resident to replace them. Instead, we have a bunch of people buying properties (especially historic) for private use for vacation purposes and only using them for two weeks out of the year. These grand historic properties are no longer available to the public or local residents, as they should be. Consider your support of us buying an Inn as a step in saving the year round population of Cape Cod and allowing one of our grand historic properties to stay in the right hands and be open to the public for all to enjoy! Cape Cod's history is where America's history began!!


Other Ways You Can Help
     No money? No problem! What we could use most of all is help in getting these great deals for a stay on Cape Cod to the people who will use them!
PLEASE pass this campaign to anyone you know who loves Cape Cod or travels! The great deals speak for themselves!

story:
Meet Mixtile Hub

Mixtile Hub is an Internet independent smart home controller that can manage various smart devices from different brands to achieve home automation by setting up schedules and routines.

The Easiest Way to Build a Smart Home

Within 5 minutes, Mixtile Hub is set up and ready to put your home to work regardless if you're a new or experienced user of smart home controllers.  

 

High Compatibility

Mixtile Hub supports ZigBee, Z-Wave, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi devices and other connected devices for which there are corresponding and adaptive plugins installed. Additionally, Mixtile Hub
is upgradable and its compatibility grows in time.

 

Data Security

Open framework more possibilities

Open software framework offers users to add any plugins and functions to the hub: let the door close itself, have the drones monitor your home.. more fun to be discovered.

 

 

Getting started with Mixtile Hub in

In only 5 minutes, you can start your smart home living with Mixtile Hub simply by properly placing your pre-paired Mixtile starter kit. No frustrating setup needed.                                         

Mixtile Starter Kit is specifically designed for Mixtile Hub that includes a water leak sensor, a climate sensor, a motion sensor, a contact sensor and a smart outlet, covering the basic need for lighting, climate and security.

Mixtile Hub connects wirelessly with a wide range of smart devices and makes them work together. Add and put your devices to work: Air Conditioning, TV, Lamp, Socket,  Humidifier, Curtain, Coffee Maker, Thermostat, Security Camera…

Setting up custom routines and control your smart home with the built-in voice assistant and the all-in-one Mixtile App. 

 

Built-in Voice Assistant

Mixtile Hub has a built-in voice assistant that frees your hands from manual controls.  Just say “brighten the light” or “dim the light" and let Mixtile Hub makes you feel how good the everyday actually is.

 

 

All-In-One Mixtile App

No more remote controls. No more miscellaneous apps. Mixtile Hub is the smart home
controller that manages all your smart devices within one app.

 

Achieve Home Automation by Setting up Schedules and Routines

Set up custom routines for your home. Mixtile Hub can turn off all the lights and turn down the thermostat when you’re ready to go to sleep.

 

Always back to a welcoming home. When you arrive home, your lights will turn on automatically and get a comfortable temperature.

 

Lighting is about setting a mood. It then blends into the way you live your life at home. Creating your own atmosphere with Mixtile Hub.

 

Connect to the Mixtile App and unlock your door from anywhere with a tap on your smartphone.

 

Demo Videos

 

Mixtile Hub works with Samsung Smarthings detectors and Sylvania bulb

Mixtile Hub works swith Yale smart lock

Mixtile Hub works with Phillips Hue Go-from pairing to controlling

 

Starter Kit demo video
 

Set automation routines

 


Connect Xiaomi devices to Mixtile Hub

 


Control  connected Xiaomi devices by voice


Ready to Ship!

 
 

  Specifications

 

Featured on

   

 

The Mixtile Team

Mixtile is a smart home brand of Focalcrest founded in 2013. Our team members have 10-20 years experience in TMT industry. Before creating Mixtile Hub, we have made IoT solutions for big companies and have created some powerful system-on-modules for developers and geeks. We came across the idea of Mixtile Hub in late 2015, and made its debut in CES 2017.  We are improving and perfecting Mixtile Hub all these days with some changes to our original ideas to ensure the smooth overall development of this product. We are very excited to use Indiegogo as the launch pad for Mixtile Hub.

Core Team Members

 

Participated in four major electronic shows

 

Rewards

 

Timeline

 

 

 

 

 

 

Download Media Kit

 

FAQ

In which countries could I use Mixtile Hub?

Mixtile Hub can work worldwide. Corresponding plug (US/EU/UK/AU) will be provided according to your country/area. Check out the Z-Wave frequency list here.

 

Will Mixtile Hub work with my existing smart home devices?

Mixtile Hub supports ZigBee, Z-Wave, Bluetooth and Wi-Fi smart devices. You can check if your device is on the Compatibility List (growing...).  

 

Could I use Mixtile Hub if my device is not in the Compatibility List?

Mixtile Hub can support your smart device if the device meets the standard ZigBee or Z-Wave protocol, but it may not work perfectly if not listed. We are enriching our compatibility list all these days and will update the compatibility list in time, stay tuned. You are welcomed to submit your device info to us.

 

How do I access Mixtile Hub?

You can access Mixtile Hub via the Mixtile App, which will be available in Apple App Store and Google Play.

 

What's in the Starter Kit?

The starter kit includes a water leak sensor, a climate sensor, a motion sensor, a contact sensor and a smart outlet. Find more details here.

 

Is it secure to use Mixtile Hub?

Yes, it is securer than ever to use Mixtile Hub. Mixtile Hub has a powerful processor that it can process and store data locally, not cloud-based and no risk of data leak to the uncontrollable public domain. What's more, Mixtile Hub has the end to end encryption to protect data transmission in addition to standard SSL, your privacy is guaranteed.

 

Is Mixtile Hub compatible with Apple Homekit?

It doesn’t support Homekit yet. We would like to support HomeKit when that becomes possible for multi-brand platforms.

 

What is the difference between Mixtile voice assistant and cloud-based voice control technology?

Mixtile voice assistant is built in the hub, not cloud-based. It processes voice commands locally and always provides a rapid response, no matter with the internet. It is not so multi-functional. but it protects your data and privacy.

 

Is there any software update in the future?

Yes, the Mixtile software is upgradable that we will improve the user experience and enrich the compatibility list all the time.

 

Are there any additional costs?

No, there is no additional cost.

 

Do you offer a warranty?

Yes, we offer one year limited warranty on all Mixtile products.

story:
Seriously soft

Our Fair Trade, Long Staple, Organic cotton is some of the softest cotton in the world.

Unbleached & Undyed

Our sheets come completely undyed to highlight the airy, all-natural color of cotton. Perfect for sensitive skin. 

The Perfect Weave

We chose a lightweight percale weave because it’s proven to last longer and breathe better than other popular weaves.

Organic Is Better

No chemicals or pesticides are used in growing organic cotton. Our cotton farmers are certified by Fair Trade USA, and Global Organic Textile Standard. 

Just Water.

Most fabrics use harmful chemicals and dyes in manufacturing. Blaynk is the first fabric of it's kind,  to be produced using only water from start to finish.  

Zero Waste

Our sheets come hand-wrapped in reusable bags that we make from excess fabric. All the other materials we use for shipping, from boxes to paper goods, are recycled (and recyclable) too.

Wind Power

Our  factory is 100% powered by wind energy. That means no carbon emissions. 

Our Story

 We grew up in and around the fabric industry (our grandparents ran a foam and fabric business that they founded in 1897). After years spent examining the industry and seeing its chemical underbelly, we knew there had to be a higher standard for the fabric we spend our lives in.

So: We got to work on a way better way to make bed sheets. The final product is a win-win-win-win: for you, your bed, the planet, and anyone you share your bed (or the planet) with.

story:
Each Titanium teacup comes with a solid Titanium coaster for FREE.

Experience the best afternoon tea time with the purest Titanium double walled teacup.

Why Titanium?

  • Retains the original taste of any drink or food. It is used extensively in high end kitchenware
  • The most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body
  • The only element that your body fully accepts - even bone will grow around it
  • Excellent resistance to corrosion, nearly equivalent to platinum
  • Named after Titans of Greek mythology because of its immense strength
  • Less than half the density of steel, perfectly weighted for a quality feel
  • Durable, a true heirloom piece to last generations

Made of 100% Grade 1 (CP1) Titanium! CP1 is the purest form of Titanium that is the most resistant to corrosion.

Pure Titanium maintains your favorite tea's truest taste! Unlike most metals, titanium does not taint or alter the taste of the liquid, not even a little bit.

Smooth and shiny finish both inside and outside. 

A double wall insulated design gives you a more comfortable, burn-free grip, and maintains the flavor of your tea longer.

Pair your favorite tea with baked treats like cookies, scones or macarons.

A warm cup of tea will always be there to calm down your afternoon. 

Benefits of Drinking Tea  

  • Tea contains antioxidants which help slow down aging and help your cells to regenerate and repair.
  • Tea has less than 50% caffeine than coffee. You can consume it without those pesky effects on your nervous system.
  • Tea reduces the risk of heart attack and stroke. Some studies have even found that black tea drinkers were at a 70% lower risk of having a fatal heart attack.
  • Tea keeps your smile bright. It changes the pH in your mouth when you drink it and it prevents cavities.
  • Tea eases irritability, headaches, nervous tension and insomnia.

In my hometown, during the early hours of dawn, while the first rays of sun begin to shine from the distant horizon and another day begins, the tea farmers have already long ago begun their work plucking Pu-erh tea from the tea fields.  The sunrise brightens the fields of tea trees with the sun's first rays.

Enjoy your healthy tea with the most durable, eco-friendly and hygienic double wall Titanium teacup.  As for types of tea, the five main groups are white, green, oolong, black, and pu’erh. My favorite tea is oolong tea. What about you?

About Afternoon Tea

The custom of drinking tea dates to the third millennium BC in China and and was popularized in England during the 1660s.

“There are few hours in life more agreeable than the hour dedicated to the ceremony known as afternoon tea.” -- Henry James

Anna Russell, Duchess of Bedford in the 1830s, is credited as the  first to make afternoon tea into a formal social occasion.

Experience the truest and purest taste of your afternoon tea with your friends and family!​ 

PRODUCT DETAILS

Material:   Grade 1 (CP1) Titanium
Size:   Φ53mm X h40mm (Φ2.1 inches X h1.6inches)
Capacity:   40ml (1.35oz)
Net Weight:   26g (0.9oz)

- Mirror Crystal Finish

Pledge now and help us bring the Woerden Titanium Double Wall insulated​ Teacup to life!

story:
LookOut is a security surveillance camera built into a regular phone charger making it virtually undetectable. It is the first affordable security camera that is easy to use and packed with all the necessary features. Allowing you to monitor your home, children, pets, elderly, business, and more in a matter of seconds.
We are launching in retail in October 2017, but have brought this exclusive offer to Indiegogo first to bring this great product to everyone around the world!
**Patent Pending**

Virtually Undetectable

LookOut Charger doesn’t have an SD Card slot, pinholes or obvious signs that this is a security camera. And it actually charges your phone making it the perfect stealth security camera. Unlike other surveillance cameras on the market, LookOut Charger is virtually undetectable to anyone from intruders to your family dog.

Easy Setup

Simply plug into any AC Outlet and it starts recording right away. Oh, and did we forget to mention it actually charges your phone too?

Easy Access

No need to download apps, setup cloud storage, buy SD Cards or deal with unnecessary monthly fees. Built with internal memory of up to 32GB, all you need to do is plug the LookOut Charger into any Mac, PC or Linux and get access to your footage.

 


High Quality Footage: 1080P HD
Built-In Microphone: Excellent audio quality captures everything
Easy access: Plug into any PC/Mac/Linux and access your recordings in .AVI format
Local storage: Up to 32GB of storage available
Undetectable: No SD Card slot, pinholes, giant lens or obvious signs that this is a security camera. 
USB Power Adapter: 100% compatible phone charger for any iOS or Android device (does not come with iOS/Android USB 2.0 cable)
Compatible Plugs: Available in the following Plug Types: A/B and C/E/F 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


With LookOut Charger, we wanted something that was actually a part of everyone’s daily life and had a natural fit from our homes to our office. It's functional and maintains a simplicity of design that ensures reliable continuous use.

Built-in Memory: Up to 32GB storage

Video Quality: 1080P HD Loop Recording

USB A/C Phone Adapter: Functions as a real A/C Phone Charger compatible with all iOS, Android devices (does not come with iOS/Android USB 2.0 cable)

Plug Types: A/B (USA, MEX, CAN, JPN) and C/E/F (EU, Asia, South America)

Resolution: 1920*1080P HD

Video format: AVI

Image proportion: 4:3

Output: 110v~240v

Input: 5V-1A

Interface: 5-pin USB

Dimensions: 4.5 x 2.5 x 2.5cm (1.77 x 0.98 x 1.77 inches)

System Requirements: Windows ME/2000/XP/Vista/Mac OS/Linux/Windows 7/8/8.1/10
 

 

 

How many hours can be recorded?


16GB can record up to 3-4 hours.

32 GB can record up to 6-7 hours.

Does the LookOut Charger stop recording? 

No, we designed the LookOut Charger so it has video looping. When the memory is full, the LookOut Charger is programmed to overwrite the oldest video files. 

​What plug compatibility do you have?

We have compatibility with Plug Type A/B and C/E/F, which looks like this:
How are the videos saved?

The video files will be in AVI format. Each video file will be 3 minutes in length, which allows you to easily review content.

Will it charge my phone?

Yes, it has a 5V 1000MAH power output. Doesn't come with the iOS/Android USB 2.0 cable.

What power outlet do I need?

110v-240v.

How do I know it is working?

The camera automatically starts working when it is plugged into power socket. You will see an indicator light appear and flash 3 times and turn off. That means it is ready to go!

Does it come with a iOS/Android USB 2.0 cable?

No, however, it is compatible with any phone charger that has a USB output.

What computer do I need to access the footage?

Any windows or mac or linux will do.

What does a LookOut come with?

1 x  LookOut Charger 
1 x USB-to-USB Cable 
1 x User Manual

Do I have to pay GST/VAT charges when shipping?

Yes, customers are all responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are designated once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient. Unfortunately we can't do anything to change this because each country has a strict set of rules around this.

 


Even if you can't contribute, we ask for your help in raising awareness. We're grateful to you for sharing this on social media with the Indiegogo sharing tools below or emailing the page to someone you feel could enjoy the stealthy LookOut Charger.

Website:  lookoutcharger.com
Facebook: LookOut Charger
YouTube: https://youtu.be/4nil9mbVNtA

What computer do I need to access the footage?
Any windows or mac or linux will do.
What does a LookOut come with?
1 x  LookOut Charger 1 x USB-to-USB Cable 1 x User Manual
Do I have to pay GST/VAT charges when shipping?
Yes, customers are all responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are designated once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient. Unfortunately we can't do anything to change this because each country has a strict set of rules around this.

 
Even if you can't contribute, we ask for your help in raising awareness. We're grateful to you for sharing this on social media with the Indiegogo sharing tools below or emailing the page to someone you feel could enjoy the stealthy LookOut Charger.Website:  lookoutcharger.comFacebook: LookOut ChargerYouTube: https://youtu.be/4nil9mbVNtA

story:
WHAT IS CAMBUDDY PRO?

CamBuddy Pro is the most powerful and the only "do-it-all" solution to remotely control your cameras from your smartphone. With CamBuddy Pro and the free Joopic app, you will be able to:

  • Get WiFi-based remote control from up to 100 feet away.
  • Browse and transfer pictures/videos instantly from your modern digital cameras to your smartphone, no need to copy them to your desktop computer first.
  • Create time-lapse photography with the built-in intervalometer.
  • Have a matchbox-sized product packed with light sensor, sound sensor, laser detector, and radio transceiver that make your innovative high-speed photography easier than ever.
  • Control up to 128 cameras to capture stunning "Matrix bullet time" footage.
  • Fully control popular DSLR/mirroless cameras from smartphone: live view, parameters adjustment, taking photos and videos.

The following chart shows the main technical features of CamBuddy Pro:

As seen in the media:

Please help us to promote this product! 

 

 

 

FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS

Long-range full control with live view 

The long operating range (up to 100 feet) of CamBuddy Pro allows you to capture the wildest creatures' close-up from a safe distance. You have a real-time view of the image and can adjust the exposure time, aperture, ISO, exposure compensation, shooting delay, and other parameters any time on your smartphone. The app also allows you to auto-focus by tapping anywhere of the image or fine tune with manual-focus.

 

Time-lapse photography    

Through CamBuddy Pro’s intervalometer function you can create time-lapse photography on you smartphone easily. You can set the number of shots, interval, and delay time; Moreover, you can quickly play back the pictures by using our app and create a time-lapse video.

High-speed photography

CamBuddy Pro is equipped with four sensors - sound, lightning, laser, and radio, as well as a built-in radio transmitter. Combined, it unlocks many creative photography modes including sound/light/laser/radio activated shutter or flash, or use sound/light/laser/Joopic app to activate the built-in radio transmitter to set other cameras to go off. You can capture high-speed motion scenes and fleeting moments, creating amazing pictures with ease. 

Sound-triggered shooting

Set the trigger to go off at a desired sound level. Capture the clinking of glasses or activate the camera by hand clapping.

Lightning-triggered shooting

Set the trigger to go off when lightning strikes. You can also synchronize multiple CamBuddy Pros with a flash to shoot an object from different angles simultaneously. 

Laser-triggered shooting

Set your camera to go off when something breaking a laser beam aimed at CamBuddy Pro. Capture the transient object or wildlife in action. A CamBuddy-specific laser generator is included in the laser bundle. 

Radio-triggered shooting

Set your camera to go off by radio-waves. Radio trigger is immune to harsh environmental conditions and can be used to set off multiple CamBuddy Pros synchronously. CamBuddy Pro has a built-in radio transmitter that can be activated from the app, or by light, sound, and laser. You can also get a handheld CamBuddy-specific radio transmitter by supporting the "radio bundle". 

Ultimate selfie from 100 feet away 

 

No need to challenge your arm's strength. Take a selfie from 100 feet away with an easy smile and a simple click. @Ben Stiller could retire his world record long selfie stick of just 28 ft.

 

Shoot-and-push

Photos taken are automatically pushed to your smartphone through the Shoot-and-Push function. You can also edit, manage, and share the pictures on social media.

 

One smartphone, 128 cameras 

Connecting and controlling multiple cameras to shoot one object from different angles is a key and original innovation of CamBuddy Pro. 

Simply, you can setup the cameras connected in synchronized mode, and every camera works under the same trigger function (e.g., sound trigger, lightning trigger or radio trigger). When there is a sound, lightning, or radio signal, all cameras will capture pictures at the same time from different angles. By using Joopic app, you only need to setup one CamBuddy Pro's work mode, others will follow up. Under synchronized mode, you can even setup every camera in the array has an equidifferent delay time.

CamBuddy Pro provides the ability to connect to up 128 cameras to capture stunning Matrix bullet-time footage,  as demonstrated in the video.

This scenario can also be used to monitor your home or office. You can set the master CamBuddy Pro to work under laser trigger mode. When someone break the laser, the CamBuddy Pro can be triggered to send a radio wave, which then trigger other cameras to take a picture or start to record a video.

  • Control multiple cameras simultaneously through WiFi-connection
  • Control multiple cameras in master-slave mode through CamBuddy Pro build-in radio transceiver

 

SOFTWARE

Essentially, CamBuddy Pro is an app-controlled smart device. So we spend many efforts to develop the app and the firmware.

The Joopic App is now free to download for iOS and Android:

Joopic App for iOS link, Joopic App for Android link

 

The next big update of Joopic App will be available before this Christmas Day. In this update, Joopic App will provide a completely new module for CamBuddy Pro. The following picture shows some screens of Joopic App for CamBuddy Pro:

 

 

 

SAMPLE PHOTOS

Here are some cool photos from us and our beta testers. Special thanks to Chad and Julie for their creative work! We believe that we will see even better photos from you backers by using your CamBuddy Pro in the near future!

Sound Triggered Shutter (by Joopic Labs)

Sound Triggered Flash (by Joopic Labs)

Laser Triggered Shutter (by Joopic Labs)

The Racer (Laser triggered shutter, by Joopic Labs)

Water Droplet (Laser triggered flash, by Joopic Labs)

Laser Triggered Shutter (by Julie Everhart)

Selfie (by Julie Everhart)

Remote Shoot (by Chad Wildermuth)

The Ducks (Remote shoot, by Joopic Labs)

TECH SPECS

Widely Supported Cameras

By using CamBuddy Pro and Joopic app, you can remotely capture pictures through the shutter release port of your camera. Therefore, if your camera has a shutter release port, you can use CamBuddy Pro with it.

Fortunately, most DSLR cameras and some mirrorless cameras have the shutter release ports. Therefore, you can use the remote shoot, the intervalometer, the smart trigger, the multi-camera control functions of CamBuddy Pro with your DSLR/mirrorless camera, including those from Canon, Nikon, Sony, Pentax, Panasonic, Fujifilm, Leica, Hasselblad, and Ricoh.

Especially, the following DSLR cameras are fully supported; CamBuddy Pro provides all features mentioned above for these cameras:

Canon EOS:

1D Mark IV, 1D X, 1D X Mark II, 5D Mark II, 5D Mark III, 5D Mark IV, 5DS, 5DSR, 6D, 7D, 7D Mark II, 50D, 60D, 60Da, 70D, 80D, 100D (Rebel SL1), 550D (Rebel T2i / Kiss X4), 600D (Rebel T3i / Kiss X5), 650D (Rebel T4i / Kiss X6i), 700D (Rebel T5i / Kiss X7i), 750D (Rebel T6i / Kiss X8i), 760D (Rebel T6s), 1200D (Rebel T5), 1300D (Rebel T6)

Nikon:

DF, D3X, D3S, D4, D4S, D5, D300, D300S, D500, D600, D610, D700, D750, D800, D800E, D810, D810A, D90, D3100, D3200, D3300, D5000, D5100, D5200, D5300, D5500, D7000, D7100, D7200

Almost all modern non-SLR cameras, for example, mirrorless or general digital cameras from Sony, Nikon, Olympus, Samsung, Panasonic, and Fuji, are partially supported by CamBuddy Pro. You can use CamBuddy Pro to browse and transfer the pictures and the videos taken by the camera to your smartphone instantly without copying the files to your desktop computer first.

 

If you are still wonder whether your camera are supported by CamBuddy Pro, please send a message to @creator or leave a message as a comment. We will answer your question as soon as possible.

The diagrams below illustrate the ports and the cables used to connect a CamBuddy Pro with a camera or other devices.

  • A) You can use the micro USB cable included in the product package to charge CamBuddy Pro. Note that the cable is for charging only, not a USB data cable. 
  • B) You can use the USB data cable shipped with your camera to connect CamBuddy Pro to your camera's USB port. If you want to use live view or remote shoot, or transfer pictures from your camera, you use this port.
  • C) You can use a shutter release cable to connect to your camera's shutter release port. When you use the intervalometer or the smart trigger functions, you can choose this port to release the camera's shutter. 
  • D) You can use a standard 3.5mm PC flash cable to connect to an external flash. When you use the intervalometer or the smart trigger functions, you can choose the port to trigger the external flash.

WHAT ARE THE PERKS?

  • CamBuddy Pro (Silver): Get one CamBuddy Pro (with silver alloy cover) for a discount of up to 32%. Please note a shutter release cable or a flash cable is required for high speed photography and different models of your camera might require different cable. If you don't already have one for your camera, we suggest you to purchase it from adorama http://bit.ly/2ddPALz, or other online store.
  • CamBuddy Pro (Black): Get one CamBuddy Pro (with black alloy cover) for a discount of up to 30%. Please note that the dark alloy cover gives you a cool appearance and of course the manufacturing process is more complex than the silver alloy cover. The picture below shows the differences between them.

  • Get It All: One CamBuddy Pro (with black alloy cover) + one handheld radio transmitter + one laser generator + one cable set. 
  1. Radio trigger is best immune to the environmental factors. CamBuddy Pro has a built-in radio transceiver. You can use one CamBuddy Pro's radio transmitter to trigger another one's radio receiver. The handheld radio transmitter here provide a way to trigger a CamBuddy Pro or multiple CamBuddy Pros manually. 
  2. You can use a general laser pointer to trigger CamBuddy Pro, but CamBuddy Pro's built-in laser sensor works best with the laser generator designed specific for CamBuddy Pro. Note that in the package of the laser generator, a portable power bank is also included.

  3. In the cable set, there are 4 different types of shutter release cables and 1 flash cable. The shutter release cables in the set cover all fully supported DSLR cameras listed above. The flash cable is a standard 3.5mm-PC flash cable, which is suitable for most external flashes. 

  • Matrix Pack. Get six units (all with silver alloy covers) and unlock the Matrix bullet-time mode. A handheld radio transmitter, a laser generator, and six cable sets are included in the bundle.

ABOUT US

Our Story

We’ve come a long way to make the best and only all-in-one camera remote. We believed innovative picture taking could be more fun, and photos could be shared more easily and instantly. With these beliefs in mind, our team spent countless nights designing, programming, and prototyping to bring CamBuddy Pro to life. Credits also go to volunteers around the world who helped us during beta testing, making CamBuddy Pro perfect. 

The enthusiasm from the community convinced us CamBuddy Pro will be a big success. We already made the investment on all production equipment needed and your support will allow us to start now. 

Our Team - Engineers 

Our operation in Houston, TX is supported by an amazing engineering team based in Beijing, China. Our engineers have the strongest background and every expertise in hardware design, coding, and manufacturing. We have gone through numerous rounds of prototyping and now present to you the CamBuddy Pro that we are proud of. 

 

Our Team - Beta Testers

We are a small team supported by a big community of photographers. We knew we couldn't build the best product without listening to you. Special thanks go to @Julie Everhart who volunteered to offer us tremendous insights to make CamBuddy Pro more powerful and intuitive to use. We are honored to have her as CamBuddy's first ambassador. Check out her posts about what she can do with CamBuddy: 

https://www.facebook.com/julieeverhartphotography/

https://twitter.com/julev69 

https://www.instagram.com/julev69/ 

We are fortunate to have many volunteers like Julie around the world to help us beta test CamBuddy Pro. They have undergone extensive testing to find bugs and help us make improvements until perfection. 

A video review from @Kerrie Meister:

Another review from @Chad Wildermuth: 

http://bit.ly/2dlw6ES

See more what beta testers are able to do with CamBuddy Pro at 

www.twitter.com/urcambuddy

www.facebook.com/urcambuddy

Joopic App for Windows 7 or later (64bit)
Joopic App for Mac OS X 10.6 or later

story:
For user examples of work and usage please visit airtripper.com and 3d-printer-kit.com


ALL KITS NOW INCLUDE A SD CARD READER AND MENU CONTROL FOR FULL STANDALONE USE. NO NEED FOR A COMPUTER. As can be seen on the SUMPOD.COM FORUM.


What is SUMPOD?

My aim in designing the SUMPOD was to produce a product which not only makes the technology affordable and hence accessible but has the safety of the user at the forefront. That aim has been met with the SUMPOD. You may ask why a home 3d printer is necessary. My view is that like the inkjet printer which turned a lot of people into photographers and desktop publishers, a 3d printer will reignite our need to invent, design and construct with the end result being a rebirth of manufacturing. Anyone of any age will have the ability to have an idea and see it through from conception to manufacture. Home manufacture. It could also reduce the amount of waste by giving the user the ability to fix broken plastic parts, by designing and printing replacements.

It is not necessary to design objects as there are multitudes of designs available for free on-line which can be downloaded and printed using the available software.


ALL KITS NOW INCLUDE A SD CARD READER AND MENU CONTROL FOR FULL STANDALONE USE. NO NEED FOR A COMPUTER.



BUILD QUALITY

The units are built using precision cut CNC parts using 18mm MDF, for strength, with axis which run on quality linear bearings and are driven by quality steel reinforced belts and trapezoidal spindles for smooth motion. The motors are high torque Nema 17s which are the best compromise between size, weight and power.

The extruder is based on the tried and tested wade extruder with an aluminium block hot end.

The machines will have a build area of 150mm by 150mm by 100mm with an overall size of 280*350*280.

There is a lcd display which is used to display temperature and will allow future developments such as a SD card standalone functionality.

All these components and design choices ensure that the machine will be long lasting, accurate and safe.

ACCESSORIES

A Dremel attachment for PCBs and light routing, such as lithopanes, is to be included with the kit.


PARTICIPATION

My aim on this campaign is to ensure the continuation of the SUMPOD idea and hopefully raise enough to take the business to the next level by buying a commercial CNC machine.

The SUMPODs from this campaign will be sent during February 2012 - March2012.



Postage costs :

You will be sent a Paypal request for the postage costs just before shipping. Please do not add these costs to the contribution. Any problem please send a message before you contribute.


United Kingdom: $60
Europe: $100
USA and Canada: $120
Rest of World: $150


Pick up In Person in UK: Free ( to be arranged when order is complete)

smooth  motion. The motors are high torque Nema 17s which are the best  compromise between size, weight and power.The extruder is based on the tried and tested wade extruder with an aluminium block hot end. The machines will have a build area of 150mm by 150mm by 100mm with an overall size of 280*350*280.There  is a lcd display which is used to display temperature and will allow  future developments such as a SD card standalone functionality.All these components and design choices ensure that the machine will be long lasting, accurate and safe.ACCESSORIES  A Dremel attachment for PCBs and light routing, such as lithopanes, is to be included with the kit. PARTICIPATIONMy
 aim on this campaign is to ensure the continuation of the SUMPOD idea 
and hopefully raise enough to take the business to the next level by 
buying a commercial CNC machine. 
The SUMPODs from this campaign will be sent during February 2012 - March2012.Postage costs :You  will be sent a Paypal
 request for the postage costs just before  shipping. Please do not add 
these costs to the contribution. Any problem  please send a message 
before you contribute.United Kingdom: $60Europe: $100USA and Canada: $120Rest of World: $150Pick up In Person in UK: Free ( to be arranged when order is complete)

story:
Each year the Illinois Eye-Bank helps nearly 3,000 people receive the gift sight through cornea donation and transplantation.  Cyndy is one of those people, and she got her second chance at sight thanks to the generosity of Sheila and Terry Walters' son, Caleb.


The Caleb Connection: A Journey to Sight

When Sheila and Terry Walters got the news that their son, Caleb, had passed away their world turned upside down.  Suddenly, they were not only faced with the loss of their child, but with the decision of whether or not to donate his eyes, organs and tissues.  Even in the wake of their immense tragedy, the Walters chose to pursue donation in hopes that Caleb would have a lasting impact on the lives of others.

While Caleb was unable to be an organ donor, Sheila and Terry found incredible hope in learning that his corneas would go to restore sight in two people suffering from corneal blindness.

One of those people was Cyndy Loula.  Cyndy was diagnosed with keratoconus, a disease effecting the shape of the cornea, and her vision had deteriorated so badly that she had lost her sight and her independence.

With the help of the Illinois Eye-Bank, all of this changed for Cyndy when she received her sight-restoring, and life-changing cornea transplant from Caleb.

Not long after Caleb's donation, Sheila was anxious to meet the recipients of her son's gift.  She wrote to Cyndy, and waited for years before receiving a response.  Cyndy had been overwhelmed with emotion upon reading Sheila's letter and struggled to find the words to express her appreciation.  Not only that, but Cyndy was taken aback by the fact that her donor's name was Caleb, because she had also lost a son by the very same name.

With this, the Caleb connection was formed.


Reaching the Rose Parade

Cyndy, Sheila and Terry did eventually meet and instantly became the best of friends.  Their lives are forever intertwined, and they now use their personal experiences as an opportunity to help others.  These three have become very active volunteers for the Illinois Eye-Bank, and frequently attend and speak at the charity's events to share their stories and to illustrate the power of donation. 

First hand accounts are the Illinois Eye-Bank's most powerful tool in raising awareness about the gift of sight.  As can be seen in this An Eye for an I video, cornea donation is life-changing, and it takes people like Cyndy, Sheila and Terry to share this message.

 

In order to thank them for all they do, as well as to honor the Walters' generosity and to celebrate Cyndy's gift of sight, the Illinois Eye-Bank wants to send them to the 2015 Rose Parade to participate in the Donate Life Float.  Each year, Donate Life America sponsors a float in the parade to recognize eye, organ and tissue donors for giving the gifts of sight, life and mobility.  The float gives donors, donor families and recipients alike a national platform upon which to be recognized, and this is exactly what Cyndy, Sheila and Terry deserve.


California Bound

The experience and bond that Cyndy, Sheila and Terry share is one that is truly powerful and unique.  Their dedication to advocating for eye, organ and tissue donation, and their enduring strength and passion, make them ideal representatives for the Donate Life Float.  Positioning them on a national level will gain attention for their powerful story, and will ultimately bring hope to others in similar situations.

The Illinois Eye-Bank, however, cannot get them to California on its own.  As a nonprofit organization, the Eye-Bank relies upon the generosity of financial contributors to carry out its important mission, and to complete significant programs and projects like this one.

With YOUR help, the Illinois Eye-Bank will be able to send Cyndy, Sheila and Terry to California to take their well-deserved place upon the Donate Life Float.


How You Can Help

"Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much." 
-Helen Keller

While the total expenses for this trip will run around $10,000, the $5,000 the Illinois Eye-Bank hopes to raise here, with your help, will cover the costs of the flights and hotel stays for Cyndy, Sheila and Terry.  This alone will make a significant difference in the organization's ability to make the trip a reality, and will provide these three with the experience of a lifetime.

Whether your contribution is $5, $10, $20 or $50, any donation is meaningful.

By supporting this campaign, you are helping to share the hope that touches lives through eye, organ and tissue donation.

You can help the Illinois Eye-Bank tell the world that even through loss, even in darkness, there is hope.  Cyndy, Sheila and Terry are living proof of that.


      Other Ways to Get Involved

      Whether or not you can make a financial contribution, there are many ways to support the Illinois Eye-Bank to give the gift of sight to all in need, and to help send Cyndy and the Walters to the Rose Parade.

      • Follow and Like the Illinois Eye-Bank on Facebook and Twitter
      • Share the Celebrating the Gift of Sight campaign via social media
      • Encourage your friends, family and coworkers to make a financial contribution
      • Hold your own fundraising event in support of the Illinois Eye-Bank

      Thank you for your support!

 Thank you for your support!

story:
Welcome to the Project Candy Box Indiegogo Campaign!

We are very excited to be launching our amazing candy campaign all across Canada. Your investment will allow us to grow and offer a very special experience month after month.

Read about our campaign below and feel free to ask any questions that you would like!

The Purpose:

Who doesn't love candy? How about chocolate? How about candy and chocolate from all over the world? Our mission is to bring the entire world of candy and chocolate directly to your door! Every month you will receive a different candy surprise in your box. You can share it with your friends or eat it all by yourself. We won't judge you!

Every month  you can count on at least 10 different pieces of candy and an awesome theme to tie them all together. Read our jokes, riddles and candy facts inside our boxes while you enjoy the contents. Candy was meant to put a smile on your face and that is our promise to you!

Sweets are great but Project Candy Box aims for more. Our candy boxes are filled with color, surprises and stories as well as sugar and chocolate. We will walk you through each bite and make sure you know what you are eating.

Not a candy lover? Then share our candy boxes with those who you love! Project Candy Box makes a great gift for your family, friends and significant others.


Why Crowdfunding:

At Project Candy Box, we want you to be personally responsible for the success of our company. Through crowdfunding, you can invest in our idea so that we can perfect our product with a direct investment from our customers and fans. At the same time you get to be part of the Project Candy Box launch!

For our funding campaign, we have come up with a few great ways for you to invest. Just read through funding tiers on the right and choose which one suits you!

Campaign Goal:

Our team is searching for a crowdfunding investment of $6150 so that we can deliver to you the ultimate candy experience. Your investment will help us create a website with full e-commerce functionality, expert branding opportunities and a candy box design that you will be proud to keep on your shelf. The more backers we get, the more we can give back to our loyal backers.

Ensure our Success:

Our success is in your hands, you are now our brand ambassadors. Your job is to share our campaign with everyone in your circle. You can do this the following ways:

  1. Word of mouth: Talk to your friends at school or work and make sure they know that we are launching and to visit our campaign page
  2. Social Media: Direct your family and friends to our campaign on Facebook and Twitter. Use the hashtag #projectcandybox so that we can follow all of your tweets!
  3. Communicate with us: Tell us about how excited you are for us to launch. We want to hear your questions are your comments. Make sure to congratulate us on reaching our milestones!

We want to share our startup experience with you and will be documenting our process as we move forward! 

Shipping:

Read our perks carefully. We are including shipping to Canada in our prices. We have set our shipping rate at $6. If you are not from Canada then you can only contribute on our base package and you will receive a thank you on our new e-commerce website. 

#WarheadChallenge

Don't forget to participate in our Warhead Challenge and nominate your friends. Just eat 5 assorted warheads on camera at the same time and post it on our Facebook wall. You will then be entered to win free candy boxes when we launch our new website. #WarheadChallenge #ProjectCandyBox

Parlez-vous français?

Après notre campagne, un de nos objectifs est de préparer un site web bilingue. Il est très important d'offrir à la fois une expérience française et anglaise à tous nos clients. S'il vous plaît veuillez être patient pendant que nous faisons cela le plus rapidement possible!

READ THIS IF YOU HAVE ALLERGIES

Please be advised that our box may contain ingredients that you may be allergic to. All ingredients are provided on the product labels so if you have allergies read the labels carefully.

story:
About me

My name is Tomer Botner. I'm a 31-year-old industrial designer form Tel-Aviv, Israel. I design and make kitchen knives. Each customized knife comes from my love of food, aesthetics, and human interaction. 

About FKK

Florentine Kitchen Knives, my company, aims to bring a spirit of craft and co-operation to the local communities it operates in by designing customized kitchen knives through the union of a small business mindset and big design ideas.   

What we need
 
We are raising $10,000 to buy materials, fund our craftsmen, and build our website, which will allow anyone to design their own personalized knife -- customized to their needs. Reaching this goal will allow us to grow and supply you with better products and a better experience as customers. 

How do we do it

We think that each unique cook should have a unique knife suited just for him or her. We don't compromise on the quality of material and craft and we use the best suppliers and craftsman there are. We get our steel from NJ Steel Baron- http://newjerseysteelbaron.com/ who supply Bark River, Cut Brooklyn and other custom and hand-made knifemakers. Our blades are cut, grinded and polished by Lamson and Goodnow - http://www.lamsonsharp.com/ who are the oldest, most well respected cutlery manufacturer in the United States. Our knives have become a co-operation between the quality, knowledge and know-how of east coast american manufacturers and the fresh design, flair and innovativness of the Israeli west-coast metropolis of Tel-Aviv.

How can you help?

You can help us by pledging and ordering our knives. Even if you can't afford to help us reach our goal we would love it if you shared this with your friends and family.

We are always available to answer your questions.
