story:
It would be great every house could get a little more space, but those small homes maybe need a little help when it comes to making the residence more comfortable and uncluttered. And we create this space saving idea—Witmo smart & folding sofa bed furniture, which makes it available that you own some room to stretch out, even if you live in a tiny studio, it will become perfectly suitable for living, working, partying and everything else you want to do. All these could be in considerable comfort and in style.

 

Smart & folding Sofa bed

Witmo was designed to save your room space, you can change its size as a bed or sofa with the remote controller. There is USB interface on the head that you can use it for phone charging and lighting. The folding tables on both sides can place your coffee, phones, and books. What's more, you can store your clothes and other stuff in this huge-capacity drawer under the bed, which can spare more room. It's very convenient and useful for those live in a small room or want to try something new

Space saving and live smart 

As a modern furniture, Witmo has fashional decoration and solid steel frame, it will just look new after two years using. And it has multiple compositions that have varied functions to meed your demand for living a smart & comfortable life

  • USB-charging interface
  • Bluetooth speaker
  • Folding tables on both sides
  • Huge-storage drawer under the bed

 

Witmo provides a revolutionary way to solve your living problems in your daily life, and make your life comfortable and live smart. 

Remote controller

There are control buttons on the head and a remote controller that you can change the size as you like. once press the buttons, it will change automatically to the proper size to make it comfortable for you sitting and lying down. and what's more, it makes no noise during you change its size

Automatically change its size

Huge-capacity drawer

There is a huge-capacity drawer under the bed, Its length is 630mm, its width depends on which bed size you will choose. You can store your pillows , quilts, and clothes inside. Especially for children, they will have plenty of toys on the floor, so you can put it in this drawer to make your room clean and tidy.

 

 

There are two folding tables on both sides of this sofabed, you can put coffee, phone, light, even some books on it, and you can use it easily.

Witmo was designed with three buttons on the head, one button for automatically contracting and expanding on its head to change size, and the other is this USB output, you can use it for phone charging, lighting or any devices that be compatible to USB interface. 

And this is the third button, the voice button. It makes a warning sound and tells your family that this Witmo sofabed is changing the size, and protect them from any accident. 

Witmo Bluetooth speaker has the high-quality sound unit that it can guarantee the Hi-Fi sound, it can wirelessly connect to your phone, TV and other devices, you can enjoy this function at anywhere you like.

Frame

Witmo sofabed was made of solid steel and the soft cloth, With electrostatic spraying technology, it's solid and durable, after years' of using, it will still look like the new one. And skeleton design will reduce the weight of sofabed, and make it light to move annd carry.

Colors

There are 27 available colors for you to choose, and you just need to pick the number you want 

 

Witmo Mattress

Our foam provides a bouncy feel for all sleeping positions. it will not cause you to "sink in and feel stuck" and "sleep hot", it sleeps cool and offers pressure great relief  in the mix of "not too soft and not too hard", and you won't disturb your sleeping partner. 

 

Sizes

We offer you three sizes of Witmo folding sofa bed that you can choose the right size as you prefer. (All the sizes are calculated in "cm")

Referral program

In order to let more people know our Witmo smart bed, we are glad to invite all our backers to join our referral program to help our spread out the words

Rewards：If three person purchase any perk of Witmo campaign by your link, you can get one Witmo mattress for free, as well as the shipping fee. 

How to join our referral program

Method 1:

1. Log into your Indiegogo account and go to our campaign page:

2. Find the share buttons as below and share it to your social platforms or your friends directly:

3. You can go to your own profile and find out how many you have already successfully reached. And we will public the result on update page once this campaign ends, and send you the rewards with your perk. 

 

Method 2: 

Click the following buttons and spread it out with one click

 

 

FAQs

1. How many colors does Witmo have?

There are 27 available colors for you to choose, and you can just choose your Witmo size, then we will do the survey after this campaign ends, you just need to send back the color number you want, we will send out what you want. 

2. How to get the right size of Witmo mattress?

We provide the choose on the perk, with the small, medium, large three different sizes, just pay attention to choose the same size to Witmo sofa bed, then we will ship you the right ones. and if you can the mattress from our referral program, we will send you a personal email to confirm the right size. 

3. When is Witmo expected delivery?

Our campaign will last for one month after it ends, we will do the survey about your Witmo color and size, and fulfill your orders. and we will ship it out in July.

4. What's your warranty?

We provide two years warranty in case there are any unexpected problems during the manufacturing or shipment. After you receive your package and find anything wrong with the product, just contact our team and we will solve it as soon as possible.

5. How long will it take to ship it?

We have already worked with our third-party logistic company, and they guarantee our Witmo sofa bed will be successfully delivered in two weeks worldwide. 

6. Can I return or exchange Witmo after I receive it?

Yes. If you are not satisfied with the product or the color you choose, just contact our team with your reason, we will get in touch with you and solve your problem as soon as we can. 

 

 

Share it out and win our rewards

Huge-storage drawer under the bed


 
Witmo provides a revolutionary way to solve your living problems in your daily life, and make your life comfortable and live smart. 



Remote controller
There are control buttons on the head and a remote controller that you can change the size as you like. once press the buttons, it will change automatically to the proper size to make it comfortable for you sitting and lying down. and what's more, it makes no noise during you change its size

Automatically change its size


Huge-capacity drawer
There is a huge-capacity drawer under the bed, Its length is 630mm, its width depends on which bed size you will choose. You can store your pillows , quilts, and clothes inside. Especially for children, they will have plenty of toys on the floor, so you can put it in this drawer to make your room clean and tidy.

 



 


There are two folding tables on both sides of this sofabed, you can put coffee, phone, light, even some books on it, and you can use it easily.

Witmo was designed with three buttons on the head, one button for automatically contracting and expanding on its head to change size, and the other is this USB output, you can use it for phone charging, lighting or any devices that be compatible to USB interface. 
And this is the third button, the voice button. It makes a warning sound and tells your family that this Witmo sofabed is changing the size, and protect them from any accident. 


Witmo Bluetooth speaker has the high-quality sound unit that it can guarantee the Hi-Fi sound, it can wirelessly connect to your phone, TV and other devices, you can enjoy this function at anywhere you like.

Frame
Witmo sofabed was made of solid steel and the soft cloth, With electrostatic spraying technology, it's solid and durable, after years' of using, it will still look like the new one. And skeleton design will reduce the weight of sofabed, and make it light to move annd carry.

Colors
There are 27 available colors for you to choose, and you just need to pick the number you want 

 
Witmo Mattress
Our foam provides a bouncy feel for all sleeping positions. it will not cause you to "sink in and feel stuck" and "sleep hot", it sleeps cool and offers pressure great relief  in the mix of "not too soft and not too hard", and you won't disturb your sleeping partner. 

 
Sizes
We offer you three sizes of Witmo folding sofa bed that you can choose the right size as you prefer. (All the sizes are calculated in "cm")

Referral program
In order to let more people know our Witmo smart bed, we are glad to invite all our backers to join our referral program to help our spread out the words
Rewards：If three person purchase any perk of Witmo campaign by your link, you can get one Witmo mattress for free, as well as the shipping fee. 
How to join our referral program
Method 1:
1. Log into your Indiegogo account and go to our campaign page:
2. Find the share buttons as below and share it to your social platforms or your friends directly:

3. You can go to your own profile and find out how many you have already successfully reached. And we will public the result on update page once this campaign ends, and send you the rewards with your perk. 
 
Method 2: 
Click the following buttons and spread it out with one click



 
 
FAQs
1. How many colors does Witmo have?
There are 27 available colors for you to choose, and you can just choose your Witmo size, then we will do the survey after this campaign ends, you just need to send back the color number you want, we will send out what you want. 
2. How to get the right size of Witmo mattress?
We provide the choose on the perk, with the small, medium, large three different sizes, just pay attention to choose the same size to Witmo sofa bed, then we will ship you the right ones. and if you can the mattress from our referral program, we will send you a personal email to confirm the right size. 
3. When is Witmo expected delivery?
Our campaign will last for one month after it ends, we will do the survey about your Witmo color and size, and fulfill your orders. and we will ship it out in July.
4. What's your warranty?
We provide two years warranty in case there are any unexpected problems during the manufacturing or shipment. After you receive your package and find anything wrong with the product, just contact our team and we will solve it as soon as possible.
5. How long will it take to ship it?
We have already worked with our third-party logistic company, and they guarantee our Witmo sofa bed will be successfully delivered in two weeks worldwide. 
6. Can I return or exchange Witmo after I receive it?
Yes. If you are not satisfied with the product or the color you choose, just contact our team with your reason, we will get in touch with you and solve your problem as soon as we can. 
 
 
Share it out and win our rewards

story:
Shipping Soon! Starts in July.

.

Revov Tray Box creates the most effortless open experience.

Making for an entertaining and practical means of organizing your Everyday Carry.

 

 

Flick, Open. Head out with style and at ease. 

 

Keep your everyday carry objects organized without even thinking. 

 

What Makes Revov Tray Box kinda Awesome...

 

 

Some Words from Our Friends

Revov Tray Box is the second product of our Revov Series. This series started from our previous campaign "Revov Coin Storage", which you may have seen or even participated. We received a lot of nice feedbacks, and here's something people have been talking about...

 

The Most Effortless Way to open, "Magnetic Rotating Mechanism" 

The floating magnetic lid swings open and into place with an oddly-satisfying, smooth motion.

 

 

Minimize the contact, it feels like the lid is floating! 

 

Addicting, Bouncy, Satisfying...You Name It!

 

Configured to Organize your Daily Essentials

Speaking of functional, the configuration of the upper lid, is tailor made for peoples Daily Essentials. 

 

We listed the most common objects in our daily life, inducted the measurements of each, to make sure it fit all needs.

 

Beech Wood + Aluminum

With the upper lid made of beech wood. You will feel the warm touch of wood every time you open. 

 

The Aluminum body keep it steady and extremely durable. 

 

Divide in your way, "The Modular Divider"

*Free gift in limited reward options

Movable dividers allow you to customize compartments to suit your specific needs.

 

With or without dividers, your choice!

 

Divide in your way, and stay organized.

 

Why create Revov Tray Box?

Does these scenario seems familiar?

You left your keys, wallet, coins and other valuables in random places throughout the house and end up looking for one of them later on?

Well, this happen to us all the time...

 

Sometimes we even forgot to bring our keys and ended up get locked outside?. Therefore, we came up with the idea of Revov Tray Box.

Hope it can become a Home For All of Our Daily Essentials.

 

So we can head out like this...

 

The Development

The upper compartment is designed scientifically. We came up with compartments specified for Everyday Carry Objects. Keeping things all in one place, and keep them within reach. Configure the parts base on the size of most common daily essentials.

 

Researched over thousands of user experience, develop by the result.  After making tons of prototype, we finally came out with the first glance of "Revov".

 

Spec

 

Add-On

Wood Pen

*Get it for free when you pledge two "Revov Tray Box".

 

Click me to download MEDIA KIT.

story:
Featured on

The most stylish smart lamp which you will love to own is here. It's not just a simple boring lamp but a great piece of tech which can replace most of your gadgets without occupying much space. It's made out of real cherry wood veneer which makes it classy and looks premium too.

The inspiration is coming from a trip to Wengji Village, YunNan China. Wengji is small and remoted village abounds with tea. Trees play an important part in the life of villagers . The whole village is surrounded by various trees , villagers live with trees, protected by trees and connected with trees. We want to bring this harmony to you, combine the beauty of nature and  modern technology, so here we are, Hometree. 

 

Cherry wood is a stunning material that gives the light a warm color and glow as it shines through illuminating the grain.The austere design can match many types of interior decorating,whether modern or retro.

 

Hometree consists 38 Eco-friendly LED bulbs and comes with a touch panel to perform various functions like brightness adjustment, alarm, sleep mode, etc.

 

when your phone runs out of juice you can simply charge it wirelessly as it supports Qi Wireless Charging out of the box as well.

Charging Receiver

To make life easier, we provide a charging receiver together with Hometree. Below are the supported ports:

 

A comfortable bedroom could always use some music. Hometree houses within a neodymium magnet speaker to provide you with rich audio experience.

You can connect 2 hometree to achieve better music experience

Slide and click, control Hometree is as simply as control your phone

 

The support of multiple connections like WiFi, Bluetooth, Airplay, etc. makes Hometree versatile and easily accessible by any device and place.

 

(Support IOS only at the moment)

 

 

Timeline

Where are we now?

Hometree is now on production, and we are bring it to every fair! Indiegogo is the best place to inactive with customers，we would like to hear more from our customers before we expand to bigger market. So here we are! 

1. Will the plug work in my country? 

We’re using the US plug. But you could use the adapter to change the plug as you want.

2. How heavy is it? &  What’s the size?

2kg; 29* 15* 19cm

3. Will my lamp look as good as seen in the campaign?

Yes and no. It will be a bit better than the pictures that we attached in the campaign. Each lamp will be inspected 5 times for appearance & function. We’re really focus on the details. We hope this lamp could let you feel back home. Every piece of nature cheery wood is different, so no, you will find small difference on texture & Pattern.

4. How should I clean the lamp’ surface?
You can use a soft fabric and some water if necessary but avoid using any products especially the ones containing alcohol because it can permanently damage the lamps surface.

5. Do you ship worldwide?
Yes! 

6. Is the shipping fee included?
Yes. The shipping fee is included in the perks.

7. Who will deliver the lamps?
Depends on your country, normally we will choose local post mail to fulfill the order.

8. How long does it take to deliver? 
We will ship out in July, hopefully you will receive it by August.

How long does it take to deliver? We will ship out in July, hopefully you will receive it by August.

Escape from a Hectic Lifestyle
Imagine being able to enjoy the sound of nature while watching a sparkling water droplet dripping off a leaf after a fresh rainfall. You can experience all of this with SmartTerra in your own home or office. Enjoy a realistic sunrise or sunset scene, rain and thunderstorms. Relax with the mood lighting at night. And, most important of all, you can keep your plants alive and thriving.

 

 
SmartTerra Has Your Plants Covered!
Terrariums are truly beautiful. They are like your little escape gardens. However, most of us can't even keep a simple potted plant alive, so, a terrarium would be the last thing you want to own. SmartTerra changes all that. SmartTerra is fully automatic and employs sensors that continuously monitor vital conditions of your ecosystem: water level, soil moisture, and temperature. When the soil is dry, SmartTerra waters your plants by generating rainfall. SmartTerra is the first autonomous terrarium that generates rainfall with realistic lighting and thunder sound effects when water is needed. Of course, you can make it rain anytime you want as well!

 
Listen and Follow Nature
To make the rain effects believable, you can make sure that the light, sound, and raindrops are synchronized as realistic as possible: sky dimming, sounds of the rain, rolling thunder, and then comes the raindrops, flashes of thunder and "bamm" comes the sound! Cool!

 
Let There be... Sound!
SmartTerra is the only terrarium to have built-in speakers. Enjoy the many soundscapes provided or play the music of your choice via Bluetooth.

 

 
Welcome the Night
SmartTerra can turn the night into a soothing atmosphere. Change the soundscape to match your selected mood light mode of choice:

Aurora Borealis
Rainbow Cycle
Color Hue Cycle



 
 
SmartTerra Key Features

 

 
SmartTerra Mobile Application
You can control and communicate with your SmartTerra through our mobile application. Anytime you want to see the vital conditions of your little forest, just fire up the app. Use the "Theme" feature to tailor the settings based on your plants and your preferences:

How often it rains
Amount of light needed (duration)
Sunrise/Sunset times
Mood light mode
Soundscape

Whenever you feel like playing Zeus, just press "Make it rain!" and watch your rainstorm unfold. When necessary, SmartTerra will alert you to fill the water tray or add nutrients to the soil.

 
Take A Look How SmartTerra App work with SmartTerra Unit

 
 
How Does it Work?



 
SmartTerra Specs

 
Behind the Scenes



 

SmartTerra took several years to design and develop. We built several prototypes and kept refining them into the SmartTerra you see today. The idea is to keep all the technology out of view and let the plants shine. However, what's hidden inside is pretty cool:

High CRI LEDs and WS8212 LEDs
Humidity and temperature sensors
Capacitive sensors for water level and soil moisture
BLE communication for app and streaming music
Stereo Speakers
Quiet water pump
Air circulation alongside the tank to keep away condensation and filter the air through the plants
Water recirculation system



 
 


 

 

 

What Can I Put in My SmartTerra

 
Timeline

 
Perks

 

 

 
Follow Our Progress
 

 
Frequently Asked Questions
Will I need to fertilize my plants?
You should fertilize your plants about every three months. The app will remind you when you need to add fertilizer. The starter kit provides you with fertilizer as well and additional fertilizer can be purchased from our website.
Is there an air filter in SmartTerra? If so, how often do I have to replace it?
The air filter is reusable and can be rinsed off. If you need a new one you can purchase it from our website.
How much water do I put in the tray and how often?
As you fill the tray, an indicator will let you know when the tray is filled. You will generally need to fill the tray every three weeks depending on the types of plants you have. The app will alert you when the tray needs to be filled.
Can I put fish, reptiles or amphibians in SmartTerra?
SmartTerra is not suitable for fish. Some types of reptiles are ok, preferably, something tropical (frogs, turtles). Bear in mind that some reptiles need UV light to keep warm which is not included with SmartTerra.
Does it need to be plugged in or is it battery operated?
SmartTerra runs on a provided power adapter and needs to be plugged in.
How do I clean my SmartTerra and how often will I have to do that?
The inside of the unit may need to be wiped down with a paper towel or you can purchase our cleaning stick.
What if the LED light goes out?
LEDs are designed to last. They don't blow out like a regular light, so, you do not have to worry about them going out.
Is the app free?
Yes, the app is free to download (Android and iOS)
Do I need to have a smartphone in order to work my SmartTerra?
Yes, you do since settings need to be done with the app. The app can be downloaded on Android and iOS.
Is there a chance that the shipping costs will lower before the terrariums are shipped?
The shipping cost is the maximum you will have to pay. Should the price be higher, we will absorb the cost. However, if the cost is lower, we will make sure to credit you the difference!
 
We Need You!
Please continue the support, so we can bring SmartTerra to market as quickly as possible. Take advantage of the limited time discounts on Indiegogo InDemand.
 
Meet The SmartTerra Team

 
Risks and challenges
An awesome terrarium shouldn’t come with risks, and it most certainly shouldn’t be challenging, so we’re going to do our best to make the process of getting your SmartTerra from our facilities to you as painless as possible. The best part is, we’re confident in our ability to produce, we know the necessary steps it takes to create a well-developed product - we just need your support to take these steps and put them into to action. Don’t worry, we’re completely prepared from all angles to produce SmartTerra. However, if anything should come up along the way, you’ll be the first to know.

story:
Helios is a modular touch wall light. This design allows the user to effectively swipe where they want or need light, turning the walls into a canvas for illumination using their hand as the brush. The combination of modularity and the lighting controls equals a product that can be completely tailored by the user. This product provides the opportunity for a lighting solution that is specific to each and every environment.

The individual components can be easily pieced together via the magnets that are located around the edges of the product. The hexagonal shape allows the pieces to tessellate together and gives the opportunity for a variety of multiple different structures. This process allows the user to create a light that suits the needs they have. The customer can purchase as many units as they need.

Swipe On / Swipe Off

The wall lamp is turned on and off through the physical touch from the user. Using capacitive sensors as the switch, when the user's body comes into contact with the surface it will toggle each component on or off. This design allows the user to effectively swipe where they want or need light. Turning the interior architecture into a canvas for illumination with the users hand as the brush.


Dimensions

Currently up to 105 tiles can be joined on the same power circuit. Further testing and development will be done to increase this. Larger displays can be made by isolating the contacts between groups of tiles.

 

Wall Mounting

Only the central units need to be rigidly connected, allowing the user to move around the other units to make different shapes. We tested various methods and the best solution was a choice of either nails or just sticky pads running around the perimeter of the rear face.

Nails are the most secure attachment and a template for their placement would be provided with the product. The sticky tabs provide an alternative or a back up to the nail connection if mounting onto surfaces where nails cannot be used, for example glass or tiles.

 Customize

The combination of the modularity and the lighting control equals a product that can be completely tailored by the user. This product provides an opportunity for a lighting solution that is specific to each and every environment.

Power

Helios Touch is powered from a mains power supply supplied with the packs with the correct plug will be supplied for your location. The 120 / 220 v to 24v 2A adapter will power up to 35 panels. For larger displays additional power supplies can be plugged in to increase the capacity to up to 105 panels.

Power Adapter

Supplied with International Plugs

Pledging For Rewards (Please read)

IMPORTANT: Indiegogo will only allow ONE pledge per person, you can not add expansion packs separately. Please choose the reward with the number of light panels required.

 

Design

Outer Shell

The two external parts for the product will be injection molded. Ribs have been added to all bosses in order to reduce sink marks and improve quality. The wall thickness has been kept uniform and consistent at l.5mm throughout the piece to ensure the quality and even cooling during the injection moulding process. The l.5mm thickness was chosen because it is within the optimal thickness range for the material and thin enough to allow for some of the intricate details.

 Mold Flow Analysis

Autodesk Moldflow was used to improve upon the existing design and create a more suitable part for injection moulding. Reducing sink marks was an important area to address as the model was initially prone to the defects in a visible area. The sink marks have been reduced by reducing material in certain areas and also ribbing necessary bosses.

The materials used for the outer shell will be a key factor in optimizing manufacturing and functionality of the product. The outer shell will also need to meet industry standards for electronic device housing.

Requirements of the material:
Strong enough to protect the internal components from some of the stresses the product may be exposed. These stresses may include the product being dropped on the floor and accidentally being stepped on.

Materials and Recycling 

·        Neoydin magnets

These magnets have been chosen because neodymium magnets are the strongest type of permanent magnet commercially available.

·        PCB

The substrate most commonly used in printed circuit boards is a glass fibre reinforced (fibreglass) epoxy resin with a copper foil bonded on to one or both sides. This has been chosen as it is less expensive and most commonly used.

·        LED

LED'S have been chosen for the product because of their current cost and energy efficiency, however as technology progresses, OLED's may be a more suitable option.

·        Life Cycle

All components within the product have a long life span (5+ years). The part to most likely fail first are the internal components mounted onto the PCB. The integration of the PCB has been designed so it can easily be replaced if this does occur.

·        Environmental Impact

The ambition of the product is to reduce the energy consumption for lighting in commercial buildings with a more tailored and customized light fixture, thus reducing energy wastage with an attitude of 'as much as you need'.

·        Recycling

ABS is not a biodegradable material, therefore in order to keep the environmental impact minimal all parts have been designed so they can be taken apart. The two ABS parts can detach from one another and be recycled into ABS pellets to be reused for other products. Another advantage to the product being designed to be easily taken apart is that the internal parts can be replaced if they fail or can be updated if new technological advancements are made, thus saving some parts from being thrown away.

·        Shipping

Materials and parts will be sourced as close to the manufacturing as possible. This is to reduce the total amount of shipping for the product and thus reducing the environmental impact of the product.

·        Packaging

The intention is to offer Helios lights in a 5 module starter pack with mains adapter, or 10 module expansion pack. This will allow the same packaging to be used for both. Circular or hexagon tubes will be used to pack the modules securely.

 

Previous Fundraising

Helios Touch has successfully raised funds on another Crowdfunding site. This parallel campaign on Indiegogo is to expand our audience and continue to raise orders to be shifted in the first batch.

The second production run will be sold via standard retailers at a higher price, so this is another chance to get on to the first wave.

 

The Story of Two Jameses

James Vanderpant is an extremely ambitious product designer who has just graduated from Brighton University. He already had 4 years experience in architecture and lighting prior to studying and has had the opportunity of working with some high end clients on a number of bespoke projects.

James has a great attention to detail and is destined to become a successful designer after already receiving awards for his work on Helios lighting, including New Designers Associate Prize in 2016. He co-created and manages the Brighton Design Exhibition to create an event that brought important and exciting design projects to the surface and acting as a major curator for up and coming creative talent within the Sussex area.

James Glover is an experienced Chartered Mechanical Engineer & Naval Architect, with extensive technical design experience in the automotive and marine industries prior to starting his own design company, Dyena.

His original specialty was suspension design for race car producing designs for Formula One, World Rally and Touring Cars. After motorsport world, James moved into the maritime sector, working first on a new marine propulsion technology, then as Head of Engineering Design for high performance powerboat company and as a technical design consultant within the maritime military industry.

 

How it all started

Currently spending most of his time on a new engine concept which is launching in 2017, James Glover happened to meet James Vanderpant at the Brighton Design Exhibition where he was demonstrating the Helios Lighting system. Instantly convinced by the concept, he offered his experience and contacts to develop the final design and release Helios Lighting to a wider market.

Supplied with International Plugs

 
Pledging For Rewards (Please read)
IMPORTANT: Indiegogo will only allow ONE pledge per person, you can not add expansion packs separately. Please choose the reward with the number of light panels required.
 
Design
Outer Shell
The two external parts for the product will be injection molded. Ribs have been added to all bosses in order to reduce sink marks and improve quality. The wall thickness has been kept uniform and consistent at l.5mm throughout the piece to ensure the quality and even cooling during the injection moulding process. The l.5mm thickness was chosen because it is within the optimal thickness range for the material and thin enough to allow for some of the intricate details.

 Mold Flow Analysis
Autodesk Moldflow was used to improve upon the existing design and create a more suitable part for injection moulding. Reducing sink marks was an important area to address as the model was initially prone to the defects in a visible area. The sink marks have been reduced by reducing material in certain areas and also ribbing necessary bosses.

The materials used for the outer shell will be a key factor in optimizing manufacturing and functionality of the product. The outer shell will also need to meet industry standards for electronic device housing.
Requirements of the material:Strong enough to protect the internal components from some of the stresses the product may be exposed. These stresses may include the product being dropped on the floor and accidentally being stepped on.
Materials and Recycling 
·        Neoydin magnets
These magnets have been chosen because neodymium magnets are the strongest type of permanent magnet commercially available.
·        PCB
The substrate most commonly used in printed circuit boards is a glass fibre reinforced (fibreglass) epoxy resin with a copper foil bonded on to one or both sides. This has been chosen as it is less expensive and most commonly used.
·        LED
LED'S have been chosen for the product because of their current cost and energy efficiency, however as technology progresses, OLED's may be a more suitable option.
·        Life Cycle
All components within the product have a long life span (5+ years). The part to most likely fail first are the internal components mounted onto the PCB. The integration of the PCB has been designed so it can easily be replaced if this does occur.
·        Environmental Impact
The ambition of the product is to reduce the energy consumption for lighting in commercial buildings with a more tailored and customized light fixture, thus reducing energy wastage with an attitude of 'as much as you need'.
·        Recycling
ABS is not a biodegradable material, therefore in order to keep the environmental impact minimal all parts have been designed so they can be taken apart. The two ABS parts can detach from one another and be recycled into ABS pellets to be reused for other products. Another advantage to the product being designed to be easily taken apart is that the internal parts can be replaced if they fail or can be updated if new technological advancements are made, thus saving some parts from being thrown away.
·        Shipping
Materials and parts will be sourced as close to the manufacturing as possible. This is to reduce the total amount of shipping for the product and thus reducing the environmental impact of the product.
·        Packaging
The intention is to offer Helios lights in a 5 module starter pack with mains adapter, or 10 module expansion pack. This will allow the same packaging to be used for both. Circular or hexagon tubes will be used to pack the modules securely.

 
Previous Fundraising
Helios Touch has successfully raised funds on another Crowdfunding site. This parallel campaign on Indiegogo is to expand our audience and continue to raise orders to be shifted in the first batch.
The second production run will be sold via standard retailers at a higher price, so this is another chance to get on to the first wave.
 
The Story of Two Jameses
James G & James V
James Vanderpant is an extremely ambitious product designer who has just graduated from Brighton University. He already had 4 years experience in architecture and lighting prior to studying and has had the opportunity of working with some high end clients on a number of bespoke projects.
James has a great attention to detail and is destined to become a successful designer after already receiving awards for his work on Helios lighting, including New Designers Associate Prize in 2016. He co-created and manages the Brighton Design Exhibition to create an event that brought important and exciting design projects to the surface and acting as a major curator for up and coming creative talent within the Sussex area.
James Glover is an experienced Chartered Mechanical Engineer & Naval Architect, with extensive technical design experience in the automotive and marine industries prior to starting his own design company, Dyena.
His original specialty was suspension design for race car producing designs for Formula One, World Rally and Touring Cars. After motorsport world, James moved into the maritime sector, working first on a new marine propulsion technology, then as Head of Engineering Design for high performance powerboat company and as a technical design consultant within the maritime military industry.
 
How it all started
Currently spending most of his time on a new engine concept which is launching in 2017, James Glover happened to meet James Vanderpant at the Brighton Design Exhibition where he was demonstrating the Helios Lighting system. Instantly convinced by the concept, he offered his experience and contacts to develop the final design and release Helios Lighting to a wider market.
campaign_city: Brighton and Hove City, United Kingdom

story:
For future orders, please go to Vacos Official Online Store and Amazon store enjoy 20% off right away (ends on June 22).

Buy on Offcial Store, Buy on Amazon US

Buy on Amazon UK, Buy on Amazon DE

Buy on Amazon FR, Buy on Amazon IT

Buy on Amazon ES, Buy on Amazon NL

Tired of running wires for your security cameras?

Worried about frequent false alerts from your cameras?

Now Vacos Cam is here to cure all your headaches. 100% wire-free, full color night vision, AI human recognition & PIR motion detection all make this camera the best & smartest battery powered security camera.

 

 

This camera is designed to offer installation freedom. We remove cables, outlets, drilling holes so that you can place the camera anywhere you like without any limitation. Vacos Cam’s array of mounts enable the camera to fit in just anywhere.

You can install the Vacos Cam battery powered security camera in the backyard, front door, entrance or porch, or put it on your shelf, table, living room or nursery room, etc. No wiring, no drilling, no installation limitation — that’s what a wire-free & worry-free security camera should be.

 

The built-in rechargeable battery provides super long battery life: one charge = 6 months (works around 5 mins/day). You can just install the camera anywhere & just forget it. Completely free you from frequent charging.

 

 

Connect the security camera to the waterproof Vacos Solar Panel for continuous power supply. You’ll never worry about the power drain. Enjoy a truly eco-friendly and cost-effective way to charge your Vacos Cam.

 

With the 1080p Full HD and the advanced imaging sensor, you can get much more stunning images than any other 2MP or 720p battery-powered security camera.

 

The unrivaled full color night vision technology enables you to see the videos in true colors, making clarity no exception even in complete darkness, instead of black & white. You can see everything extremely clearly and colorfully in low-light conditions just like in daytime.

Note: The Vacos Cam SE supports infrared B&W night vision instead of full color night vision.

 

With 2 advanced motion detection ways — AI human recognition and PIR sensor detection, this battery-operated camera will notify you only when it matters. Nothing can slip through without your notice.

 

The dual motion detection ways reduce false alarms by up to 90%. Never be bothered by birds, dogs, cats or falling leaves.

 

When there is any motion event, the siren will be activated to scare off the intruders day or night. When at night time, the built-in spotlight will also be wakened up to ward off the thieves and help to capture the intruders’ faces clearly.

 

The high-cost & high-quality built-in eMMC storage card, used to save the motion videos, is much more stable than external SD cards. You’ll enjoy extremely fast and smooth read/write speed, almost twice as fast as SD cards.

Enjoy up to 3 months of motion-triggered videos with the high-performance 16 GB eMMC storage card.  

You can also save the motion videos to the cloud for another secure data backup method. Enjoy 90-day free beta cloud storage. 2 video recording ways ensure you can always play back the critical moments anywhere anytime.

Vacos Cam adopts the most advanced chip to lower the stream & bandwidth requirement. You’ll enjoy longer recording time and faster stream speed than other battery powered security cameras.

Note: To express our sincerest gratitude to our backers, we have extended the FREE cloud storage to 90 days! ALL OF YOU can enjoy 90-day FREE cloud storage now!

Note: The Vacos Cam SE version DOESN'T have the eMMC storage card, and ONLY supports cloud storage.

Vacos Cam uses AES-256, HTTPS and other Vacos private and secure encryption to make sure the security camera is hackproof. The data saved on the cloud are secured by our Vacos private protocol and encryption, proving the most secure way to protect your data and privacy.

 

 

The built-in microphone and speaker enable you to get two-way communication with your mobile phone wherever you are. You can talk to the delivery man to confirm your package delivery, communicate with your beloveds, have fun with your pets, or even shout at and deter the intruders.

By linking your Vacos Cam to an Amazon Alexa device, you can use your voice to get live streaming by simply saying, “Hey Alexa, Show the Front Door Camera”, without accessing your smartphone app. Enjoy the easiest access way with Alexa.

 

With the outstanding IP65 waterproof design and the solid housing, you can install the rechargeable battery powered security camera outdoors or indoors without worrying about rain or shine, cold or hot.

 

Dress up your Vacos Cam with the skin for better weatherproof, or for hiding your security camera to make it blend in any environment.

 

 

 

 

Where do we ship?

We ship the products worldwide with FREE shipping.

 

When do we start shipping?

We will start packing and shipping in April 2020 (for Vacos Cam) and in May 2020 (for Vacos Cam SE) once we have manufactured the first batch of the Vacos Cam. We will try our best to ship the product(s) to you ASAP.

 

Is there any additional customs charge?

Normally, there would be no any additional customs charges shipping to you. However, we cannot 100% guarantee the 0 customs fee, and we are not responsible for any extra fee from customs shipping to your countries.

 

Why do you order now?

By backing our project now, you can get up to 45% off the original price. You will get the product(s) earlier than others, and you will be the first to enjoy the most cutting-edge smart home security camera.

 

 

 

Vacos, the subsidiary of ANNKE — world's leading innovator in smart security field,  aims to be the global pioneer and delivers the finest and best security products to customers worldwide. The 2 words “Innovative” and “Customer-Centric” embody Vacos’ core and value.

We have strong R&D team, first-class tech support & after-sales team, as well as the superior marketing team. Vacos team always puts customers in the top 1 priority and spares no efforts to offer the latest and finest smart security solutions for customers to secure their home/business and stay connected with their beloved ones wherever.

Cutting-edge smart security solutions made professional, accessible, simple, affordable & reliable with Vacos.

 

Vacos Cam was born out of the idea of a wine glass.

Our talented designer was inspired by a wine glass, and really obsessed with the streamlined & elegant appearance. Then, we created the Vacos Cam — sleek, simple & beautiful.

The design & functionality that set Vacos Cam apart, like AI human detection, full color night visionelegant style, are now the new standards in the industry.

Vacos Cam changed the way people think about battery powered security cameras. Smart home security solutions now can be chic & fancy. More than just protection, Vacos Cam helps people address any home-related communication or connection needs.

 

All is done! Your Vacos Cam is now ready to meet you!

 

General Inquiry & Tech Support: support@vacos.com

Press Inquiry: pr@vacos.com

story:
Meet myDOQ. The world's first Interchangeable 'hot-swappable' smart plug socket system that revolutionises the outdated plug socket for today's modern lifestyle. Smart, programmable & energy-efficient, myDOQ's front modules are fully interchangeable, simply switch the modules to power and charge your electrical appliances and devices. 

myDOQ was created by a 'device' loving Dad, frustrated by messy cables hanging out of walls and mobile chargers always going missing. Noticing that plug sockets had not really been updated in over 100 years, he did what no one else thought to do - fix the problem.

 


 

Hot-swappable modules. Safe and secure, switch or replace the front modules between sockets easily and within a matter of moments.

 

 

 


We are developing and will be adding more modules to accommodate future appliances and devices as technology advances.

 

 

 

 

 

With two system designs, double In-wall socket or 4-way extension lead, myDOQ is easy and convenient to use whether you are at home or traveling.

 


The myDOQ system can easily be installed. For the 'smart' modules simply replace the existing back box with the mydoq back box (not necessary with myDOQ 'dumb' sockets).  if you don’t want to install the backbox, simply use the 4-way extension lead and use straight out of the box.

 

 

 

 

Set up the myDOQ system to suit your lifestyle needs with multiple combinations. Place myDOQ's 'smart sockets where you need them and then replace your existing sockets with myDOQ's 'dumb' sockets - so all your sockets match and look the same. Or use the 4-Way extension lead while at home or travelling. Sockets for UK and US socket regions.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The myDOQ app allows you to easily program the three ABC preset timer buttons located on the smart modules. For example, you can program A for 30 minutes, B for 2hrs, and C for 8hrs hours, what ever suits your needs. After that, anyone can simply press the button locally on the module to set the timer.

The user can also preset the start and end time of power, for example, as a security lamp to turn on and off at a preset time, or to delay the start of charging to benefit from the off-peak power charges.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Designed for Today’s Smart Homes. myDOQ is compatible with popular home automation systems like Amazon Alexa and Google Home. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

HELP US SPREAD THE WORD!

story:
A Little Bundle is a monthly curated bundle subscription for the design-conscious mom and baby. We specialize in supporting small business brands and creating exclusive designs. Our monthly deliveries are available for newborn to 2-year-olds.




A Little Charity is our way of giving back. 

For every bundle you purchase or gift, we will gift a bundle to a mom and baby in need this holiday season!


To accomplish this, we've partnered with these amazing charities:









Meet the Charities


















FAQ


How will you curate my bundles?

Once you submit your pledge, we’ll email you a form to fill out that will let us know the baby's gender, clothing size and other preferences that will help tailor your bundle.

Does the price include free shipping?

We're based out of Austin, Texas. All bundle orders within the United States are free shipping. All bundle orders shipping to Canada must include an additional $11.00 to their pledge. All bundle orders shipping outside of Canada and the United States must include an additional $20.00 to their pledge.

When will my bundle ship?

All bundles purchased on IndieGoGo will ship on or before December 21st, 2015.

What if I want to buy more than 6 bundles? 

Ah! Thank you SO much! Our pricing for A Little Charity never changes. For every bundle ($49 retail), we'll donate a bundle. Therefore, you can purchase as many bundles as you like, and we'll keep donating.

What if I want to gift each bundle to different recipients?

No problem! We'll send you a form to fill out and you can specify who and where we can send each bundle.

If I purchase a bundle, will they auto-renew?

Nope! All donations and purchases through our IndieGoGo Campaign is a one-time purchase. 

What age groups do you offer your bundles for?

Our bundles are great for Newborn-6 months, 6-12 months, 12-18 months, 2 year olds and 4 year olds! 

Other questions/concerns?

Contact us at give@alittlebundle.com and we’ll get back to you within 48 hours.




A very special thank you to Nathan Wong for filming and editing this awesome video! And thank you to my friends and family for all your continued support!

story:
Take your Twirl gift and Infuse it with a simple message. Words chosen with intention have power. Each gift from TWIRL, allows you a moment to breathe, smile, open your heart to someone else and share your love, joy and connection. What will you create by sharing your thoughts and words? How might they interweave with others'  to create something even more powerful than you can imagine alone?


Help us launch the gift of Twirl

We need your help to make sharing the gift of Twirl a reality. We are working towards a goal of $50,000, with the breakout of how these expenses will be used shown in the chart below.  This will allow us access to the summer gift shows in 2016 with available inventory consisting of pillowcase gifts sets from Peacock Alley, and robes from ContourMD made with fabric from Fabri-Quilt. 

Help us achieve this by selecting one of the available perks. 

Who is TWIRL?

Twirl was founded by Pam F. and Linda P. These beautiful women were drawn together by the teachings of connection and love! Their vision began through Pam's expertise in the gift industry and her work with Creative Candles.  It was there Pam initially developed the idea of TWIRL and found an opportunity to impact the lives of others with the thoughtfulness of gifts.  Linda has run Plaza Wellspring, a center for movement and mind/body connection, since 2005. This role connected her to Pam and allowed her to bring her passion to the work of uplifting others and to the business of Twirl.  Graphic designer, Rachel Eilts, took their passion and created the beautiful expression of TWIRL.

Together, these 3 women are the mind, heart and hands of TWIRL, and their collaboration will bring your loved ones a timeless gift of love.


Our US Manufacturing Partners

  • Peacock Alley (Dallas, TX) This luxurious linen market was so inspired by the concept of TWIRL they are working with us to create a private label of pillow case gift sets.
  • Contour MD (KC, MO) A hometown business is helping us develop a line that includes high end night wear, robes and scrubs, all with positive messages to relax and inspire you. 
  • Fabri-Quilt (KC, MO) A local manufacturing company where we have sourced many of our beautiful fabrics.
  • Stitching Change (KC, MO) is a grassroots project to help refugee women empower themselves. These women are stitching for the TWIRL connect collection and infusing these gifts with meaning. 
  • Amethyst Place (KC, MO) is a home for mothers recovering from addiction.  They are helping TWIRL with some of our projects.


Help us spread the word

Help share Twirl. It  is a priceless gift is to be present for you, and those dear to you. Twirl is a constant reminder of your support, love and well-being. When we focus more on what we appreciate, we experience less stress. When we focus more on love, we feel better. To make this work please help share this concept with your loved ones and friends through your social network. Let love and appreciation flourish.


Challenges 

Finding domestic manufacturing partners who meet the Twirl standards and are willing to work with a startup company has been one of the greatest struggles. 

This challenge has been met thus far through the team's willingness to contact successful industry leaders and ask for their counsel and connections.

Pam's experience as a manufacturer who has worked with private labels  helped give insight to the other side of the relationship and provide strategies for moving forward. In addition the small size of TWIRL allows for flexibility and agility in responding to challenges and opportunities as they arise.

Our US Manufacturing Partners



Peacock Alley (Dallas, TX) This luxurious linen market was so inspired by the concept of TWIRL they are working with us to create a private label of pillow case gift sets.

Contour MD (KC, MO) A hometown business is helping us develop a line that includes high end night wear, robes and scrubs, all with positive messages to relax and inspire you. 

Fabri-Quilt (KC, MO) A local manufacturing company where we have sourced many of our beautiful fabrics.

Stitching Change (KC, MO) is a grassroots project to help refugee women empower themselves. These women are stitching for the TWIRL connect collection and infusing these gifts with meaning. 

Amethyst Place (KC, MO) is a home for mothers recovering from addiction.  They are helping TWIRL with some of our projects.



Help us spread the wordHelp share Twirl. It  is a priceless gift is to be present for you, and those dear to you. Twirl is a constant reminder of your support, love and well-being. When we focus more on what we appreciate, we experience less stress. When we focus more on love, we feel better. To make this work please help share this concept with your loved ones and friends through your social network. Let love and appreciation flourish.

Challenges  Finding domestic manufacturing partners who meet the Twirl standards and are willing to work with a startup company has been one of the greatest struggles. This challenge has been met thus far through the team's willingness to contact successful industry leaders and ask for their counsel and connections.Pam's experience as a manufacturer who has worked with private labels  helped give insight to the other side of the relationship and provide strategies for moving forward. In addition the small size of TWIRL allows for flexibility and agility in responding to challenges and opportunities as they arise.

story:
Create an inspiring studio space and be the envy of your co-workers with Drew lighting up your desk and your imagination. With 2m of cable to play with, what will you do with your Drew? 






Drew is a lamp for everyone to enjoy. From creative professionals, to curious kids, for those wanting to wake up & go to sleep inspired, to those simply looking for a conversation starter.




We’ve spent hours agonising over how to create a seemless transition from stand to lead... in the the end we created a bit of engineered magic.

We've designed a unique way to turn on your Drew, inspired by the beginning of the creative process - picking up a pencil. The twist to turn on functionality and dimmer allows you to twist a little for a subtle light, or twist a lot for a more intense illumination (bright enough to work by).

 





Limited Edition Black Drew 
Exclusive 1-20 numbered Drew. Only available to 20 backers.





We’ve enlisted the help of an award winning industrial design studio to help turn Drew into a premium product, that’s authentic to our original idea and able to be scaled up to large volume production.



We need capital to help pay for manufacturing set up costs and for the minimum quantity orders needed to create Drew. 

By BACKING and SHARING this campaign, you’ll help bring a little more creativity to the desks of the world and hopefully inspire some more lightbulb moments.

 


It’s been an epic journey to get here. We’ve taken the time to SHARPEN and perfect every element so that we could create something truly special. We now have everything lined up and ready to go.

Upon reaching our funding goal, our expert industrial design team at Designworks are ready to move straight into refining Drew with final prototyping and certification and then hit the GO button with their manufacturing team in Shenzhen.

We will then move straight into fulfillment and delivery and again we’ve DRAWN on experience from those in the know.

We have experience previously fulfilling projects outside Indiegogo so we know what a headache it can be for the uninitiated. That’s why we’ve brought in an expert crowdfunding fullfillment house, Floship. 

 



 www.michaelandgeorge.com

Husband & wife team Michael & George launched their debut 'Stationery Objects' product range during the London Design Festival in 2014.

With a whimsical approach to re-imagining everyday objects, the range captured the world's imagination with their products being featured globally by influential publications, blogs, galleries and even the store windows of fashion designer Anya Hindmarsh internationally. The Giant HB Lamp was named as part of Fast Company's The Best Lighting Design Of 2014.

In 2015 Michael & George (and their baby boy Frankie) moved their concept driven studio from East London back to their hometown of Sydney, Australia, where they have since added another baby boy (Quinn) and baby Pencil Lamp (Drew).

story:
Our campaign page has moved to: We moved to: https://www.generosity.com/emergencies-fundraising/hex-house/x/15796688

Introduction

We are Architects For Society, a US based nonprofit [501(c)3] design practice with global outreach and vision. Architects For Society's founders are twelve professionals and academics located in the US, Canada, Spain, Germany, Netherlands, India and Jordan who have come together to serve a common goal. We were all quite privileged to be able to go to the best schools and learn and gain experience designing for high profile clients…

But with this PRIVILEGE came RESPONSIBILITY…

There are many people both in our local communities and in other parts of the world whom, to no fault of their own, lack access to the most basic needs for food, water, and shelter. Whether they’ve built their own homes from repurposed and very humble or limited resources, or were victims of war-torn zones who were forced to flee their habitat altogether, we have found that as professionals, and before all as fellow humans, we have a shared responsibility and duty to fulfill towards the underprivileged. Therefore our mission was clear: to strive to enhance the built environment of disadvantaged communities through innovative architecture and design. We are focused on the needs of 3 main segments of society: informal settlements, refugee settlements, and low income housing.

Problem

With the massive influx of refugees in the last few years, we knew that addressing refugees’ dire need for decent shelter would be a top priority endeavor for us. According to UN Refugee Agency, we are now witnessing the highest levels of displacement on record. An unprecedented 65.3 million people around the world have been forced from home by the end of 2015. Among them are nearly 21.3 million refugees, over half of whom are under the age of 18. To put it in perspective, the tally is greater than the population of the UK- or of Canada, Australia, and New Zealand combined!

After resettlement, many refugees face crowded, noisy, dirty, disease filled grounds where thousands of families are cramped together and surviving one day at a time. Some of the problems encountered with current shelters include:

  • Lack of privacy and space
  • All family members forced to sleep in the same space
  • Leakage of rain water into the housing space
  • Lack of windows and sunlight
  • Overcrowding 
  • Inadequate short term housing
  • Public health and sanitation issues associated with sharing public toilets

Solution

As a team, we decided to develop an effective solution that not only addresses all the problems associated with current shelter structures at refugee camps, but that can also be quickly and easily assembled by the end user with very simple tools and no prior construction experience. Our design, the HEX HOUSE, is a:

  • Dignified home that can serve as both a transitional and permanent shelter.
  • All components are designed to be packed and shipped flat, hence can be rapidly deployed by governments and relief agencies.
  • The Hexagonal shape is more structurally rigid than a square structure therefore eliminating the need for added structural support
  • It incorporates all the typical amenities of a home: private toilet, shower, kitchen, separate sleeping spaces and a living space.
  • Structural Insulated Panel (SIPs) walls, floors & roof panels are durable and insulated therefore provide much needed privacy, and protection from harsh weather conditions
  • The 47 Square Meter (506 Square Feet) units are adaptable and scalable to accommodate larger families, and can be combined into various combinations of clusters to create shared gardens and gathering spaces that promote community engagement
  • Interior finishes can be easily customized, and the home can be easily disassembled, relocated and reused.

Assembly:

  • Concrete pier foundations are dug and poured
  • Height adjustable steel legs are anchored to top of piers
  • Steel or timber beams are anchored to steel plate at the top of legs
  • Structural Insulated Panel or SIP floors are attached to the floor beams
  • SIP exterior and interior walls are then fastened to floor system
  • Interior and exterior finishes can be easily customized
  • Roof sip panels are anchored directly to the exterior walls with no need for added structure
  • A simple steel and timber porch is attached to the front of the home
  • Insulated windows, skylight and doors are installed
  • Finally, an aluminum gutter is attached to the roof panels
  • Radial clusters of five units create shared exterior spaces and amenities
  • The Hex House is designed to be an adaptable, scalable solution which promotes community engagement

The simplicity yet durability of the design, and the fact that the end user can construct the home himself with simple tools and no previous construction experience makes the Hex House a very cost effective solution with tremendous cost savings passed on to homeowners as a result.

Possibilities

Refugee camps were initially designed to be a short term remedy to an emergency situation, but the average stay is now 17 years! Some camps are already evolving into permanent settlements such as UNHCR’s Zaatari camp in Jordan hosting more than 80,000 refugees.

Humanitarian experts are now proposing turning refugee camps into enterprise zones called “refugee cities”, a model that would benefit both the refugee and the host population. Major international financial institutions like the World Bank, have already committed to invest in refugee-inclusive Special Enterprise Zones (SEZs) in Jordan and Ethiopia.


There is a rising awareness that the "top-down" strategies currently dealing with refugee situations are not working and we knew that change was bound to happen. Earlier this year, the UNHCR along with the IKEA Foundation ran the Refugee Challenge for the What Design Can Do conference in Amsterdam. The design competition sought ideas "for accommodating, connecting, integrating and helping the personal development of refugees". We submitted the Hex House design, and it was one of 5 projects shortlisted from over 150 shelter projects.  

The Hex House was also this year’s recipient of the BEST OF BEST Iconic Award for visionary architecture from the German Design Council. Germany has been very welcoming, and in 2015 alone has opened its doors to almost 1 million refugees. They are seeking effective solutions for accommodating displaced families and AFS is there on the ground engaging with NGOs and policymakers to make the Hex House a viable solution.

We have teamed up with two prominent engineering firms, in Frankfurt and Minneapolis to develop the engineering systems for the Hex House and build the prototype in the Spring of 2017. This will help us develop and fine tune our first Hex House for large scale production.

 

Adaptable Solution

The Hex House has a simple yet sophisticated design which makes it a SMART sustainable solution to much more than rapidly deployable refugee shelters. There is a large market for small efficient homes that are affordable and we plan to cater to this market with customizable Hex House kits that can be packed and shipped flat directly to consumers. By partnering with a large scale manufacturer, we will be able to minimize the cost of production and pass those savings on to the end user, who would additionally save on the huge cost of construction by building the Hex House themselves.

 

Media coverage

Ever since we started the Hex House campaign and published the project in design publications, the feedback has been overwhelmingly positive! Every day we receive calls, emails, and inquiries asking about where and when they can buy the hex house. Many were keen to express that it is a much needed solution for housing shortages in many parts of the world. The world is rapidly changing and with that, our needs are changing too. With your help and support, we will be able to develop the Hex House prototype, and make available to society a rapidly deployable, scalable and affordable housing solution that is much needed in today’s world.

See the Hex House Featured on the following publications

Dezeen, Inhabitat, Archinect, Fast Company, Curbed, Design Indaba, Core77, Gizmag, Azure, Design With Benefits and Midwest Home

Perks

story:
Save a Mid-century beach house! And stay there too!

THIS CAMPAIGN HAS ENDED. PLEASE DO NOT MAKE A DONATION. Feel free to contact me directly for more information about this house/project. Thanks, Robert

My name is Robert Leeper, and I am blessed to have been vacationing in Four Mile Village since I was a baby. This unique 1950s vacation beach house development is situated in the Coffeen Nature Preserve and all the homes are set in the natural landscape, providing respite from our modern world, and a strong connection to nature - a place where families and friends can recharge and engage with nature.

"Come Away" is one of the best homes designed by Ed Walline, who designed many of the homes in Four Mile Village, and throughout the panhandle region. Mr Walline built many homes in the area during the 1950s and was honored with a nearby beachfront park named after him.

As times have changed, many new buyers have - understandably - remodeled or even torn down homes designed by Mr. Walline to make newer, more efficient, and larger homes. Sometimes, new owners remove these home from vacation rental programs and the houses become unavailable for the general public - including families who have been retreating there for generations.

The whole point of my campaign is to purchase "Come Away" to:

  • preserve the wonderful, original Ed Walline design,
  • protect the home from either demolition or remodel,
  • keep the home available in a rental program so the general public can enjoy this very special beach house forever - this includes you!  

By making even the smallest donation, you are helping to achieve these goals and protect "Come Away" permanently. And you will get to enjoy staying there!

Here’s what we will need to make this happen : at least $2,500,000.

Currently the home is listed for sale at $2.6M - which seems like a staggering sum - but for this sized home, in this particular development, at this amazing beach - this is actually a fair price. It will only grow in value from this moment on – and be further out of reach. My goal is to make an offer for purchase as soon as possible, and any additional funds will be stored in an account for “Come Away” for any maintenance or repairs.

I personally will not be receiving any money from this project. I will be donating all the post-tax revenue I receive from being the buyer’s agent to this campaign, or to the operating fund I set up after purchase. This project is a labor of love for me. I will be making every action and financial detail available to you, every step of the way. This project will have 100% transparency.

Once we meet our goal, and we make an offer which is accepted, I will establish a “Friends of Ed Walline” non-profit to purchase, manage and care for “Come Away.” By making any contribution, you will automatically become a member of “Friends of Ed Walline.” You may voluntarily withdraw from this group at any time; there will be no obligation at any other time.

If we are unable to purchase the house, all donations will be returned.

By participating – at any level – you will help achieve these goals AND you will be given perks when you reserve your vacation time in this wonderful home – anything from discounted rentals to free stays and an invitation to special events at the home.

Beyond donating yourself, the single biggest way you can help is to share this project to your circle of friends, and get them to join us in saving this important Ed Walline designed home. When we accomplish our goals, you and your friends can stay at “Come Away” and savor the home, the natural setting, and your honoring Ed Walline, as well as Dorothy and John Coffeen.

story:
Hi! We’re Chrome Cherry Design Studio - A Cape Town based design house that strives to make the world a fun and inspiring place.

A lot of our previous work has been focused around toys; particularly toys that engage children with the physical world and encourage creativity and play. We’ve designed and produced various products for CCDS over the last few years and have ample experience in bringing products to market. Most notably of which is the Ybike range of kids ride-on toys.

We posted Nimuno Loops on Indiegogo because we needed a portion of the capital to get the product off the ground. We did most of the product development on our laptops and in a garage. Running and fulfilling this campaign has been a crazy-steep learning curve but we could not have been more thrilled with the results! We successfully shipped and delivered over 40,000 orders and enabled people from 137 countries to build in ways never before possible.  Thank you to everyone who supported this venture and helped bring our tape to life! Now available in a store near you :)

 

 

 

 

LEGO® is a trademark of the LEGO Group, which does not sponsor, authorize or endorse this web site or product.
