Even though our blue planet is 75% covered by water, just 0.003% of it is actually fit for use and human consumption. ¹At the rate we’re going, our planet will run out of water in less than 20 years. ²Getting a handle on our own, individual usage is the first step in being able to understand our options for a more sustainable future. Our hope is that bluebot makes it easier for everyone to understand their usage while mitigating unforeseen, costly water events.More than that, we hope that bluebot will play a role in the movement for better water usage practices by helping bring awareness to the over-usage and the practical areas most properties can conserve, to help water demand from exceeding supply and prevent larger water stress for future generations. Our team is comprised of flow industry experts, a Harvard Law alum, a Yale water scientist, a team of talented engineers and one particularly creative duo. Our balanced team has adopted agile IoT development practices with a focus on Quality, Delivery, People, Innovation, and Customer Support. We believe that excellence in these five areas will result in the best product and the happiest customers.California  ShenzhenFrom left to right: Jack, ZhangJing, Lin, Mr. Xiao, Hezihao, Liguangzhao, Huangjiaming, Zhanwenxiang (not pictured, Tina)Our shared concern with the ambiguity and over-usage of water, one of the most essential resources on the planet, has shaped bluebot into what it is today - far more than just a water meter. Our major goal is to get a bluebot™ on every home. The current priority is to get our app and device out in the field with your help, allowing us to make rapid improvements to our AI engine and coaching. Next, we will share bluebot™ with the world.  Supporting bluebot™ by backing this campaign, or sharing with your family & friends on social media would truly mean the world to us.Our team’s founding members include two ultrasonic flow industry experts with a combined 55 years of flow product development expertise, with special focus on ultrasonic sensor technology and flow calibration.The bluebot™ water flow calibration loop calibrates each device on all commonly used pipe sizes and types found in homes and light commercial (¾” – 2” Copper, PVC, PEX & Galvanized).Our production facility uses dozens of quality control processes throughout each stage of the manufacturing process. Every device receives complete functional and final QC testing before being shipped to you. The primary engineering challenges are long behind us. After nearly four years of product development and iteration, bluebot v8.1 is our most reliable device yet, and ready for the next phase of robust real-world testing.Our main potential source of risk and challenge, like most other innovative IoT products, is the connection. Wi-Fi signal is subject to interference. Wi-Fi signal strength and stability vary greatly from home to home, and from provider to provider. Through our testing, the biggest hurdle for our Alpha group has been finding a reliable Wi-Fi signal. Most users have been able to easily remedy this issue with a simple Wi-Fi extender placed between their main router and their bluebot device.Another potential source of risk and challenge is finding your water line. Though most homes can be traced from the street meter back to the home with ease, some older homes have more complex plumbing systems and for those un-familiar with their home, this may take more than a few minutes.A last challenge we want to outline is that we could experience hardware failures. We are using tried and true ultrasonic flow technology, but in a way that’s never been done before, in a very small package. This means very small parts, which can experience failure from time to time. We have been testing extensively, and will continue to do so, but there could be unusual scenarios that we had not thought of in the real world that could cause the bluebot device to not work as accurately or precisely as we expect it to. We will be actively monitoring these issues and will respond to all feedback from the backer community.One final note that is less of a risk but more of a notice to backers in the Android community: We have not yet developed the Android version of the bluebot app. In the interest of efficiency and integrity, we have spent the past 9 months of R&D on our iOS app, so we can have a full picture of what the Android app should also offer. This has saved our team an exponential amount of time, allowed us to create a more complete vision for both versions of the app, and afforded us the ability to maintain a higher focus on overall performance. Thanks to our wonderful backers, we will be starting our Android app development very soon. Backers should expect the Android app to be released near the end of 2020. Please check back often for updates.   If you have any questions, at any time during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach out to a member of our team at hello@bluebot.com If you’d like to write a story about bluebot, feel free to contact Nicole at nicole@bluebot.com and we would be happy to send along our media kit as well as answer any questions you may have.What’s your water story? We’d love to hear it!  Share on your favorite social media platform using #mywaterstory and tag us @heybluebot    Sources: [1] [2]

story:
CookieNAV* is a small device which is always in your car to help you in the most important moments:

  • Are you looking for a parking spot? CookieNav will help you find it.
  • Did you forget where you had parked your car? CookieNav will lead you to it.
  • Are you driving? CookieNav and its community of users will warn you about troublesome points, such as traffic jams, accidents and speed controls.

*[Patent Pending #P201300086]

Why We Created CookieNAV Device

Righ now, there are 'apps' for SmartPhones that will find you a parking spot and also save the location of your car, but you have to manually launch the 'app' and pin the location on a map each and every time you leave a street parking spot, or car your park. Stopping to lunch an 'app' while you are trying to get to or or from the office or running to catch a plane is a waste of time and very annoying.

So we developed the CookieNAV device that allows the SmartPhone to automatically find you a parking spot and automatically remember the last place you parked your car. The only time you have to launch the 'app' is if and when you need to find a parking spot or to find your car, and never at any other time, as it is all AUTOMATIC!

Our Goal and Benefits When Using CookieNAV

To help you find a parking spot in any city in the world. You will save time and money while contributing to reduce the pollution and traffic jams we suffer every day. We intend to deliver 100.000 devices CookieNav in 2014. Will you help us accomplish this goal?

And don’t worry! CookieNav will help you automatically so that you will not have to do anything!

CookieNAV APP

CookieNav is complemented by a simple application for your Smartphone. Thanks to the clever use of the technology of both devices you will enjoy all the functionalities in A TOTAL AUTOMATIC WAY.

What´s Inside CookieNAV

CookieNAV uses Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy which, due to its low consumption, provides a large autonomy without the need of cables or permanent connection. CookieNav only requires a CR2032 button cell battery. Besides, it contains an accelerometer which allows to automatically detect the vehicle’s movement.

Design & Technical Specifications:

 

How Does COOKIENAV Work?

Stick CookieNav to your vehicle’s dashboard and let it make your life easier.

FIND A PARKING SPOT

Access the application on your Smartphone to indicate you are looking for a parking spot. You will automatically receive geopositioning information about potential free places near you, multiplying like this your probabilities of finding a place to park.

This is how we get the information that will help you to park saving time and money:

When someone gets in his car, CookieNAV connects automatically to your Smartphone through its Bluetooth 4.0 and it informs the system that someone is getting in his car to, probably, leave a free parking place. This information is distributed ANONYMOUSLY between the users who are looking for a spot in the area through the mobile application.

Once the car starts, the accelerometer of the CookieNAV detects movement and notifies the rest of the users (anonymously) that, indeed, the parking spot is free.

With this geolocated information, the application will lead you to that free spot.

The position of free spots will disappear from the system after a few minutes, since we cannot guarantee they will remain free after a certain period of time.

FIND MY CAR

Once you have parked in your destination, CookieNAV will detect you have left your vehicle when the connection between your BlueTooth and your Smartphone is lost, keeping in that moment your car’s GPS position automatically.

Later, if you cannot remember where you parked, you will be able to use the application in order to find your vehicle without having to worry about saving your position previously.

SOCIAL BUTTON

CookieNAV has a button which allows to share with the rest of the users different events you come across with while you are driving. Increasing the number of events will always be decided by the CookieNAV community.

In order to simplify its use, the social button is associated to a unique type of event. As long as you do not change it through the mobile application, you just have to press the button of your CookieNav when you find an event so that its position and category can be distributed to the rest of the users.

Naturally, when you are driving your vehicle the application on your Smartphone will warn you when you are approaching any interest point which had been selected by other users with their social button.

The Project’s Status

The project CookieNAV is on its final phase. You can see on the images of this campaign that we already have several samples and prototypes. We are also completing the IOS application for iPhone that we will soon start to port to the Android platform.

While we finish the development we still have to work on the FCC/CEE certifications, the manufacturing, the product support and complete all the tests in real environments.

Regarding the certification of the product our inmediate plan is to present it to a lab in order to obtain the FCC and the CEE certificates for the USA and the EU respectively. We hope the first part of the certification phase will be completed by the beginning of October, although our previous experience in these projects tells us it is difficult to know precisely the date of the approval’s finalisation. After this, we are going to present the APP to Apple for its approval and subsequently Android’s.

Eventhough CookieNAV is very easy to understand and use, we will create a set of free online tutorials that will show in a visual and clear way how to use CookieNAV correctly in order to make the most of all its potential.

Risk & Challenge

Although the biggest part of the Project is finished we cannot overlook that nowadays there are still some risks we will have to face during the next months.

  • Approvals and certifications: approving and certificating any product involves a high economic investment. Our experience with some of our previous products makes us cautious about deadlines even if it is also true that these products presented a great complexity at many levels. However, given that the components of CookieNav are of great quality and all of them are separately certified, we are optimistic in this regard.
  • Community of users: this is one of the main challenges we must FACE in this project: getting the biggest possible number of users in order to achieve an intensive use of the application with an important number of movements. THE BIGGER THE NUMBER OF USERS, THE BIGGER THE QUANTITY OF INFORMATION AND GREATER POSSIBILITIES TO FIND A PARKING PLACE. That is why we will NOT send the founders’ cookies by order but by users’ volume for city. Thus, once you receive your cookies a high number of users can start IMMEDIATELY to use it with good results. Imagine that the first units were sent to users who are separated by hundreds of kilometres from each other. In that case, during the first days nobody could share their parking spots or any other data related to the social button.

Future Plans

With CookieNAV it is possible to do many more things. If we get to surpass the target we set, with the remaining funding we will try to add two new functionalities related to travelling safety:

  • Panic button: If we press the social button for 2 seconds, we will send a previously written e-mail to any of our contacts already selected in the application’s configuration to warn them about any risky situation we are in as well as our exact location.
  • Collision detection: CookieNAV uses a 3-axis accelerometer capable of detecting if there is a sharp acceleration or deceleration which would allow CookieNAV to inform of a possible accident by sending our location to any of our contacts.

PERKS

FAQ

What is Bluetooth 4.0?

Bluetooth low energy (BLE) branded as Bluetooth SMART since 2011 is a wireless computer network technology which is aimed at novel applications in the healthcare, fitness, security, and home entertainment industries. Compared to "Classic" Bluetooth, BLE is intended to provide considerably reduced power consumption and lower cost, whilst maintaining a similar communication range.

What is an accelerometer?

An accelerometer is an electromechanical device that will measure acceleration forces. These forces may be static or they could be dynamic - caused by moving or vibrating the accelerometer.

What is a CookieNAV Limited Edition?

This is an IndieGogo exclusive. Receive one of our first CookieNAV LE in matt black especially designed for the Indiegogo campaign.

How long will the battery in my CookieNAV last?

Because we are using new Bluetooth Low Energy technology, the battery will last approximately 1 year.

How do I replace the battery in my CookieNAV?

The back of the CookieNAV twists off without the use of any tools, making changing the battery quick and easy.

Do i have to connect my Smartphone to CookieNAV everytime i get in my car?

NO. You only need to start the application on your Smartphone once and from that moment everytime you get in your car CookieNAV will automatically connect without having to do anything on your Smartphone. The sending of your position will always be anonymous without having to do anything with the rest of the users, EVEN IF YOU HAVE YOUR SMARTPHONE IN YOUR POCKET.

What phones and tablets are compatible with CookieNAV?

CookieNAV works with your iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPad 3, iPad 4, iPad Mini, New iPod Touch, Samsung Galaxy S3, Samsung Galaxy S4, Samsung Galaxy Note 2, and other Android Bluetooth 4.0 phones.

How accurate is the position of free places?

The accuracy of GPS data depends on many factors. For example, the quality of the GPS receiver, the position of the GPS satellites at the time the data was recorded, the characteristics of the surroundings (buildings, tree cover, valleys, etc) and even the weather.

Can I use the APP and CookieNav even if there are not enough users in my area sharing parking places?

Of course, although we will send the CookieNAV according to groups of the same city, it is possible that some of them may not have, IN THE BEGINNING, a high number of users sharing parking zones but you will be able to use the functionalities to find your car automatically without having to do anything, as well as all those events from your city or outside being shared by the rest of the users.

Is it possible to use the application on my Smartphone without having the device CookieNAV?

Yes. However, you will not be able to share your parking place automatically with the rest of the users so it would not be fair that you had the same opportunities than those who have a CookieNAV and share their parking places. If you only have the application you will continue receiving the location of other users’ parking places not in real time but with a delay of 30 to 45 seconds.

Is the application free?

Yes. For all the users that have a device CookieNAV.

Is there any kind of monthly or yearly subscription to CookieNAV?

NO. once you receive your CookieNAV you will not have to pay any kind of maintenance fee.

Can i place CookieNAV in any part of my car?

NO. Our recomendation is to place it on the dashboard of your car since it is very important that CookieNAV is located on a surface perfectly stuck to it in order to allow its accelerometer to detect when your car is moving. Imagine you place CookieNAV on the door, every time you open or close it you would be informing the community that your car is moving when it is not.

How will the company be supported in the future if CookNAV is that cheap?

Our goal is to reach to the biggest possible number of users and the best way to do it is by reducing to the maximum the cost of the device. The higher the number of users the easier it will be to find a parking place in big cities and to reduce to the maximum the impact generated by big traffic jams during the morning peak hour in every city around the world.
The funding will be supported by using non-invasive advertisement on the mobile application. Thus, we can offer a great product full of technology at an affordable price.

 

People Who Recommend CookieNAV

From Top Left:

Mr. Alberto Lorenzo, Director of the prestigious forum ‘Motor Web Spain’ and a well respected driving instructor,

underneath there is Mr. Enrique Ramallo, he is responsible for all events at the Ferrari Club of Spain and he also drives in many championship races,

and to the right, Ms. Jen - an enthusiastic advocate of CookieNAV - is pictured with her beautiful red Mustang.

If you are like Ms.Jen, an advocate of CookieNAV, then please send us your picture and we can include it in our collection.  

Shipping

When you pledge, please add 15 Euros to your pledge amount. In case you forget don’t worry, when we send your CookieNAV we will contact you so you can make it in a quick and simple way.

About The Company

CookieNAV Automotive Technologies s.l. is a company with over 10 years of history specialized in IT and electronic security and robotic systems. In this project many friends, companies and experts have collaborated and thanks to their support they have made CookieNAV a reality. You can see the whole team on the section “Team of this campaign” of Indiegogo. Thank you to everyone!

Other Ways You Can Help

You can contribute with us by sharing this information on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest and with the contacts you know that could be interested in this tool.

story:
The Y Chair — Grow with your baby

 

The Y chair is an ultra-modern high chair designed to grow with your child from infancy (6 months) all the way to adulthood. Its revolutionary EZ-Seat technology not only makes the sitting area easy for cleaning, it enables quick adjustment of the seat & footrest to provide a comfortable chair for your child in less than 20 seconds!

How Does It Work?

 

Beyond Junior Y chair comes with a patented EZ-Seat technology not found in any other similar baby high chair. It allows parents to adjust the height of the seat and foot rest at any time by quick release latches. The high chair can be transformed to a toddler’s or a dinning chair for all ages, all within less than 20 seconds! It's economical and instantly provides an extra chair to your home when needed.

 

What Else Comes with Beyond Junior Y Chair?

This sleek high chair, made from top-quality European cultivated beech wood, is both sturdy and eco-friendly, a perfect choice for your family that will last for years to come.

 
Eco-friendly Material: The high-quality European cultivated beech wood is recyclable & biodegradable; the wood has been carefully selected to keep the forests healthy and sustainably productive.


Anti-Microbial Heat Sterilization: The state-of-the art pressure-assisted high-temperature sterilization at 248F on wood material ensures a hygienic environment for your child.


Water-Resistant Soft Cushion: Even with unexpected spills, the cushion will stay dry with a quick wipe.

                                

Other features：

  • Ease of Cleaning: The chair is designed with several easy access points for parents to clean up the food crumbs & mess left on the seat. 
  • Dishwasher-Safe Tray Cover:  The one-hand removable tray cover is dishwasher-friendly, a convenient solution for every busy parent.
  • Dual Restraint System: The restraint system can be adjusted for a 5-point harness or a 3-point harness, keeping your loved one secure and comfortable.

The Problem with Today’s Baby Gear

One of the key problems with today’s baby products is that most of the baby products have a short life span; as soon as the child outgrows its use, the product becomes a useless item, occupying space and often times on its way to a garage sale, craigslist, or trash can. We want parents to be able to use a product that is not only user-friendly and comfortable to the child, but at the same time helps parents saving.
On top of that, many baby products are made of non-eco-friendly material, like plastic or metals. In contrast, the Y chair is made of beech wood, which is biodegradable and recyclable, and also a more durable material – when properly cared for, beech wood furniture can last for several years.

Why Eco-Friendly Matters to Everyone?

For us, the environment matters. When it comes to choosing the material for the baby chair, we select the beech wood that comes from a cultivated forest in Europe. Now what does that mean? It means that our selection of material is a renewable, abundant, and sustainable solution as for every beech tree that is harvested, several trees are planted. Sustainable forestry practices encourage and promote the natural life cycle to preserve our natural resources for future generations and keep our planet green and healthy.

Is It Safe?

Safety is always our top priority and strict measurement guidelines are implemented from creating the design and through all the production phases. The Beyond high chair meets & complies with US ASTM F404-07 standards and contains no harmful substances, such as BPA, phthalate, and PVC.

Color Selection

  • Natural Earth Green

  • Mahogany / Chocolate

Join the  "Y Chair" Club


 

Who’s Behind It?

Beyond Junior Y chair has been designed by a team of skilled engineers who focus on enhancing the quality of life of families by providing practical solutions to daily-life problems involving kids, using their creativity in technology. The founder has been a designer for juvenile products for years and is also the creator for BabyDeck stroller – the stroller that comes with an built-in diaper-changing station, which later won multiple awards in the US and abroad.

 

  

Achievements and Designs

 

Why We Need Your Support?

We are a family company and our mission is to focus on innovative solutions in baby products, in terms of design and functionality.  Our goal is to bring convenient, time-saving and economical solutions to every parent, while maintaining the improtance of keeping the earth safe by designing eco-friendly products.  Your quality of life means success to us.

We rely on bootstrapping to sustain our current company operations. We need you, the people, as our investors to help us drive this product into the market, and make way for our future projects.

abiie official website: www.abiie.com

 

What you can do with a Beyond Junior Y chair?

It is a great gift for baby shower, or for couples who have family plannings in the near future.   You may keep one for yourself and use it as daily dinning room chair.  The chair is so versatile, and stylish, it can fit in your dining room at anytime.  You are then, ever ready for young guests, or guests of any ages as a matter a fact. 

   

Help us fund our project by signing up for one of the perks, or more.
When you sign up for the Early Buyer Special, Double  Y, Family care and Daycare package, we will reserve the Y chair(s) under your name and ship  to the address designated.  If you would like to ship addition Y chair to your friends or family members, we would be happy to do that with a additional shipping fee. 

When you reserve the Y-chairs, please do not forget to indicate the color in the comments section.  If color is not indicated, we will pick one for you.
When you want to send the Y chairs to multiple addresses, please indicate each the additional address, name and phone number in the comment sections.
 
 
If you decided not to get a Y chair but would like to donate, we will place your name on our Recognition Wall on Facebook, and website (with a $10 donation), for one year.
 
When you sign up for the Texas icon baseball cap, we will send you the cap below, in either red or blue trim.  The cap has a Texas logo designed by our founder. 
 
When you sign up for the $60 contribution, you will receive our SNAPLITE for free.  The SNAPLITE is a safety light designed to keep you or your children safe outdoor by making you visible to incoming vehicle.  You can expect everything made by Abiie is versatile and user friendly.  SNAPLITE uses an elastic material to secure on the stroller, bicycle or stroller so that can be easily installed on by a child!  The smooth strap will not damage your gear.
 
If you can't donate, please help spread the word by month and/or by sharing this link via your social media.  We, at Abiie, thank you so much for your support and kindness.   
 
Texas Icon Baseball Caps
 
The logo of these baseball caps was designed by the founder of Abiie in 2002.
It comes in two colors: Blue & Bright Red.
 
 
Snaplite
 
Snaplite™ is designed to keep you and your children safe outdoors by
making you highly visible to incoming vehicles. The patented snap-on
design quickly and easily attaches the safety light to strollers,
infant carriers, ride-on toys, bikes or trailers at any position with
no tools required. The smooth strap ensures your expensive gear
remains scratch-free. Snaplite's innovation is the perfect choice for
protecting your family during evening and outdoor activities.
For more information, visit www.snaponlite.com
story_txt:
The Y Chair — Grow with your baby

 
The Y chair is an ultra-modern high chair designed to grow with your child from infancy (6 months) all the way to adulthood. Its revolutionary EZ-Seat technology not only makes the sitting area easy for cleaning, it enables quick adjustment of the seat & footrest to provide a comfortable chair for your child in less than 20 seconds!
How Does It Work?
 

Beyond Junior Y chair comes with a patented EZ-Seat technology not found in any other similar baby high chair. It allows parents to adjust the height of the seat and foot rest at any time by quick release latches. The high chair can be transformed to a toddler’s or a dinning chair for all ages, all within less than 20 seconds! It's economical and instantly provides an extra chair to your home when needed.

 

What Else Comes with Beyond Junior Y Chair?
This sleek high chair, made from top-quality European cultivated beech wood, is both sturdy and eco-friendly, a perfect choice for your family that will last for years to come.
 Eco-friendly Material: The high-quality European cultivated beech wood is recyclable & biodegradable; the wood has been carefully selected to keep the forests healthy and sustainably productive.
Anti-Microbial Heat Sterilization: The state-of-the art pressure-assisted high-temperature sterilization at 248F on wood material ensures a hygienic environment for your child.
Water-Resistant Soft Cushion: Even with unexpected spills, the cushion will stay dry with a quick wipe.
                                
Other features：


Ease of Cleaning: The chair is designed with several easy access points for parents to clean up the food crumbs & mess left on the seat. 

Dishwasher-Safe Tray Cover:  The one-hand removable tray cover is dishwasher-friendly, a convenient solution for every busy parent.

Dual Restraint System: The restraint system can be adjusted for a 5-point harness or a 3-point harness, keeping your loved one secure and comfortable.
The Problem with Today’s Baby Gear

One of the key problems with today’s baby products is that most of the baby products have a short life span; as soon as the child outgrows its use, the product becomes a useless item, occupying space and often times on its way to a garage sale, craigslist, or trash can. We want parents to be able to use a product that is not only user-friendly and comfortable to the child, but at the same time helps parents saving. On top of that, many baby products are made of non-eco-friendly material, like plastic or metals. In contrast, the Y chair is made of beech wood, which is biodegradable and recyclable, and also a more durable material – when properly cared for, beech wood furniture can last for several years.
Why Eco-Friendly Matters to Everyone?

For us, the environment matters. When it comes to choosing the material for the baby chair, we select the beech wood that comes from a cultivated forest in Europe. Now what does that mean? It means that our selection of material is a renewable, abundant, and sustainable solution as for every beech tree that is harvested, several trees are planted. Sustainable forestry practices encourage and promote the natural life cycle to preserve our natural resources for future generations and keep our planet green and healthy.
Is It Safe?
Safety is always our top priority and strict measurement guidelines are implemented from creating the design and through all the production phases. The Beyond high chair meets & complies with US ASTM F404-07 standards and contains no harmful substances, such as BPA, phthalate, and PVC.

Natural Earth Green


Mahogany / Chocolate

story:
Short Summary

Honeybee Hive is a WiFi router that gives you a full cloud platform for your home or small business. 

Due to its place on your network it can provide unique services such as pro-active security, personal cloud storage available to you anywhere, and a streaming media server available to any connected device. Honeybee would be able to store encrypted copies of your data on other Honeybee devices as close as possible to you. Keeping multiple copies ensures the data won't be lost and the locality means accessing your cloud is faster.

Businesses would be able to develop apps for the Honeybee device and could pay to use storage space on the Honeybee cloud. Locality and replication are important aspects of content delivery networks used by tech companies like Netflix and Google. They distribute copies of their shows or websites as closely as they can to people likely to want those copies. Companies could use their existing analytics about where their viewers live to distribute copies physically close to them.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $600 to develop a physical prototype to show to investors. Having an actual device to show to investors will give us a huge leg up. This prototype will be much more expensive than the actual mass produced device. Once we start production, anyone who invests $100 or more to this campaign will receive Honeybee.

A complete budget and tech specification is available here.

The Impact

The need for cloud computing and storage is skyrocketing. The Honeybee network can solve this.

There are about 53 million WiFi routers in America. If 2% of those routers were Honeybees with a 1TB SSD drive we could provide up to 1 million terabytes of cloud storage. For comparison, the entire internet is estimated at 1.2 million terabytes.

Risks & Challenges

Obviously, the current economic situation makes starting any business risky. The tech industry has shown itself to be more resilient than most industries during recessions though. Tech venture capitalists have also not greatly decreased their investments so far.

The COVID-19 pandemic presents unique challenges due to the instability of the market, but this is an advantage as users cost-cutting their WiFi router rentals will have an option they can trust with the added benefits of the cloud.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate money you can help us in other ways:

  • We need USB thumb drives, networking devices, WiFi USB adapters, or any other computer equipment.
  • We would appreciate social networking or investing leads.
  • Please promote and share our social media

story:
What is Switch Bot?

Switch Bot is a smart IoT robot to mechanically control all your switches and buttons.

We are constantly running from place to place, working to accomplish everything on our never-ending “to-do” list. If you’re a person who is always on the go, convenience can be the biggest lifesaver and an added luxury or reprieve from daily stress. 

Switch Bot is a small, automated device (controlled via app on your Android or iPhone) that turns devices in your home and office on and off. Switch Bot will save you time. You’ll never have to worry about running home to turn the washing machine or dryer off, open the door for your children after school, or make your coffee in the morning. What’s better than having one less thing to do, being able to hit that snooze button on your alarm to get a few extra winks of sleep?

 

30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the Switch Bot community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs Switch Bot!

 

 

 

They Love Us

 

 

 

 

• Convenience at your fingertip: Control all switches wirelessly from anywhere, anytime.

• Install in seconds: Simply tape Switch Bot near your switch with a single strip of 3M VHB tape (supplied). It fits your switch without removing or swapping anything. No tools required.

• Fits all switches: Switch Bot works with just about any rocker switch all over the world thanks to our innovative mechanisms.

• Work with others: Switch Bot can be controlled by other smart devices like Amazon Echo, SmartThings, WeMo sensors and hundreds more. And APIs will be released.

• Affordable: Add IoT (Internet of Things) to any device for $25.

• Long battery life: Powered by a replaceable lithium battery with about 600 days of use.

 

How it works

1. Download the free app (from Apple App Store or Google Play).  

 

2. Attach Switch Bot to any appliance or light switch using 3M mounting tape. (Switch Bot can be removed without damaging the surface of any wall, counter or appliance) **Each Switch Bot includes two pieces of 3M tape with purchase. 

3. Configure your Bluetooth and WiFi.

4. Set preferences and times for your home and appliances.

5. Enjoy hands-free control in your home.

 

Fits all switches/buttons

 

 

Features

Extended battery life  

Powered by a replaceable lithium battery with up to 2 years of use.

The old-fashioned way still works

Switch Bot resides at the side of a switch so you can still turn your switch manually as before. 

Timers

You can set the timers (up to 5 currently and can be extended) inside a Switch Bot as easy as adding an alarm in your smartphone.

Security

You can set a password for your Switch Bot just like setting for your WiFi routers.

Open API

APIs will be released to let DIYers integrate Switch Bot to your own home automation system. Swich Bot and Link are friendly to Ardunio, Raspberry Pi and OpenWRT.

Switch Link & Wireless Connection  

Control the devices and appliance switches in your home wirelessly from anywhere, anytime through the app on your smartphone or smartwatch. Switch Link is the Bluetooth access point which connects Switch Bots to the Internet via WiFi. Switch Link will connect your devices to the app without draining batteries.

Mesh Network  

If you cannot connect to WiFi, Switch Bot can be controlled via Bluetooth. The Bluetooth Mesh Network connects each bot to one another, allowing you to control bots out of Bluetooth range.

If This Then That (IFTTT) Recipes

IFTTT allows users to create recipes which, in turn, create preferences for your home’s Switch Bots. For example: “If I walk into the hallway, then turn on the lights.” or “If my alarm clock rings, then brew coffee.” These recipes can be created in the Switch Bot app. Once made, Switch Bots will complete the task without any prompting.

Benefits

 

- Turn lights on and off from the comfort of your bed  

- Make sure lights are off when you are not home to save electricity.  

- Set your Switch Bot to turn lights on when you are on vacation or to enter a lit house for those nights when you work late.  

- Disabled, elderly people and children can control appliances and switches on and off with ease. The easy plug and play installation enables unparalleled remote control of every household appliance.

 

Rewards

 

Tech Specs

 

Colors

The Switch Bot Journey     

Wonder Tech Lab, the team behind Switch Bot, understands how challenging it can be to control all the devices and appliances in your house. Smart homes and all kinds of IoT devices have been realized, but they are expensive and troublesome! To overcome these challenges, Wonder Tech Lab decided to create Switch Bot, a mini robot, controlled via app (Android and iPhone), that gives you the power to turn small appliances and lights on and off in your home. Switch Bot can be easily mounted to any switch in your home to trigger it on/off using our Bluetooth Mesh Network or WiFi via Switch Link . Switch Bot is eco-friendly, secure, and offers convenience and control over your life from the palm of your hand.

 

 

Mission  

Wonder tech lab is dedicated to design and create the most innovative smart home robots. We pride ourselves in making your life simpler the most affordable way. It's our utmost pleasure to share with you our latest Switch Bot on Indiegogo. Yes, you are just a button away from smart living with the world's smallest remote robot.

 

  

Selected demo videos

1. Install in seconds.

The comparison between installing Switch Bot and replacing with a new remote control switch.

2. Control a wall switch on and off by just one Switch Bot.

A transparent line connecting the robot arm and the white sticker on the switch allows one Switch Bot push and pull the switch itself. This optional accessory (sticker and line) is very easy to install and will be shipped with your Switch Bots for free!

3. SwitchLink UI.

4. Demo of SwitchBot mesh and Alexa/Google Home integration (will be officially released in October)

All rewards claimed shipping before August have been shipped out!
We started shipping in batches since May, 2017. Though many unexpected development and production issues were raised during this period, we are proud to announce that all the parcels have been shipped out. All the orders placed now will be shipped out in one month.

story:
Back to the basic

We're always thinking about basic functions of Towel.

  • How quickly remove the water off the body
  • How quickly dry
  • Never Musty, Antibacterial
  • Durable and long-lasting 

 

And normal and cheap towels won't stay standard quality after washes and the touch is not softer than the beginning. but The One Touch Towel is special. after several washes, the quality and touch is same.  

 

 

Special material for Towel

We designed to knitted special structure fabric by high density microfiber.

  • This fabric has following features : Excellent absorbency, quick dry, antibacterial
  • The high density fabric has these features : Durable and long-lasting
  • Incredible Soft Touch, Modern colors 

 

 

This is science

 

The multiple use

You can use One Touch Towel at home, gym, outdoors and anywhere 

Because of lightweight and compact size.

  • Bath Towel : Bathroom, Beach, Outdoor, Swimming pool
  • Hand Towel : Bathroom, Gym, Outdoor, Swimming pool
  • Sports Towel : Gym, Outdoor

 

Care instruction

Machine wash with cold water. tumble dry possible. do not use iron

 

 

Share our campaign on facebook and instagram

Any backer who shares this project will receive a pair of free SOFF sleeping Socks. So please share this project via facebook and instagram about our campaign. Click the share button at the top of the page!  and then message us to let us know you have shared. we will ship together.

story:
Did you know that most people who want to automate their home start with lighting? 

So why aren’t smart switches and dimmers more affordable, more accessible, and more importantly, why don’t they work better?

We took a look at every smart switch and dimmer on the market, evaluated them, and made sure our products covered more than just the basics, and performed better overall for a better price.  

 

 

 

1. Determine how many rooms you want to make smart.

2. Calculate how many outlets and/or switches you need per room.

3. Click “Back this project”

4. Select the "Choose Your Early Bird + Klever Hub" reward for the best price

5. Add on however many switches and/or outlets you calculated ($49 per additional switch and $35 per additional outlet). 

Don't worry about picking colors just yet. At the end of the campaign, you will receive a survey where you will pick colors and tell us if you want dimmers or switches.

 

 

The Klever Switch & Dimmer allow you to seamlessly transform your entire home into a Klever home within a matter of minutes. No modifications. No neutral wiring. No special bulbs. You’ll be able to control your home’s lighting from anywhere in the world using your phone, smartwatch, tablet, desktop, or laptop as long as you have an internet connection.     

 

 

 

 

 

You’ll be able to control every Klever Switch and Dimmer using the Kleverness app, whether that’s turning the lights on, turning them off, setting a schedule or setting the mood.  

Using the Kleverness app, you can set schedules and manage routines. Make sure your bedroom light turns on at 7:00 A.M. during the week and that the kitchen lights follow shortly after. Give your kids a hard stop with lights off at 9:30 P.M. on school nights and a little later on the weekends. The possibilities are truly endless. Even if your phone isn’t connected, your routines will continue to work. Klever products also have the ability to sync with the sunrise and sunset based on your location.  

 

 

Using geofencing technology, you can turn your lights on and off automatically as you come and go without ever having to take your phone out of your pocket. It’s the perfect way to make sure all of the lights are turned off when you leave, which can save you money in the long run on your energy bills.  

 

With the Klever Switch, you can monitor the energy consumption of each individual switch and learn what you can use less of to save more money on your next energy bill. You can also set up notifications for daily, monthly and yearly energy consumption reports. Got an old bulb that’s drawing a lot of energy? Kleverness will let you know that it’s time to replace it! If you’re really looking to save, you can dim your lights by hand or by phone with the Klever Dimmer to draw less power, extend the bulb life, save energy and save money at the same time.  

Each Klever Switch and Dimmer is a radio frequency repeater, which means that it works in the farthest corners of your house, no matter how far away they are from the hub. No Bluetooth. No WiFi. Just a simple internet connection. Each Switch and Dimmer has a 45-meter radius and each Klever Hub can support up to 512 devices, so you’ll only ever need one.  

 

Klever Switches and Dimmers use AI technology to learn and mimic your schedule while you’re away to make your home appear occupied. You can also set your own custom schedule while you’re away in the Kleverness app. Potential intruders won’t even know you’re gone!  

Kleverness supports unlimited users per household, so everyone can be in charge. Whether you rent out your home on Airbnb, struggle with a roommate who leaves every light on, or have a little one who refuses to turn off the lights, you can easily manage and customize Klever permissions directly from your phone.  

 

Set the sleep function through the Kleverness app so that your Switch and Dimmer’s LED lighting will completely turn off when you’ve been inactive or once your schedule says you’re asleep. Need to get up for a trip to the bathroom or kitchen for a midnight snack? Once you’re near the Switch or Dimmer, the proximity sensor will make the LED lights turn back on for your convenience.

Paired switches (When the same light is controlled by more that one switch). Klever switches are perfectly compatible with this kind of installation and will work seamlessly.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With the Kleverness app, you’ll be able to limit connectivity to your home’s network or enable access from anywhere that there’s WiFi. Your security means the world to us, which is why the Kleverness app will only connect to your Klever Hub using secure, encrypted access.  

 

 

 

 

Whether you’re switching apartments or making the move to a new home, Klever Switches and Dimmers go where you go. Just remove the Klever products you’ve installed, pack them up, put the old switch plates back on, and get moving! Installing and uninstalling our switches and dimmers is easy, intuitive and can be done within a matter of minutes.   

 

 

  

*Additional shipping charges may apply

 

 

 

 

 

That’s us, Dan and Alex, the dynamic duo behind Kleverness, and we’re two extremely ambitious entrepreneurs with a passion for technology and design. For a while now, we’ve been trying to find a home automation lighting system for our own homes that has all of the functionality we’ve been searching for. When we couldn’t find it, we took it upon ourselves to create our own version that provided the same functionality as the competition, without the need for a neutral wire. With the right team in place, we were able to create a design, build an app and put everything in place to automate your home’s lighting easily and efficiently, but now we need your help. From the Kleverness family to yours, we thank you for your support!    

 

We get that not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, but you can always help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of! We can’t thank you enough for checking out Kleverness and helping us make this project a success.
story_txt:
Did you know that most people who want to automate their home start with lighting? So why aren’t smart switches and dimmers more affordable, more accessible, and more importantly, why don’t they work better?We took a look at every smart switch and dimmer on the market, evaluated them, and made sure our products covered more than just the basics, and performed better overall for a better price.     1. Determine how many rooms you want to make smart.2. Calculate how many outlets and/or switches you need per room.3. Click “Back this project”4. Select the "Choose Your Early Bird + Klever Hub" reward for the best price5. Add on however many switches and/or outlets you calculated ($49 per additional switch and $35 per additional outlet). Don't worry about picking colors just yet. At the end of the campaign, you will receive a survey where you will pick colors and tell us if you want dimmers or switches.    The Klever Switch & Dimmer allow you to seamlessly transform your entire home into a Klever home within a matter of minutes. No modifications. No neutral wiring. No special bulbs. You’ll be able to control your home’s lighting from anywhere in the world using your phone, smartwatch, tablet, desktop, or laptop as long as you have an internet connection.          You’ll be able to control every Klever Switch and Dimmer using the Kleverness app, whether that’s turning the lights on, turning them off, setting a schedule or setting the mood.  Using the Kleverness app, you can set schedules and manage routines. Need to get up for a trip to the bathroom or kitchen for a midnight snack? Once you’re near the Switch or Dimmer, the proximity sensor will make the LED lights turn back on for your convenience.Paired switches (When the same light is controlled by more that one switch). Klever switches are perfectly compatible with this kind of installation and will work seamlessly.            With the Kleverness app, you’ll be able to limit connectivity to your home’s network or enable access from anywhere that there’s WiFi. Your security means the world to us, which is why the Kleverness app will only connect to your Klever Hub using secure, encrypted access.       Whether you’re switching apartments or making the move to a new home, Klever Switches and Dimmers go where you go. Just remove the Klever products you’ve installed, pack them up, put the old switch plates back on, and get moving! Installing and uninstalling our switches and dimmers is easy, intuitive and can be done within a matter of minutes.       *Additional shipping charges may apply 
 

 
 
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
 

 

That’s us, Dan and Alex, the dynamic duo behind Kleverness, and we’re two extremely ambitious entrepreneurs with a passion for technology and design. For a while now, we’ve been trying to find a home automation lighting system for our own homes that has all of the functionality we’ve been searching for. When we couldn’t find it, we took it upon ourselves to create our own version that provided the same functionality as the competition, without the need for a neutral wire. With the right team in place, we were able to create a design, build an app and put everything in place to automate your home’s lighting easily and efficiently, but now we need your help. From the Kleverness family to yours, we thank you for your support!    
 

We get that not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, but you can always help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of! We can’t thank you enough for checking out Kleverness and helping us make this project a success.  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Get Your Project Funded Today!

story:
Order Now Directly via our Website https://privacysafe.ai

We are transitioning to a direct sales model, rather than crowdfunding, and you can now order our products directly via our website!

We will honor all orders from this campaign, and will continue to update you about our progress.  Read more below to learn about our products, or check out our latest updates.






✅ Pocket-sized!
✅ Cutting edge features, rock-solid encryption
✅ Free and Open-Source Software and Open Hardware, so it can be completely audited for malicious code.
✅ Your files are encrypted locally, in your home or business, on hardware you can touch.
✅ Tor .onion addressing
✅ Malware protection with real-time virus scan

Back our campaign for early bird prices and discounts on our partners' products.





 

Partnerships

PrivacySafe has worked hard to bring our campaign backers the best possible value for their support.  If you buy either the Maker Edition (Development Kit) or PrivacySafe Vision, you will get discounts from:

  • Wire - secure collaboration and audio/video chat
  • IVPN - top-notch VPN service
  • Mailfence - privacy-respecting e-mail and calendaring with support for encrypted e-mail
  • Lulzbot - the premier Libre Software and Open Hardware 3D printer company.
  • Nitrokey - we're making sure that Nitrokey's USB security tokens work well with PrivacySafe products.
  • Mikroe - Mikroe makes amazing Click™ boards that attach to PrivacySafe hardware.  If you're interested in IoT, smart sensors, and security, you'll want a Click™ board.

story:
The Monkey Grip - Tape, is a 5 Meter / 16.5 Foot roll of Gel Pad Grip Tape designed to be the most reliable, useful and strong tool for sticking items to items. Using our own strong and reliable Gel compound design, combined with it’s unique size, length and thickness, The Monkey Grip Tape is the best Value, Best Quality and Best Overall Solution for all your Gel Pad needs.

 

 

 

 

Monkey Grip Tape is 5m / 16.5 f Long!

 

 

 

Monkey Grip Tape’s unique size means you can measure out and cut lengths of Monkey Grip Gel pad to suit your every need. From Hanging pictures and posters, keeping rugs from moving around, for use as a furniture stop, to everyday Gel Pads uses like organising cables, place items to your walls, sticking your phone or tablet to any surface or just sticking anything to anything else!

 

 

Cut to ANY length you need!

 

 

Easy to Place and Stick! 

Once cut to size, Monkey Grip Tape is easily removable and infinitely washable and reusable! Just make sure to give it a wash each time you remove it from a surface to make it just like new! To remove, simply take one corner and pull away lightly with steady force. This will remove the pad from the wall with no damage! To wash, just run it under warm water and lightly massage the dirt and grime off. Once done, leave it to air dry over the tap or drying rack.

 

 

 

Monkey Grip is Easy Remove!

And with no damage walls and surfaces! 

 

 

Just Wash and Re-Use!

 

 

Monkey Grip Tape = 71 x Standard sized Adhesive Gel / Nano Pads!

One roll of 5 Meter / 16.5 Foot Monkey Grip Gel Pap Grip Tape is the equivalent of approximately 71 Standard sized Gel / Nano Pads!

 

  • The Monkey Grip Tape is a 5 Meter / 16.5 Foot roll of Gel Pad Grip Tape 
  • Is easily cut to any size! Making it the best Gel Pad solution on the market! 
  • It is easily removable and will not damage your walls or surfaces! 
  • Washable and Infinitely reusable! 
  • With a width of 3cm (1.2 Inch) and the ability to be cut to any length, The Monkey Grip Tape is perfect for any job! 
  • One roll is the equivalent of approximately 71 Standard sized Gel / Nano Pads! How is that for value for money! 
  • Can hold items up to 1 KG (2.2 LBS) on smooth surfaces* 
  • Made from our own Monkey Grip Gel Formula and specifications which we believe makes it the best Value, Best Quality and Best Overall Solution for all your Gel Pad needs. 
  • With a 3mm (0.12 Inch) deep core, The Monkey Grip Tape will stick to almost any smooth, clean and non-porous surface and stay there! 
  • Will work in perfectly in a temperature range from -16C (0F) or above 62C (150F) 
  • Non-Toxic, Recyclable and Eco-Friendly - The Monkey Grip Tape is safe and Non-Toxic and when you're done with it, it can easily be recycled

 

Use Monkey Grip as a Furniture Stop!

Organise Your Kitchen Tools! 

 

Hang Paintings and Wall Hangings! 

 

Correct Paintings!

 

Organise Keys!

 

 Organise Remotes and Gadgets!

 

 

Even Organise the Bathroom!

 

 

Fix slipping Rugs! 

 

And Much, Much More! 


 

 

 

 

 

The Monkey Grip Tape measures in 5 Meters / 16.5 Feet, Making it a sizeable and practical length. 

The Monkey Grip tape can hold up to 1 KG / 2.2 LB on any smooth clean surface. But we do recommend that you test the surface and weight of the item before affixing anything heavy to a wall or surface. Like with any adhesive, Monkey Grip cannot bond well with dirt, dust, moisture or porous surfaces. So be sure that the surface and object are clean, non-porous and dirt and dust free for the best results! 

OUR FORMULA:

The Gel formula we have created for Monkey Grip is a unique blend of Polyurethane Elastomer made by a specific reaction between the Prepolymer and Curative. When working with this type of material there are 5 variables that when each react a certain way, create a unique result. This is the reason that Gel products have such a wide range of uses, some are used in Bras and Shoes, they are not sticky at all, but still have a gel consistency. While some gel products have the same consistency while they also hold adhesive properties strong enough to be used in automobile manufacturing. 

The Manufacturing process we use to make the Monkey Grip formula is as follows and some of you may have heard of it before. In it's most basic terminology it can be described as an A / B reaction formula. The Prepolymer material (the 'A') and what is called the Curative (the 'B') come together and depending of the 5 variables, amount of A, amount of B, temperature of mould plate, substrate temperature (the temperature of A and B) and timing of mixture, we can see different results and a vastly different product. The prepolymer consists of an isocyanate (or an NCO) that reacts with the hydroxyl (OH) in the curative, which creates the adhesive qualities depending on the above variables. All the five variables, were tested in over 55 combinations to finally come to the current formula we now use for The Monkey Grip. The Monkey Grip formula takes all these variables into account to create a 'upper middle ground' gel pad. The end result is a Gel Pad that has a strong core, making it durable, while having a high amount of adhesive properties but not so much that will rip paint off or damage walls. By applying particular quantities of the prepolymer and the curative at varying temperatures, we found many different styles of gel pad could be made at various levels of adhesive and so through much testing, we found a result we were happy with.

We are currently working with Patent lawyers to patent our particular formula and manufacturing methods. However, we have found that chemical patents are expensive to process and often times difficult and also expensive to enforce. So we are still looking into channels for a chemical patent, while also looking into other forms of patent such as manufacturing styles. 

Prototypes and Design Process: 

As mentioned above, we use an A/B curing method to create our own formula for Monkey Grip. To create Monkey Grip Tape we cure our A/B formula on large plates, these plates are 5m x 1m. But can be 5m x 2-3m. This means that once our A/B formula has cured and everything has set, Monkey Grip Tape is rolled up into large rolls 1 - 3m long. They are then precision cut to into 3cm widths which make up our Monkey Grip Tape! 

Our very first tests and our very first prototype and manufacturing test was white! The Monkey Grip Tape formula originally performed best when it reacted and cured with a dye that we added to the mix. We later found that this in fact was unreliable and being white, obviously, would lose it's color and get very dirty very quickly. 

After some time, tests, 34 prototypes and a trip to Dongguan, China to meet 'Woods', our Manufacturing Manager at the factory we have partnered with, we came to the realisation that the white style was not suitable. As mentioned earlier. This is when we began testing the 'Clear' style and immediately had better and more reliable results.

Our first 'clear' style formula prototype was a great leap forward. However we did not like the use of the white outer protective sheeting. So we started making our prototypes with a clear removable protective film, as you can see below. 

 

Our second clear prototype was slightly wider than our current 3cm Monkey Grip Tape and measure in at 4cm wide and 4mm thick. We had a great result with this, but it made the roll and tape too bulky. As you can see in the above image! 

As we had now decided on the clear gel formula and it's results we're, overall, much better that the white, the next step was to decide on the exact thickness, width and length of Monkey Grip. While all along we had wanted to create a roll of Gel Adhesive tape, we toyed with the idea of making long strips as well, but this only survived one prototype test as none of us liked it and it was impractical for shipping and storage. 

 

As you can see above, we tested the strips in different sizes and lengths but we decided against this very quickly and went back to the idea of the Roll. 

 

Now that we had decided on the rolls, at 3 cm wide, and 3mm thick, we needed to do some more tests with some more prototypes to discover the perfect length. As pictured above, we toyed with 2.5m (8.2ft), 5m (16.5ft) and 10m (32.8ft) lengths. We found that the 2.5m (8.2ft) length was a little too small for most needs and the 10m (32.8ft) length too long and also too bulky. The 5m (16.5ft) length was by far the most practical in regards to everyday use, storage and shipping. And so after some more testing and some final adjustments to our gel formula, The Monkey Grip Tape was born! 

Above is an example of the Monkey Grip Tape rolls being cut from the longer production rolls. Here, the main roll is rotated while a fast spinning saw blade cuts the rolls into 3cm widths. It is done with machine precision accuracy, leaving a perfect cut each time! 

 

About Us:

Monkey Grip are a small team of designers, ecommerce experts and an old chemical engineer. All from the beautiful cities of Sydney and Perth, Australia! We have all worked on our own projects through our lifetimes but have come together to create something, cool, useful and unique in The Monkey Grip Tape!

 

Want to contact us?

If you have any particular questions, are from the Press or are a retailer or Distributor interested in stocking The Monkey Grip Tape, please contact us! 

Email: contact@monkeygrip.co  (yes that is .CO)

All from the beautiful cities of Sydney and Perth, Australia! We have all worked on our own projects through our lifetimes but have come together to create something, cool, useful and unique in The Monkey Grip Tape! Want to contact us?If you have any particular questions, are from the Press or are a retailer or Distributor interested in stocking The Monkey Grip Tape, please contact us! Email: contact@monkeygrip.co  (yes that is .CO)

story:
Pop Culture Love

Wick-ed Pop Candle Co. combines two of Kristin's loves; candle-making and pop culture.

Kristin has been selling her candles in small batches, but it's time to grow with the holiday season. Your contribution will help Kristin afford the supplies needed to create a larger inventory and make the season a success!

What We Need:

Wick-ed Pop candles are made from a variety of scents. All candles are handmade and homemade, with our own label designs and personal care. With hopes of selling plenty of candles to holiday shoppers, Kristin needs to purchase extra quantities of wax, scents, jars, labels, and more. Your contribution will help with those up front costs.

What You Get:

As a thank you for your contribution, Wick-ed Pop has candles and aromatic tarts for your reward, based on your contribution level.

story:
We all love the feeling of working at a neat and tidy desk.

But as we get on with our day and mess piles up, so does the clutter in our headspace – making it difficult to stay focused.

But it doesn’t have to be that way.

Transform Your Workspace 

Introducing the Orbitkey Desk Mat – a clever solution to organise and optimise your workspace; helping you stay productive and do your best work everyday.

Available in 2 colours (Black and Stone) and 2 sizes (Medium and Large) to suit any style and space.

Press Kit – orbitkey.com/deskmat-press

For Press Enquiries – press@orbitkey.com

 

 

Create a Clutter-Free Zone 

 

The Desk Mat creates visual structure in your work area, helping you organise your work tools in a defined space. By being more intentional with what you keep on your desk, the Desk Mat helps to reduce clutter – allowing you to focus on the task at hand, free of unnecessary distractions.

 

 

Prevent Paper Pile-Up

 

Underneath the top layer is a convenient document hideaway for you to store loose papers and notes so they don’t pile up around you – just like sweeping mess under a rug! Keep them out of sight but easily accessible whenever you need a quick refresher or to jot down notes.

 

 

Your Work Essentials Organised

 

With a dedicated space for stationery and small accessories in the toolbar, you’ll always have quick access to your work essentials, whenever you need them.

 

 

Cables Kept in Place

 

The magnetic cable holder can be moved anywhere along the toolbar to keep your cable in place and always within reach. No more tangles or cables falling off the table!

 

 

Stylish and Functional Work Surface

 

The soft and elegant vegan leather will transform any desk into a warm and comfortable workspace, providing a smooth surface to write on and to use your mouse with ease – suitable for both right and left-handed users.

Feel professional, confident, and in control with a simple addition that can make a huge difference.

 

 

Made to Last 

 

The Orbitkey Desk Mat protects your desk from scratches, stains and spills. The premium vegan leather is exceptionally durable, water-repellent and can be easily wiped clean.

Made to last and ready to take on whatever the day brings, helping you do your best work.

 

The Orbitkey Desk Mat will help you keep your desk tidy throughout the day – so you’re always organised and ready for the next. 

 

 

 

Each Desk Mat comes with 1 magnetic cable holder. Add additional cable holders to manage multiple cables.

Design Process

 

We always try to be conscious of what we’re designing – focusing less on the quantity, and more on the quality of a small, but considered selection of products. Our hearts, minds and even weekends were poured into this new product, and here’s a small lookbook to give you an idea of how we went about designing the Orbitkey Desk Mat.

About Orbitkey 

 

We believe in clever organisation for better living.

Since 2013, we've launched 5 crowdfunding campaigns, with over 39,000 backers, raising over USD 2.65 million.

We love Kickstarter. Not only did you help bring Orbitkey to life, you also allow us to focus on making great products and keep doing the things we love – without the influence of outside investors.

We are a team of 21 passionate individuals based in Melbourne, Australia – driven by design, innovation and clever organisation. This new project is the result of continuous feedback and hard work over the past few months. We hope to have you join us on our journey towards better living.

story:
If you drive a lot for work or have kids and pets, you know how hard it can be to keep the inside of your car clean. Vacuuming the car’s surface, floor, seats as well as interior is essential to keep out the debris, dirt, dust and other particles that can damage the car components in the long run. It is also critical for maintaining a healthier driver and passenger environment especially for those with pulmonary and skin diseases.

Introducing Dokiy, the cordless handheld car vacuum cleaner that comes with 16000PA strong suction, stainless steel & HEPA dual filters and 3 nozzles to have your car, desktop and hard-to-reach corners cleaning covered.

Dokiy handheld vacuum cleaner is small in size, only 11.6”*2.2” (height*diameter) and ultra-light in weight of only 500g / 1.1lb. The compact design, lightweight, cordless design makes it a breeze to pick up and clean immediately. Say goodbye to bulky cleaners.

Dokiy has the greatest power-to-size ratio. Its suction power is anything but little. It offers 2 levels of suction power:

  • Auto Level One 6000PA: is ideal for quick debris cleaning. The battery run time in this level is 38 minutes once you fully charge it.
  • Level Two 16000PA is by day the most powerful on handheld cleaner to cover a wide range of scenarios: no matter pet hair, cat litter, dust particles, crumbs, microparticles, pollen, soot, or even fluid. The battery run time at its full power in this level is 9 minutes once you fully charge it.

This handheld vacuum has a 85,000 RPM brushless digital motor and offers 16,000 Pascals of suction power. With the powerful 120watt motor, Dokiy offers very strong suction for difficult particles in hard-to-reach areas and makes car interior cleaning super easy.

In addition to its compact size that fits just right into your palm, Dokiy has an ergonomic design that offers comfortable anti-slippery grip, making it the handiest vacuum cleaner to date.

To craft the function and design matching product, we have adopted the straightforward duct, letting the air flow pass directly without obstruction so that it makes less noise and offers great suction performance.

Dokiy is built with HEPA filter which is exquisite crafted with long durability and can be washed for much more time than paper filters. The HEPA filtrates fine dust and allergens. It is fairly easy to clean, and you don’t have to frequently purchase replacements.

The HEPA filter is joined by a stainless steel pre-filter for catching larger particles like debris and pet hair. Both of the filters are washable. You may simply take them out and rinse them when it is necessary.

It comes equipped with three different cleaning attachments: a crevice nozzle for narrow gaps, corners and liquids, a brush tool for carpets and upholstery, and a long soft pipe for vacuuming dust particles flexibly. These are extension attachments that our designers came up with aiming to have your various scenarios covered.

Almost every corner of your car can be cleaned effortlessly. Moreover, it helps you clean the dust in sofas, walls, crumbs on desktop, debris at stairs and other hard-to-reach corners with these three attachments.

Dokiy’s detachable dust cup head is good for quick and easy trash dumping, and you’re ready right away to continue the rest of your cleaning. We have designed a tiny slide lock at the side to prevent the cup from falling accidently while the device is working.

The cup is transparent and 100% visible for you to keep an eye on its remaining capacity. Simply pull down to unlock and let the dirt cup bounce up. You’ll never have to worry about dirty hands when taking up the cup.

The powerful and durable motor rotates at a max speed of 85000 PM per/min, reducing the noise level to 75 dB and increasing the suction of the vacuum to 6000 PA. You don’t have to worry about waking up the baby or scaring the dog because of the too noisy motor. Additionally, since Dokiy is equipped with only one button to power on and operate, it is quite intuitive and easy to use. It is just press and play.

The brushless has 3x 2000mAh batteries, providing 2 levels of powers: general suction power at 800 PA and enhanced power at 16,000 PA, making the continuous working time for the levels separately around 38 minutes and 9 minutes, which highly improves efficiency, performs much better and works longer.

Every detail counts. Ranging from the aluminum exterior shell which is solid and durable, to the stainless steel & HEPA dual filters, duct system, replaceable nozzle attachments for different occasions, lockable dust cup, ergonomic design and its extreme power-to-size ratio, we care about how the product looks and how well it serves. And throughout numerous times of testing and experiments, we have proved that Dokiy can work for 20,000 cycles and that means you may use it at least 5 years.

We are a team called Urlife. The core R&D members have served in innovative high tech industries including drones, mobile devices and smart hardware. Most of us are veteran product designers and engineers. We have been working together for more than 5 years and developed many products which have been sold to Europe, the US, Japan, South Korea, Singapore and other countries and regions around the globe. We have also won multiple international design awards including IF, Red Dot, A Design.

story:
A collection of just five knives for every cutting task in the kitchen.

 

 

 

Our imported Japanese VG10 steel (the “G” stands for “Gold Standard”) is comprised of 1% carbon, for edge retention and sharpness, 15% chromium for stain resistance, and 67 layers of damascus cladding.  Each blade is cryogenically treated with subzero liquid nitrogen to reach a Rockwell Hardness (HRC) of 59-60. 

 

 

Introducing the world's first dual-parabolic bolster.  Exponential curves on two axes create an unparalleled comfortable and secure grip.

 

 

Each THRIVE 5 double-bevel knife is sharpened with an extra pass for supreme, instant sharpness out of the box.

 

Inspired by legendary designer, Filippo Perini, each knife is a balance of sleek aesthetic and elevated performance.  Every blade starts with a baseline and a single curve.  Within the fluid curve, every detail adds is added to provide a sense of dynamic motion and ultimately servers to enhance bottom line performance. 

 

 

Each knife is scaled down to wood and steel - a powerful balance between the natural and the industrial.  For enduring performance, each wood handle is infused with resin to increase durability and waterproofing.  The result of this process is called pakkawood.  Each blade uses high carbon stainless Japanese VG10, which is world-renowned for culinary applications.

 

 

 

Unfortunately, many corporations will intentionally sell their knives with a bloated retail markup.  We are proudly offering our full collection at razor thin margins to provide worldwide access to this premium cutting experience.

 

FULL THRIVE 5 COLLECTION

 

Nº1 - GYUTO Chef's Knife 8" - This master knife is perfect for delivering slices, cuts, and dices across all cuisine

Nº2 - BUNKA Agile Knife 7" - This comfortable and balanced knife is both an aesthetic stunner and is uniquely designed to be a new favorite for home chefs

Nº3 - PARING Detailing Knife 4.3" - When details are needed, this knife is your go to.  The blade is designed to both peel and deliver microdetail with a tip perfect for coring and scoring.

Nº4 - NAKIRI Vegetable Cleaver 6" - Vegetables don't stand a chance against the Nakiri.  With a full flat belly, the nakiri is built to chop through cucumbers, onions, carrots, and more.

Nº5 - BREAD Serrated Slicer 9" - If a food has a firm surface like a baguette or tomato, the serrated slicer is your best bet.  Our wave serration allows slices to fall away without tearing the surface.

 

 

 

 

We believe that knives hold a powerful place in millions of lives today. We cook for the ones we love, we prepare nutrition for ourselves and our community, and we seek out tools that allow us the ease and convenience to do so.

 

 

 

 

The first touchpoint of the knife is the handle.  We noticed most knives encourage a hammer grip, which occurs when you have a fully-closed fist and the blade is perpendicular to the arm.  This creates massive wrist strain and user fatigue with time.

We designed the world's first dual-parabolic bolster with a dynamic slope to encourage an ergonomic handshake grip : the hand is naturally closed, with the thumb and forefinger pinching the blade, and the knife is parallel to the arm.

 

 

 

 

The body of the handle is tapered to be thickest at the index finger side of the palm to allow the thumb and forefinger to control the precise motions of the blade, while the hand comfortably and securely grasps the knife handle, reducing tension in the wrist and palmar tendons.  Both the handle and bolster are perfectly symmetrical for both left and right-handed users.

If a tomato oozes every time you cut it, or if bread rips apart when you try to slice it from the loaf, chances are it’s not your knife skills—it’s your knife.

Cheap knives can come with a sharp edge out of the box, but quickly lose their edge due to poor quality steel.  If you are fed up with your current knives, please help us protect the environment by recycling these knives with your local recycling center or scrapyard.  Stainless steel can be melted down and reused for better purposes than gathering dust in cabinets.

 

 

Storebought kitchen knives are wasteful.  On one hand, you have cheap mass-produced knives - made with low quality materials - that become not just useless, but dangerous when they dull quickly.  On the other hand, you have "luxury" knives that sit on bloated, artificial markups that swallow your hard-earned money in the name of outdated branding.  Often, the same company will play both sides.

We think this is wrong.

We demand a better alternative.

 

We believe in:

1.) Materials to endure

2.) Functionality to last

3.) Desire that strengthens with time

 

 

3D Models of an Early Prototype

As of 2015, 25.6% of our landfills were filled with durable goods.  Imagine what that number is today? The EPA defines a durable good as something that is supposed to last for 3 years of use, but because of cheap materials, poor design, and quick manufacturing shortcuts, our "durable" goods are overflowing landfills. 

We believe durable goods should stay durable.  We believe it is companies' responsibility to deliver premium materials, excellent design, and thorough manufacturing.  We believe in our knives.

This is why we are covering each knife for 50 years of service.  Though we cannot claim our knives are indestructible - improper use of anything could destroy it - we believe under daily use, these knives will take care of you for half a century or longer.

As a global community, we literally can no longer afford to throw away the things we use every day.  We believe everyone should have access to well-designed tools that can perform exceptionally for a lifetime.

 

 

Founder Shu Lambert with the THRIVE 5

 

For Thrive Knives, the balance between aesthetic and sustainability is nonnegotiable. We want you to feel proud to own the THRIVE 5 Collection, because when you do, your knives stay out of the landfill, you feel great in the kitchen, and together, the cycle of waste stops.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The number one risk is shipping timeline delays. We have tried to mitigate this by testing 14 different manufacturers to find our artisan partner who has over 20 years of experience and both the quality and quantity capacity for large orders.
