story:
Change the way you experience music...

Sugr Cube brings beauty and convenient wireless audio into your home with an elegant modern minimalist design surrounding a precision engineered audio system professionally tuned to provide an unbelievable immersive music experience in any room.

Sugr Cube is one of the first speakers certified to work with Amazon’s Alexa Voice Service (AVS).* Cube becomes a helpful home assistant to access music, news, control a smart home, order food or get answers to just about any question. Just double tap and ask, Cube has answers. 

Sugr Cube's customized a neodymium full-range driver delivers lush high-frequency sound and it is the first speaker of its kind to use a bass-reflex acoustic chamber and wood housing for booming bass that you can hear and feel.

Intuitive touch and motion controls for playback put the power of music at your fingertips and Sugr Cube has on-board storage, 24 hr battery life and hand-held portability to take your music collection anywhere. 

Designed with powerful connectivity in mind, Sugr Cube is Spotify Connect ready, works seamlessly with Airplay and DLNA and streams virtually any online radio stations. 

Sugr Cube changes everything...connect, control, listen, and enjoy.


What Can Cube Do?

  • Alexa-enabled! Ask Amazon’s powerful cloud based voice service for answers to virtually any question, control smart home features, access Prime music, and much more
  • Play music from Spotify, Pandora, your computer, online radio, and more using high speed Wi-Fi in your home or office
  • Provide immersive sound without interruptions from notifications or calls
  • Stream your music library using Airplay, DLNA or Qplay to any room
  • True stereo sound for better audio distribution when using two Cubes
  • Touch and motion control for easy, intuitive music playback and features
  • Modern minimalist design suits any home or office decor


In the Media

"Sugr Cube does just about everything differently."  FORBES

"The sound quality was nothing short of amazing."  TNW

"Sugr Cube is a music streaming box of tricks."  GIZMAG

"It's definitely one of the best I've tried."  9 TO 5 MAC

Alexa Enabled – You have questions, Cube has answers

What if you could have music, info, and help around the house anytime you wanted?


Just double-tap Sugr Cube to get the top headlines, weather, sports, information and answers to almost any question. Alexa can play music, control smart home features, order a pizza or call an Uber. With Sugr Cube and Alexa, the possibilities are endless.**

Alexa AVS is a cloud based knowledge and skills center that gets smarter the more you use it, learning your speech patterns, vocabulary, and personal preferences. New skills and integrations with other services are being added all the time.

Sugr Cube and Amazon’s powerful Alexa Voice Services put the knowledge of the internet at your fingertips. Cube is always ready to help!

* The Alexa Voice Service is available in the US only.
 Learn more about the Alexa Voice Service on Alexa-enabled
devices here: ALEXA SKILLS
**Sugr Cube Alexa integration is in Beta version now. Full version release is estimated for Sept. 2016. 
Note: Existing Sugr Cube users can enable Alexa AVS on their cube with an app and firmware update. See detailed instructions here: ALEXA UPGRADE


Minimalist Design

Sugr Cube is inspired by the subtle beauty of modern minimalism. Designed without buttons, playback control is achieved with simple touch and motion or by using the app. Unlike other wireless speakers, Sugr Cube is made with real wood that looks natural and feels pleasant to the touch. It delivers your favorite music with perfect sound quality and maximum convenience. 



Sugr Cube is convenient

Sugr Cube is wireless and portable. It streams music directly over the high speed Wi-Fi in your home or office or from its on-board 4G memory. When you are not within arm’s reach of Cube, your smartphone becomes a remote controller. The built-in rechargeable battery lasts for up to 24 hours  of music playback. 


Sugr Cube for a Beautiful Day

A day in the life of Sugr Cube…in the morning, Cube wakes you up with gentle music rather than an annoying alarm. Ask Cube the weather, time, or any other info you need to start your day. Your answers and waiting for you.



Let music get you moving! During breakfast a quick tilt to the left or right selects your favorite online radio station or playlist. At work, simply tap it to pause when you have an important call and tap again to resume playback.

Need an answer to a tricky question? Want to order lunch for the office? Ask away! Cube’s Alexa AVS function will deliver information and convenience to your day.



Say Goodnight with Sugr Cube

At night, Cube offers natural soothing sound to lull you sleep and it fades out automatically using the Sleep Feature. A perfect end to a day filled with music. 



Intuitive Motion Control

Sugr Cube puts music at your fingertips. Accurate motion sensing makes control easy. Simple motions for music playback and to enable Alexa AVS.

    

    


Fast Wi-Fi Streaming

Sugr Cube directly streams premium online music services, internet radio, and local music libraries via Wi-Fi. Unlike Bluetooth systems, Cube works independently from your smartphone so that your music experience is never interrupted by phone calls, texts or notifications.



'


Sugr Cube is Spotify Connect certified and ready giving you access to thousands of songs and stations. Use the Spotify app to connect and control as a remote, your music and playlists are ready to rock! http://spotifygear.com/



AirPlay Compatible

Sugr Cube works seamlessly with Airplay, easily connecting your iPhone®, iPad®, Mac® to stream your music library. Listen to what you want, when you want, from all your Apple devices.



True Stereo

Add a second Sugr Cube to listen in true stereo sound. The sound is amazing and delivers a room-filling audio experience for your music. Sugr Cube supports true stereo and is also 3D stereo compatible. 



Plug some headphones into your computer to hear the stereo sound of Cube demonstrated at the end of the following video...



More Features Make Cube Special...

Pandora Radio

Sugr Cube connects to Pandora Radio directly through the Cube app so your favorite stations and thousands of songs are right at your fingertips.

Online Radio

Sugr Cube includes a built-in radio and supports online radio stations such iTunes music, BBC radio, 8Tracks and Douban FM and many, many more. We're constantly adding new services and recently added a customized radio station feature so you can program your favorites.

DLNA Connect

Android users rejoice! With DLNA support, Sugr Cube can stream your music collection from your Android devices easily and fast.

Qplay

Use Sugr Cube to play music directly from the massive QQ music library.

Multi-Room

Use the app to switch easily between different Cubes in different locations around the home. Your music goes with you.


On-the-Go Music

With up to 24 hour battery life and storage for hundreds of songs, Cube is portable and your music can be too! Transfer your favorite music from iOS, Android, PC and Mac devices to Sugr Cube’s internal 4G memory and take it anywhere your heart desires.



One App to Rule Them All


The Cube app makes Wi-Fi setup and streaming listening easy. It is compatible with iOS & Android and the app is regularly updated to provide new features. Sugr Cube uses OTA Firmware updates so your speaker is future-proof, Your Sugr Cube can always be updated to use our newest features so it can be your favorite speaker for years to come. 


Wood Crafted Beauty

We chose a beautiful wooden housing for Cube that is an integral part of its sound delivery system. It adds to the richness and depth of the Cube audio and lends a modern look to your home. Simple and stylish, Sugr is a natural way to listen to music.



Choice is Beautiful

We selected two beautiful genuine wood veneers so that Cube would fit naturally into your home. Cherry (bottom) and Maple (top). Each one is a natural wood grain that is totally unique and absolutely gorgeous. Additional painted colors are available on our webshop. 



Superior Sound Quality

Sound quality is paramount so Sugr Cube uses a bass-reflex acoustic chamber sealed with 9mm thick MDF board. We custom designed and perfected the vent tube to enhance bass performance in an efficient and natural sounding way. This technology is common in high-end speakers but this is the first time it has been applied to a portable speaker. This is bass that you can see and feel!



We researched and optimized the tuning of Sugr Cube for the most accurate sound that could be achieved. The speaker driver unit is always the soul of a sound system, and we customized a neodymium full-range driver unit to fit the Cube. The excellent frequency response and extremely low THD guarantee the best sound quality in its class. Cube's mid and high range frequencies really sing!



Craftsmanship & Reliability

We insist on quality so Sugr Cube is manufactured by the same company that works for Focal (France), Dali (Denmark) and Klipsch (USA). The quality of wood enclosure and speaker component has been validated by a global market and embraced by our many users.



Technology

Sugr Cube is based on advanced wireless computation architecture. It is a special system customized for audio streaming applications. At Sugr we have developed a proprietary network audio streaming & control stack which achieves a 10x response speed over DLNA and Airplay. We developed the capacitive touch technology for wooden surfaces and we designed algorithms to accurately detect motion with sensors on a highly vibrating object, the speaker itself. This results in amazing touch control ease and ability.




Wi-Fi Speed & Benefits

Sugr Cube uses Wi-Fi rather than Bluetooth to achieve greater speed, performance and connectivity without the interruptions and limitations of Bluetooth. This superior connection means a better listening experience for you. 

Specifications



Beautifully Packaged & Delivered

Our attention to detail extends to every part of our product. Cube is shipped in a beautiful and protective storage box and includes power adapters for any international wall outlet.

Perks


Sugr Worldwide

It has been an exciting few years since the inception of Cube. In that short time, Sugr has made its way around the world and met happy fans and supporters along the way. We thank each and every one of you! 

IFA Berlin

CES (Jan, 2015)


Why are we In-Demand on Indiegogo?

Last year, the Sugr Cube project ended a successful Kickstarter campaign that exceeded our funding goal. The experience and feedback we gained was essential for taking Sugr Cube from the drawing board to the market. Over the last year we have worked with our supporters to constantly improve the Sugr Cube experience.

Now, we are happy to join Indiegogo as part of their In-Demand program to reintroduce Sugr Cube with major improvements such as true stereo capability, Airplay and DLNA, custom radio stations, and better Wi-Fi connectivity achieved through our constant firmware updates and app development.

We hope that you enjoy Cube and take advantage of the new Perks available for new fans and loyal supporters. 


Who are we?

We are a team passionate about making great audio products that fit your home and lifestyle! Cube is our first product and is part of a long term plan to deliver the most exciting range of Internet music devices that take advantage of the latest technologies.  Together we can make the modern music experience better than ever.

Our in-house team is complete with designers, embedded software developers, app & server programmers and hardware product engineers. Our core team members were engineers from the Microsoft Asia Center for Hardware (MACH) in Shenzhen, China. Other team members have backgrounds from Cisco, Tencent, and other top tech makers.



Our Manufacturing Partner

PLACK Audio is a well-respected speaker factory located in Shenzhen, China. They have crafted over 1 million units for worldwide speaker brands such as Dali (Denmark), Klipsch (USA) and Focal (France). Sugr has been working with PLACK since March 2014 to manufacture Cube.


Thank you for your support. Together we share the Power of Music.


Risks and challenges

We are professional hardware & software engineers. The team has previously designed and shipped top tier consumer electronics products to millions of global users. The core team members have experiences at Microsoft and Cisco. We have engineered Cube with DFM (Design for Manufacturing) experts and our product has passed all relevant reliability tests.

We continue to develop a complex software system: firmware, app and Internet services. As our feature set grows, Cube remains upgradable with  app and firmware updates. We will keep developing Cube software and keep updating just like Apple has done to its iOS. Constant improvement and adding more music and voice services is our commitment.


FAQ

How does Sugr Cube work with Alexa Voice Services?

First use the Sugr Cube app to login to your Amazon account (required) and enable Alexa. Then double tap Cube and ask a question. Alexa will answer.

How to control smart home devices with Cube?

Sugr Cube and Alexa can control many compatible smart home devices. See the Alexa-enabled smart devices on Amazon to see if yours are compatible.

Do I need an Amazon account to use Alexa AVS?

Yes, an Amazon account is required. 

I already own a Sugr Cube can I get Alexa Voice Services too?

Yes! Existing Cube users can update the Beta version of Alexa AVS on their app and Firmware. Detailed instructions are here: ALEXA UPGRADE

Does Sugr Cube support stereo pairing?

Yes, with the companion app, two Sugr Cubes can be paired to a stereo set. It rocks!

Does Sugr Cube support 5GHz Wi-Fi?

No. At this time Sugr Cube supports 2.4GHz Wi-Fi only.

Does Sugr Cube have internal or external memory?

There is 4GB built-in memory, it is fixed just like an iPhone. There is no external memory card slot on Sugr Cube.

What is the battery life of Sugr Cube?

Sugr Cube plays up to 24 hours on a single charge when playing music at medium volume. Please note that louder volumes will affect the run time.

Does Sugr Cube still work when it is charging?

Yes, Cube may be used while charging.

Where do you ship to?

Sugr Cube ships worldwide, however some addresses such as PO Boxes and Military addresses are not served by our courier. If you have such as address please contact us for options.

What about VAT and other fees?

VAT, Customs charges and other fees are not included in shipping and are the responsibility of the buyer. Please check your local fees before ordering. 

How long does delivery take?
Most orders dispatch in 2-3 days and shipping typically takes 5-7 business days. Holidays and shipping to rural areas can add to delivery time.
story_txt:
Change the way you experience music...
 
Sugr Cube brings beauty and convenient wireless audio into your home with an elegant modern minimalist design surrounding a precision engineered audio system professionally tuned to provide an unbelievable immersive music experience in any room.

Sugr
Cube is one of the first speakers certified to work with Amazon’s Alexa Voice
Service (AVS).* Cube becomes a helpful home assistant to access music, news,
control a smart home, order food or get answers to just about any question.
Just double tap and ask, Cube has answers. 
Sugr Cube's customized a neodymium full-range driver delivers lush high-frequency sound and it is the first speaker of its kind to use a bass-reflex acoustic chamber and wood housing for booming bass that you can hear and feel.
Intuitive touch and motion controls for playback put the power of music at your fingertips and Sugr Cube has on-board storage, 24 hr battery life and hand-held portability to take your music collection anywhere. 
Designed with powerful connectivity in mind, Sugr Cube is Spotify Connect ready, works seamlessly with Airplay and DLNA and streams virtually any online radio stations. 

Sugr Cube changes everything...connect, control, listen, and enjoy.



What Can Cube Do?


Alexa-enabled! Ask Amazon’s powerful cloud based voice service for answers to virtually any question, control smart home features, access Prime music, and much more

Play music from Spotify,
Pandora, your computer, online radio, and more using high speed Wi-Fi in your home or office


Provide immersive sound without interruptions from notifications or calls


Stream your music library using Airplay, DLNA or Qplay to any room


True stereo sound for better audio distribution when using two Cubes

Touch and motion control for easy, intuitive music playback and features
Modern minimalist design suits any home or office decor




In the Media

"Sugr Cube does just about everything differently."  FORBES



"The sound quality was nothing short of amazing."  TNW



"Sugr Cube is a music streaming box of tricks."  GIZMAG



"It's definitely one of the best I've tried."  9 TO 5 MAC








Alexa Enabled – You
have questions, Cube has answers
What if you could
have music, info, and help around the house anytime you wanted?



Just double-tap
Sugr Cube to get the top headlines, weather, sports, information and answers to
almost any question. Alexa can play music, control smart home features, order a
pizza or call an Uber. With Sugr Cube and Alexa, the possibilities are endless.**
Alexa AVS is a
cloud based knowledge and skills center that gets smarter the more you use it,
learning your speech patterns, vocabulary, and personal preferences. New skills
and integrations with other services are being added all the time. 
Sugr Cube and Amazon’s powerful
Alexa Voice Services put the knowledge of the internet at your fingertips. Cube
is always ready to help!



* The Alexa Voice Service is available in the US only. Learn more about the Alexa Voice Service on Alexa-enableddevices here: ALEXA SKILLS


**Sugr Cube Alexa integration is in Beta version now. Full version release is estimated for Sept. 2016. 

Note: Existing Sugr Cube users can enable Alexa AVS on their cube with an app and firmware update. See detailed instructions here: ALEXA UPGRADE






Minimalist Design
Sugr Cube is inspired by the subtle beauty of modern minimalism. Designed without buttons, playback control is achieved with simple touch and motion or by using the app. Unlike other wireless speakers, Sugr Cube
is made with real wood that looks natural and feels pleasant to the touch. It
delivers your favorite music with perfect sound quality and maximum
convenience. 





Sugr Cube is convenient
Sugr Cube is wireless and portable. It
streams music directly over the high speed Wi-Fi in your home or office or from its on-board 4G memory. When you are not within arm’s
reach of Cube, your smartphone becomes a remote controller. The built-in
rechargeable battery lasts for up to 24 hours  of music playback. 



Sugr Cube for a Beautiful Day
A day in the life of Sugr Cube…in
the morning, Cube wakes you up with gentle music rather than an annoying alarm. Ask Cube the weather, time, or any
other info you need to start your day. Your answers and waiting for you.





Let music get you moving!
During breakfast a quick tilt to the left or right selects your favorite online
radio station or playlist. At work, simply tap it to pause when you have an
important call and tap again to resume playback.

Need an answer to a tricky
question? Want to order lunch for the office? Ask away! Cube’s Alexa AVS
function will deliver information and convenience to your day.





Say Goodnight with Sugr Cube
At night, Cube offers natural
soothing sound to lull you sleep and it fades out automatically using the Sleep
Feature. A perfect end to a day filled with music. 





Intuitive Motion Control

Sugr Cube puts music at your
fingertips. Accurate motion sensing makes control easy. Simple motions for
music playback and to enable Alexa AVS.
    
    




Fast Wi-Fi Streaming

Sugr Cube directly streams
premium online music services, internet radio, and local music libraries via
Wi-Fi. Unlike Bluetooth systems, Cube works independently from your smartphone
so that your music experience is never interrupted by phone calls, texts or
notifications.






'


Sugr Cube is Spotify Connect certified
and ready giving you access to thousands of songs and stations. Use the Spotify app to connect and control as a remote, your music and playlists are
ready to rock! http://spotifygear.com/




AirPlay Compatible
Sugr Cube works seamlessly with Airplay, easily connecting your iPhone®, iPad®, Mac® to stream your music library. Listen to
what you want, when you want, from all your Apple devices.






True Stereo
Add a second Sugr Cube to listen
in true stereo sound. The sound is amazing and delivers a room-filling audio experience for your music. Sugr Cube supports true stereo and is also 3D stereo compatible. 






Plug some headphones into your computer to hear the stereo sound of Cube demonstrated at the end of the following video...



More Features Make Cube Special...
Pandora Radio
Sugr Cube connects to Pandora Radio directly through the Cube app so your favorite stations and thousands of songs are right at your fingertips.
Online Radio
Sugr Cube includes a built-in radio and supports online radio stations such iTunes music, BBC radio, 8Tracks and Douban FM and many, many more. We're constantly adding new services and recently added a customized radio station feature so you can program your favorites.
DLNA Connect
Android users rejoice! With DLNA support, Sugr Cube can stream your music collection from your Android devices easily and fast.
Qplay
Use Sugr Cube to play music directly from the massive QQ music library.
Multi-Room
Use the app to switch easily between different Cubes in different locations around the home. Your music goes with you.



On-the-Go Music
With up to 24 hour battery life and
storage for hundreds of songs, Cube is portable and your music can be too! Transfer your favorite music from iOS, Android, PC and Mac devices to Sugr
Cube’s internal 4G memory and take it anywhere your heart desires.





One App to Rule Them All


The Cube app makes Wi-Fi setup
and streaming listening easy. It is compatible with iOS & Android and the
app is regularly updated to provide new features. Sugr Cube uses OTA Firmware
updates so your speaker is future-proof, Your Sugr Cube can always be updated to use our
newest features so it can be your favorite speaker for years to come. 

Wood Crafted Beauty 
We chose a beautiful wooden
housing for Cube that is an integral part of its sound delivery system. It adds to the richness and depth of the Cube audio and lends a modern look to your home.
Simple and stylish, Sugr is a natural way to listen to music.





Choice is Beautiful
We selected two beautiful
genuine wood veneers so that Cube would fit naturally into your home. Cherry (bottom)
and Maple (top). Each one is a natural wood grain that is totally unique and absolutely gorgeous. Additional painted colors are available on our webshop. 





Superior Sound Quality
Sound quality is paramount so Sugr Cube uses a bass-reflex
acoustic chamber sealed with 9mm thick MDF board. We custom designed and perfected the
vent tube to enhance bass performance in an efficient and natural sounding way.
This technology is common in high-end speakers but this is the first time it has
been applied to a portable speaker. This is bass that you can see and feel!





We researched and optimized the
tuning of Sugr Cube for the most accurate sound that could be achieved. The
speaker driver unit is always the soul of a sound system, and we customized a neodymium
full-range driver unit to fit the Cube. The excellent frequency response and
extremely low THD guarantee the best sound quality in its class. Cube's mid and high range frequencies really sing!





Craftsmanship & Reliability
We insist on quality so Sugr Cube is manufactured by the
same company that works for Focal (France), Dali (Denmark) and Klipsch (USA).
The quality of wood enclosure and speaker component has been validated by a global
market and embraced by our many users.





Technology
Sugr Cube is based on advanced
wireless computation architecture. It is a special system customized for audio
streaming applications. At Sugr we have developed a proprietary network audio
streaming & control stack which achieves a 10x response speed over DLNA and
Airplay. We developed the capacitive touch technology for wooden surfaces and
we designed algorithms to accurately detect motion with sensors on a highly
vibrating object, the speaker itself. This results in amazing touch control ease and ability.







Wi-Fi Speed & Benefits
Sugr Cube uses Wi-Fi rather than
Bluetooth to achieve greater speed, performance and connectivity without the
interruptions and limitations of Bluetooth. This superior connection means a better listening experience for you. 



Specifications



Beautifully Packaged & Delivered

Our attention to detail extends to every part of our product. Cube is shipped in a beautiful and protective storage box and includes power adapters for any international wall outlet.




Perks




Sugr Worldwide
It has been an exciting few
years since the inception of Cube. In that short time, Sugr has made its way
around the world and met happy fans and supporters along the way. We thank each
and every one of you! 
IFA Berlin



CES (Jan, 2015)




Why are we In-Demand on Indiegogo?

ended a successful Kickstarter campaign that exceeded our funding goal. The

Yes, an Amazon account is

story:
The LOGIPLACES story

Can you think of a place you made your mark on with a special moment? Take home a piece of this memory with LOGIPLACES!

LOGIPLACES is a 16 or 36-piece puzzle made of concrete, that enables you to take home a piece of memory you made at any place in the world.

Is there a neighbourhood that means a lot to you?

Get the location of your most memorable moments with LOGIPLACES.

On the picture above: Budapest, Downtown area


Places grow when we fill them with experiences.

This one-of-a-kind tabletop sculpture will help you see the place in a new perspective.


Let go of the noise of everyday life either at home or work, and unleash your imagination while training your mind with a unique puzzle made of concrete.



Why do we need YOU to bring the LOGIPLACES project to life?

Some of you might know already, that we’ve been through a crowdfunding campaign exactly one year ago with our first concrete product, LOGIFACES. During the LOGIFACES campaign, we had amazing backers, and it was great to get so much funding and feedback to realize our dream.

Now we’ve evolved the LOGIFACES brand to LOGIDEEZ, an umbrella brand representing our concrete 3D puzzles, and we would like to be able to start production of LOGIPLACES as well.

Our long-term goal is to be able to provide our customers with any place they would like to see in their homes, but until then, we need to raise initial capital in order to be able to start 3D modeling, 3D printing and creating moulds for more and more places.


LOGIPLACES X LOGIFACES = LOGIDEEZ PUZZLE BUNDLE

Are you interested in both of our 3D concrete puzzles? You're in luck then, because this year, we chose to include both of our products in this campaign. 

LOGIFACES is a set of prisms, each with different top angles, hand-poured from concrete.

There is only one rule to the game: Create a form by playing the prisms next to each other to form a continuous surface! 

LOGIFACES can be arranged in millions of variations, allowing you to find endless patterns in its computer-generated forms.

For more info on LOGIFACES, please visit our website!

So check out our perks and choose one of the two LOGIPLACES X LOGIFACES bundles that's closest to your heart!


A toy you’ll be proud to exhibit


We create our toys for the design enthusiasts, as well as those who love a brain teaser. When you own one of our LOGIDEEZ toys, you don’t have to worry about packing up when you’re done playing.

“We would like to see beautiful, one of a kind architectural concepts in stores more often, especially in the world of games, where it’s rare to see a toy that also reflects on contemporary design.” 

 - Daniel Lakos, co-inventor



State-of-the-art 3D technology enables us to create our moulds to pour concrete.

Mixed with the careful work of our concrete manufactury, LOGIPLACES is a playable landscape on the verge of modern and traditional.


The inspiration to create LOGIPLACES came when working for the What-to-print-in-3D design competition. At this competition, we won our own 3D printer, a Makerbot Replicator 2, what we used to create the samples for the moulds with a 100 micron resolution.


Taking the puzzle experience to a new level with concrete.

Concrete takes the puzzle experience to a new level with its different touch and mass. We pour, grind and polish each piece, utilising our award-winning, many years of experience in the production of design objects.



Display it in your home or office when you’re not playing with it.

Packaging was also important for us to create the best experience, especially because LOGIPLACES is not only a toy, it’s also great for decorating a home or office, when you’re not playing with it. That’s why our box can easily function as a display, highlighting the best qualities of the LOGIPLACES design.




The LOGIPLACES cities & landscapes

What’s your favorite place on Earth?

Right now, we’ve been able to model 4 places to start production with: Grand Canyon, Zermatt in the Alps, Budapest and San Francisco.


Do you want to be part of creating our next models?

We aim to make as many custom-made models as possible with the help of your funding. So we decided that after reaching our goal, we’ll introduce a new place at every additional $5,000 we get.

Each of our backers will have the opportunity after our campaign ends to choose whether you would like to have the core 4 models or one of the new ones.

And you can also help us choose the next models we create! What should we introduce next?

Check out this online poll, where we listed some of our plans for the next few models, and we would like you to vote so we know what to do next!

Please keep in mind that we made suggestions in this poll, because there are some cities that cannot be executed with LOGIPLACES at this point - to our knowledge.



How can you help us in creating LOGIPLACES? Get your own set!

Right now, we have 4 basic cities for our perks you can choose:

But don’t forget that if we reach our goal, we’ll introduce a new location after every $5,000 we’ve raised, and you can choose what we introduce next!

Vote on this online poll to help us choose the next LOGIPLACES location!

Please keep in mind that we made suggestions in this poll, because there are some cities that cannot be executed with LOGIPLACES at this point - to our knowledge.

A short overview of our perks

Please note, that we can only deliver this perk by Christmas if you order on the 14th December the latest!

Please note, that we can only deliver this perk by Christmas if you order on the 14th December the latest!


Why support us?

We are a team of architects, designers and marketers who believe in the power of design when creating games and other objects.

Planbureau Studio has been a great place for us to innovate and create new products, which we believe will gain international recognition by having the greatest friends and supporters around us!

We are passionate about sharing the LOGIDEEZ experience with others. By backing LOGIPLACES, you support the initial production costs to help this design game off the ground.

Our dream is to have a LOGIPLACES version of any place in the world that means a lot to anyone, and we need some initial capital to start modeling the whole world neighbourhood by neighbourhood!

If you do, you’ll be part of the LOGIPLACES team, one of the people, who made our dream happen, and you’ll also be an owner of a beautiful design toy. On our end, we’ll really be grateful and will make sure you’re satisfied with the craftsmanship and quality of your LOGIFACES set and the whole experience of contributing to our dream.


Our sponsors and supporters


Visit us and see more of the LOGIDEEZ games at logideez.com!


Do you have any other questions? Please don't hesitate to contact us at hello@logideez.com!


Disclaimer about our data sources:

We used Aster products as a source for topographic information and Open Street Map for the urban structure data.

Vote on this online poll to help us choose the next LOGIPLACES location!
Please keep in mind that we made suggestions in this poll, because there are some cities that cannot be executed with LOGIPLACES at this point - to our knowledge.
A short overview of our perks




Please note, that we can only deliver this perk by Christmas if you order on the 14th December the latest!



Please note, that we can only deliver this perk by Christmas if you order on the 14th December the latest!










Why support us?
We are a team of architects, designers and marketers who believe in the power of design when creating games and other objects. 



Planbureau Studio has been a great place for us to innovate and create new products, which we believe will gain international recognition by having the greatest friends and supporters around us!
We are passionate about sharing the LOGIDEEZ experience with others. By backing LOGIPLACES, you support the initial production costs to help this design game off the ground.
Our dream is to have a LOGIPLACES version of any place in the world that means a lot to anyone, and we need some initial capital to start modeling the whole world neighbourhood by neighbourhood!
If you do, you’ll be part of the LOGIPLACES team, one of the people, who made our dream happen, and you’ll also be an owner of a beautiful design toy. On our end, we’ll really be grateful and will make sure you’re satisfied with the craftsmanship and quality of your LOGIFACES set and the whole experience of contributing to our dream.





Our sponsors and supporters





Visit us and see more of the LOGIDEEZ games at logideez.com!



Do you have any other questions? Please don't hesitate to contact us at hello@logideez.com!

Disclaimer about our data sources:
We used Aster products as a source for topographic information and Open Street Map for the urban structure data.

story:
The Story of Renewal for Refugees

Six years ago a core of families left their homes and jobs from around the Northeast and moved into an under-resourced neighborhood in Syracuse, NY. They took big risks, but were compelled by wide-eyed hope. Desiring to live a life more rooted in community, they began to explore the needs and abundance in their city. 

As strangers in a new place they began to meet other strangers; strangers with greater needs than our own. They encountered Refugees attempting to resettle in the city from Burma, from the Congo, from Somalia, from Sudan and from Cuba. 

1000+ refugees resettle in the city of Syracuse each year and 12% of the children in our city school district are refugees. 30% of this population lives below the poverty line. ~ Onondaga Citizens League

We've listened to their stories and our hearts were broken open to their struggles. 

Many Refugees struggle to find ways to survive. These struggles are as basic as finding a minimum wage job, learning how to drive, acclimating their children to our foreign school system and most importantly finding faithful friends that will walk the journey with them. 


We've become bonded friends with those struggling to make a new life here. In our work we've discerned the need for a designated space for pressing into this local issue. 

In this space (The Renewal House) we envision 5 initiatives: 
1. Develop ESL opportunities
2. Develop job coaching opportunities
3. Develop adopt a refugee family opportunities 
4. Develop child care/tutoring opportunities
5. Develop organic relationships. 

Our goal is to raise $100,000 which will fully purchase this house and provide renovations to the building. Our partner Salt City Coffee is financing and outfitting the first floor of the building with a quality coffee shop. 

Our Axiom Community (faith-based non-profit) has already raised $35,000. 
We are raising $65,000 via this platform. 

This Renewal House will provide ongoing support for local refugees equipping them and helping them discern next steps toward sustainable roots.

story:
We are solving the problems of most personal and home care products that too often contain questionable ingredients and leave us no choice but to create massive packaging waste.
 

Meet EQUA CARE 
 

 

 

 

 

Most care products only contain 1/10 of active ingredients. All the rest is water that only adds up to the packaging volume and increases the carbon footprint during transport.   

This results in way too many single-use packaging units produced every year leaving massive amounts of waste staying in our landfills for 500 years or more.
 

 
 

With EQUA CARE products, you create 30 times less single-use plastic waste by refilling your dispenser over and over again.  
 

* for 20 used bottles

 

In collaboration with a cosmetic scientist, we developed a line of liquid-free body and home care products. EQUA CARE is refined to its essence and provides you the only 1/10 of active ingredients you actually need.  
 


 

At home, add tap water to the powder formula, give it a good shake, and your liquid soap is ready to use. When it's empty, simply refill your dispenser.
 

 


 

 

Not only sensitive skins deserve to be in contact with the highest quality ingredients. All skins do. Rather than using artificial ingredients, we believe in all-natural premium components and we make sure to source all of our ingredients from thrusted partners, so you know that you are supporting businesses that are doing good. 
 

 

Carefully-sourced ingredients


 

Dispenser made from recycled materials

EQUA CARE dispensers are refillable and designed to last a lifetime. They are made of recycled single-use plastic bottles waste, so no new plastic is being produced in the process.      
 

   
 

30X less plastic waste

Besides receiving a beautiful dispenser, you also get EQUA CARE powder formula doses to refill your dispenser without needing to buy a new product whenever it’s empty. Refill doses come in a minimal packaging that is fully recyclable too.    

 

EQUA CARE has been designed with the full product life-cycle in mind, from the production, transport, user experience, and the impact that it creates once the product is being disposed of.  

 

 

 

THANK YOU

Team work really makes the dream work. This campaign has been in the making for more than a year and I’d wish to credit all people who have been a big part of this journey:

EQUA team: Co-founder Stella Korošec; Project managers Luka Verdnik, Tina Svetek, Maja Repotočnik; Finance Vida Miklavec, Eva Colnarič; Copywriting and concept Marine Rot; Art direction Anja Sečnik; Graphic design Veronika Brezovnik and Petra Ogrin; Marketing and advertising Maja Vejnović; Social media: Katja Grubiša, Tjaša Džafić, Tina Lapajne, Tina Stančič and Alja Perne; Chief business development Helena Felc Žveplan; Support team: Andrea Negoescu, Martina Humar, Simon Jamšek, and Anže Gliha.

Video direction: Luka Stanovnik; DOP: Sašo Stih; Additional video material: Taja Košir Popovič; Photographer: Jaka Birsa.

You guys are the best!

Anže Miklavec, CEO

story:
Protect The Loved Ones with PrePure

PrePure is a smart toilet sterilizer that kills germs quickly and safely with its powerful UV-C light system. This means you could prevent the invisible harmful microorganism in the toilet seat from jeopardizing the health of you and your families.

 

Overview

 

Early Orders Get Early Shipping

To make sure our backers can start using the product as soon as possible, we'll put the orders into production when every 1,000 units are sold on Indiegogo and start shipping right after with the best logistic solutions we can find.

 

You Need to Sterilize The Toilet Seat!

Toilet Seat - The Primary Source of Bowel & Genital Diseases

Our living environment is full of harmful microorganisms, especially places that we get in contact with everyday like the toilets seat are the primary source of germs and viruses. They cause minor or serious diseases to people and jeopardize the health of the ones you love every day.

 

Germs Spread Through Cross-Infection 

Many of the diseases are spread through cross-infection in public places or between family members. Sterilizing the toilet on a daily base helps to prevent all kinds of diseases caused by the toilets directly or indirectly.

 

Say Good-bye To The Old Ways

There are many kinds of sterilization solutions out there, but they are either laborious, ineffective, time-consuming, or damaging to the objects we sterilize. You deserve a better way to keep your toilet germ-free!

 

PrePure  - Born for Toilet Sterilization

Featuring 8 UV-C LEDs for a 360° all-around ultraviolet emission, strong & continuous ultraviolet rays irradiation, and smart detection for human safety, PrePure is the ultimate solution to keep your toilet and personal belongings germ-free!

 

Sterilize over 99% of the Germs in No Time!

Have your toilet seat and inside walls thoroughly sterilized with PrePure. See Test Report down this page.

 

360° All-Around Sterilization

With the built-in 8 UV-C LEDs, each one emitting 120° powerful ultraviolet, PrePure carries out a 360° all-around sterilization to eliminate the germs in every corner of the toilet.

P.S. UV-C LEDs will be turned off with an open lid, the above image is for demonstration only.

 

Smart Detection for Human Safety

Strong ultraviolet rays could be harmful to human bodies. Directly looking at the ultraviolet rays or have it emitted to the skin could bring irreversible harm to the eyes and body.

Bearing the safety-first principle in mind, the PrePure is designed to keep users safe, regardless of gender and age.

 

Auto On/Off When Closing/Opening The Toilet Lid

PrePure would automatically turn on the ultraviolet when the toilet lid is laid down and turn off when the toilet lid is opened up to make sure the ultraviolet rays do not get in contact with humans.

 

Auto Cut-out When Detached from the Base

Every now and then people may uninstall the sterilizer for charging or travel. To prevent accidental harm to anyone, there's no way users can turn on the UV-C LEDs when the sterilizer is detached from the base. 

 

Easy to Install and Carry

Easy Installation

PrePure comes with two types of base: Adhesive Mounting Base for home and Suction Cup Base for travel. After attaching the base to the toilet lid, simply slide the sterilizer down to install it to the base and up to uninstall it from the base.

 

SafeGuard Companion On-the-go

With the size of a mobile phone, PrePure is super portable. Have the PrePure installed at your home or carry it with you to work or travel to keep yourself and the ones you care about away from the germs in the toilet wherever you go.

 

Keep Everything Germ-Free

Working with PrePure's foldable disinfection box, PrePure Smart UV-C Sterilizer can sterilize pretty much all your daily gadgets, accessories, and belongings.

 

PrePure v.s. Other Sterilizer

A Better UV Sterilizer in Every Way

 

 

Test Report

In The Box

 

Specs

 

Disclaimer

PrePure does its job to sterilize the designated enclosed spaces of a certain size, but this does not mean that it can 100% guarantee to prevent its users from getting diseases or illnesses caused by harmful microorganisms due to the various scenarios our users may come into contact with the harmful microorganisms.

Users should know that ultraviolet rays could harm human bodies and should not look directly at the ultraviolet rays or have the ultraviolet rays irradiated onto the skins under any conditions. Besides, the sterilizer should not be put inside the water. The consequences of the abnormal uses of the product are sole of the users' responsibilities.

If you are uncertain about how to use the product properly, please contact us at any time for help. We'd be happy to assist in any way we can.

 

Production

By the end of April 2020, we have finished three pilot runs and one massive production, along with several sterilization performance tests & reports from including SGS, CGMT, and more. It is now ready for official massive production.

 

Meet The Team

PrePure is designed in California, USA. Its mission is to help people stay healthy from the invisible enemies that reside in our living environment. Our team consists of RedDot & iF Design Award winners, medical Ph.D.s, experienced engineers, and more. We are committed to producing products that help to create a germ-free living environment for everyone. We also partner with manufacturers who serve Xiaomi and other big brands to make sure we deliver the best quality possible to our customers.

 

Timeline

Our team consists of RedDot & iF Design Award winners, medical Ph.D.s, experienced engineers, and more. We are committed to producing products that help to create a germ-free living environment for everyone. We also partner with manufacturers who serve Xiaomi and other big brands to make sure we deliver the best quality possible to our customers. Timeline

story:
Thanks to our Indiegogo backers for supporting us. You will receive your rewards shortly.

 

 


Did you know that most deodorants are not recyclable? Close to 4 billion plastic tubes end up in our oceans, rivers and landfills every year. With so few alternatives, we’re taking matters into our own hands.
 


Wellow comes in an easy to use push-up tube made of 95% recycled paper. Just compost or recycle it when you’re done. Plus, our super effective formula is cruelty-free and uses no aluminum, parabens or toxins. Each stick is hand poured with natural ingredients proven to last longer, glide on easier, and keep you feeling fresh and confident. 
 


Working from home this year? There's never been a more convenient time to try a new deodorant. What do you have to lose? It's time to unclog those pores...

 


Wellow neutralises odors without clogging your pores or changing your body’s natural performance. It is 100% biodegradable, creating no waste and leaving no trace. It’s also aluminum free, chemical-free and plastic-free.
 


While many deodorants contain up to 80% water, our super concentrated and long lasting formula lets us do more with less packaging. The less we produce, the less energy we use during shipping (which is carbon-neutral, by the way). 
 


 

Being mindful of our planet should be as easy as reimagining the things we use every day and designing them for a lower impact. 

With 4 billion plastic deodorant tubes wasted every year and “big plastic” companies delaying action, something has to change.

From production to delivery, we’ve set out to fix this problem by creating eco-friendly solutions that actually work. With your support, we’re developing a full line of personal care products to help keep you, and our oceans, odor-free.
 

Our formula also contains small amounts of Triethyl Citrate, Tocopherol, Soybean Oil, plus our top secret scent blends (we think you'll love them).
 


 

To say thanks for being an early supporter, we’re giving you up to 35% off retail value. Plus, we're including free mystery items in some of our packs so you can try upcoming Wellow releases before anybody else.

Don't forget: everything comes with carbon neutral shipping and sustainable paper packaging, so shop guilt-free. 

 

Wellow will be produced in North America and shipped (carbon neutral) all over the world. We've partnered with a collective of designers, manufacturers and fulfillment centers to reduce our environmental impact and make sustainable living easy and affordable for you.
 


Did you know that almost 15 billion armpits haven’t heard of Wellow? Click a button below to let them know about our mission and this Kickstarter project.

story:
Scroll down to see brands we work with - it's over 50!

 

 

 

Our competitors send your home videos to the unencrypted cloud, charge
you high fees, and put your privacy at risk.

 

 

Use much cheaper IP cameras OR use better cameras
for customization. Camect also works with existing Nest, Arlo,
and other big-brand systems.

 

 

Seriously, way too many options to list here. Camect works with
over 50 camera brands. See our FAQ here for details.

 

 

 

Camect supports about 24M of total camera resolution (e.g. 12 1080p cameras) of average scene complexity. See our FAQ here for brands Camect works with.

 

Camect adapts alerts based on advanced algorithms and your direct feedback. No more annoying, unneeded alerts – just incredibly accurate ones.

 

As Camect records, it applies video analysis to identify motion, a deep learning AI model to identify what’s moving, and your feedback to determine what’s interesting to you. This ensures it delivers the exact alerts you’re looking for.

Camect gets smarter when users choose to share feedback on videos. Providing video examples helps it learn, making it more accurate over time.

 

 

We weren’t kidding about being the best on the market.

Camect can detect almost 20 more objects than the next most-advanced option, and we’re adding more all the time.

 

 

Plug & play setup automatically finds most cameras that
are connected to your network.

 

Start recording. Start saving. Have peace of mind.

 

COMPARE SUBSCRIPTION FEES:

*An average home system uses 5 cameras. Camect supports about 24M of total camera resolution (e.g. 12 1080p cameras) of average scene complexity.

 

 

 

Create the perfect, secure smart home system with Alexa and
Google Home integrations. Dropbox and Google Drive cloud backup
available at the click of a button.

 

Access and control your system from anywhere. Get real-time,
relevant smart alerts at home or on the go.

 

 

 

Adding additional cameras with your current brands can be incredibly expensive. Camect works with almost any camera brand, helping you reduce costs.
Build the system you want.

COMPARE COSTS PER CAMERA:

* Shown for price comparison only. Not compatible with Camect

 

SAVE $368-$1880 FOR 1 YEAR OF SERVICELearn More

SAVE $578-$7930 FOR 5 YEAR OF SERVICELearn More

You want the quick summary? Deal.
Click the button below to expand and learn more.

Learn More

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Camect’s exterior might be sleek and small, but it houses big, sophisticated technology that makes all the difference in home security.

 

 

 

 

“We believe that the best way for us to keep your video
data private is for us not to see it at all.”

That’s the first line of our privacy policy -- and the reason that Camect was born.

We remember the days when tech companies grew by creating cloud-based services that actually need to be in the cloud. We were part of that, and collectively have about 25 years experience building popular and useful cloud-based services such as Google’s flagship search engine.

Nowadays, unfortunately, the cloud often does not make services much better. You, the consumer, are often the real cloud product, and your service is paid for by a loss of control over your data. You may have no practical alternative, but at least it’s free and convenient.

Over lunch one day in 2016, our founders, Chao Liu and Arup Mukherjee, observed that cloud-based cameras offer even less. In exchange for ease of use and analysis of your video, you give up your privacy, get locked into an ecosystem of limited camera choices, risk owning a paperweight if your cloud service is discontinued, and get charged an arm and a leg for the privilege.

As camera enthusiasts and computer scientists, Arup and Chao knew that everything offered by the cloud camera giants could be done locally, and decided to build themselves the system they would have liked to buy. That system managed data locally but preserved cloud-like convenience, and a lot of work went into making sure it produced alerts that were actually usable. It turned out to be the system that several friends wanted too, and the rest, as they say, is history.

Three years and many improvements later, we have decided to share Camect with the world. We believe it’s smarter than the alternatives, just as convenient, maintains your ownership of your data, and happens to cost much less. It also learns from your feedback, and gets smarter for everyone -- without compromising privacy -- the more feedback it gets.

We would be honored to have you join us in the quest for the best home security camera system out there!

 

 

 

 

We ship worldwide. See reward details for shipping costs.
Prices exclude any local duties or sales tax.

(Shipping destinations have temporarily been restricted as of May 2020. Please contact us if you're from a location to which we're not shipping.) 

 

We plan to start shipping Batch 1 in December 2019. Batch 2 orders will begin shipping in January. Your shipping date is specified on the perk you purchase. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary.

 

Back Camect now, and we'll send you regular production updates to keep you in the know about all significant achievements or changes.

 

Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend, family member, or coworker who needs Camect!

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the smarter your Camect device will become. Together, we can continue to offer the smartest, most private, camera management software ever created.

We can't do this without you.

 

 

 

 

Not sure if your cameras work with Camect? Check here.
story_txt:
Scroll down to see brands we work with - it's over 50!   Our competitors send your home videos to the unencrypted cloud, chargeyou high fees, and put your privacy at risk.  Use much cheaper IP cameras OR use better camerasfor customization. Camect also works with existing Nest, Arlo,and other big-brand systems.  Seriously, way too many options to list here. Camect works withover 50 camera brands. See our FAQ here for details.   Camect supports about 24M of total camera resolution (e.g. 12 1080p cameras) of average scene complexity. See our FAQ here for brands Camect works with. Camect adapts alerts based on advanced algorithms and your direct feedback. No more annoying, unneeded alerts – just incredibly accurate ones. As Camect records, it applies video analysis to identify motion, a deep learning AI model to identify what’s moving, and your feedback to determine what’s interesting to you. This ensures it delivers the exact alerts you’re looking for.Camect gets smarter when users choose to share feedback on videos. Providing video examples helps it learn, making it more accurate over time.  We weren’t kidding about being the best on the market.Camect can detect almost 20 more objects than the next most-advanced option, and we’re adding more all the time.  Plug & play setup automatically finds most cameras thatare connected to your network. Start recording. Start saving. Have peace of mind. COMPARE SUBSCRIPTION FEES:*An average home system uses 5 cameras. Camect supports about 24M of total camera resolution (e.g. 12 1080p cameras) of average scene complexity.   Create the perfect, secure smart home system with Alexa andGoogle Home integrations. Dropbox and Google Drive cloud backupavailable at the click of a button. Access and control your system from anywhere. Get real-time,relevant smart alerts at home or on the go.   Adding additional cameras with your current brands can be incredibly expensive. Camect works with almost any camera brand, helping you reduce costs.Build the system you want.COMPARE COSTS PER CAMERA:* Shown for price comparison only. Not compatible with Camect SAVE $368-$1880 FOR 1 YEAR OF SERVICELearn MoreSAVE $578-$7930 FOR 5 YEAR OF SERVICELearn MoreYou want the quick summary? Deal.Click the button below to expand and learn more.Learn More
       Camect’s exterior might be sleek and small, but it houses big, sophisticated technology that makes all the difference in home security.    “We believe that the best way for us to keep your videodata private is for us not to see it at all.”That’s the first line of our privacy policy -- and the reason that Camect was born.We remember the days when tech companies grew by creating cloud-based services that actually need to be in the cloud. We were part of that, and collectively have about 25 years experience building popular and useful cloud-based services such as Google’s flagship search engine.Nowadays, unfortunately, the cloud often does not make services much better. You, the consumer, are often the real cloud product, and your service is paid for by a loss of control over your data. You may have no practical alternative, but at least it’s free and convenient.Over lunch one day in 2016, our founders, Chao Liu and Arup Mukherjee, observed that cloud-based cameras offer even less. In exchange for ease of use and analysis of your video, you give up your privacy, get locked into an ecosystem of limited camera choices, risk owning a paperweight if your cloud service is discontinued, and get charged an arm and a leg for the privilege.As camera enthusiasts and computer scientists, Arup and Chao knew that everything offered by the cloud camera giants could be done locally, and decided to build themselves the system they would have liked to buy. That system managed data locally but preserved cloud-like convenience, and a lot of work went into making sure it produced alerts that were actually usable. It turned out to be the system that several friends wanted too, and the rest, as they say, is history.Three years and many improvements later, we have decided to share Camect with the world. We believe it’s smarter than the alternatives, just as convenient, maintains your ownership of your data, and happens to cost much less. It also learns from your feedback, and gets smarter for everyone -- without compromising privacy -- the more feedback it gets.We would be honored to have you join us in the quest for the best home security camera system out there!    We ship worldwide. See reward details for shipping costs.Prices exclude any local duties or sales tax.(Shipping destinations have temporarily been restricted as of May 2020. Please contact us if you're from a location to which we're not shipping.)  We plan to start shipping Batch 1 in December 2019. Batch 2 orders will begin shipping in January. story:
What?

If you have ever watched an action movie it's likely that you've seen a lock being picked, and I'll bet that secretly, you've always wanted to try it.  I mean, lets admit it...lock picking is a pretty cool skill to have, the ultimate party trick, and  it's very useful when you've lost the key to your padlock!

Wouldn't it be great if you could have a set of lock picks on you all of the time? Well now you can with the highly affordable SonOfStephen metal lock pick card. 

Each SonOfStephen metal lock pick card features a set of 6 snap out lock picking tools, and 3 snap out tension wrenches. The set includes a Half Diamond, Hook, Snake Rake, Double Round,, L Rake, and my favourite - the Bogota! The cards measure 54mm x 86mm which is the same size as a standard credit card - perfect for storing in your wallet. They're made from 0.5mm thick hard rolled Stainless Steel, and whilst they are thin, they are also incredibly strong, making them perfect for picking locks!

P.S. All of the picks can be put onto a key chain after you've snapped them loose.

How?

The cards are manufactured using a process called photo chemical etching. This method of manufacturing ensures incredible cutting/etching accuracy, and beautifully clean burr free edges. The cards will be manufactured in the UK, and everything is set and ready to go...all i need is the funding.

Why?

They're cool,they're useful, they're portable, they're inexpensive, they're great fun to use, and they are great to give as a gift. Try picking a lock when you're next stuck in traffic...it really does help you pass the time!

When?

Provided everything goes according to plan and I receive the required funding, you should receive your metal lock pick card very promptly. Most likely in November 2013.

The Funding

When I made this video I thought I needed at least £5000 to get this project up and running. However, due to some good old negotiation with my supplier, I'm able to get these picks to market with just £1000. I need this money to place quite a large order with the manufacturers so that I can bring the retail price down to an affordable  level.

General Info

Speed Lock picking is a genuine sport that is enjoyed by people all over the world, so why not give it a go and see if its something that you enjoy doing.

These lock pick cards fit perfectly into birthday cards and guarantee a smile every time. So if you want to give a little gift without breaking the bank balance, why not try giving one of these!

Do they work?

Yes they do. At the start of the video you will see a lock being picked with the Son of Stephen L-Rake lock pick :)

Thanks

I'm really excited to get going with this Kickstarter campaign, and I'm hoping that you are excited too.

Thank you so much for your time and help :)

Luke

story:
Short Summary

My name is Devin.  I am a designer and I rent an apartment in Brooklyn.  I love Brooklyn but it is very expensive.  If I lived in a really inspiring amazing Penthouse like this I think it would benefit humanity as a whole.  Unfortunately it costs 19 Million Dollars.  Indiegogo will only allow me to ask for 5 million so if you would like to contribute more please contact me directly!  Apparently Jim Carrey wants to buy it.  So let's move quickly and snatch it up from underneath him!

If you want to see more photos of the apartment you will be buing for me please check these links:

http://www.nytimes.com/2009/08/09/realestate/09deal1.html

http://inthralld.com/2012/06/19-million-clocktower-penthouse-in-brooklyn-new-york/

Of course there are a number of great perks for helping buy me this apartment you can read about below-

story:
Now find us at  www.SpongeBath.com

 

  • Kills >99.9% of bacteria in sponges
  • Eliminates odors
  • Cleans and freshens
  • Removes grease and mold stains
  • Removes soap scum

 

 

 

We created the first Active Cleaning Sponge Holder, designed to fit in both modern and classic homes. SpongeBath doesn't just store sponges, it cleans and sanitizes them, by continuously bathing them in a powerful concentrated cleaner.

 

Germs grow rapidly within sponges, doubling every 20 minutes, which can lead to billions of bacteria within 24-hours. Dirty sponges can contain up to 54 billion germs per square inch, that's over 5.5 trillion bacteria living in your Kitchen Sponge, that can make you and your family sick.

36 = Fail  Bio-contamination Meter used by Health Departments 

 

SpongeBath patented “paddle action” technology creates suction that infuses the sponge with our natural cleaning solution that actually kills >99.9% of germs and cleans the sponge between uses.

 

The numbers don’t lie. SpongeBath attacks even the dirtiest sponge, and eliminates 99.9% of smelly odor-causing bacteria. It’s even been tested at a top Independent GLP Laboratory.

 

 

Find out why on-air expert Dr. Keri Peterson endorses SpongeBath.

 

 

 

 

Other cited methods of cleaning sponges don’t solve the problem. They are ineffective, impractical and inconvenient. They only offer “periodic one-time cleaning" and is only a temporary fix – and all other sponge holders are dirty. SpongeBath provides continuous cleaning (like barbicide for combs & brushes) so you always have a fresh clean sponge.

 

Sponges are Amazing, But there's a Problem. Did you know that the kitchen sponge is the dirtiest item in your home? The micro-crevices inside a sponge make it highly absorbent and a very effective cleaning device, but they also make sponges an ideal environment and incubators for germs to grow. A smelly sponge means it’s a very dirty sponge because what you are actually smelling is odor-causing bacteria!  Sponges pick up dirt and germs every time you use them. If you're not cleaning your sponge after every use, then you are using a dirty sponge.

 

 

SpongeBath is made with only premium components. We selected the highest grade stainless steel and plastic resins for superior quality and durability to last for years and years.  

 

We traveled around the country to find the best materials and are proud that SpongeBath is sourced, manufactured and assembled in the United States. SpongeBath products support small businesses and bring jobs to local communities. 

 

Our mission is to make homes safer and cleaner by helping to reduce food-borne illnesses at home and in the workplace. We want to help improve peoples lives by using safe cleaning ingredients,

 

Our team is a blend of successful people who have all come together because they believe in SpongeBath and its mission. Each and everyone one of us contributes to the project, and without them we couldn't have made this happen. Each core member individually has a special skillset, like product development, legal, operations, accounting, marketing but we come together as a team to make great products, give customers wonderful care, and do it all here in the USA.  

Matthew invented, patented and developed SpongeBath along with co-founder Tod Maitland.

Prior to founding SpongeBath LLC, Matthew was a professional cameraman, filmmaker and still photographer for over 18 years, with over 55 Film and television credits, commercials, music videos that include Emmy nominated shows "Sex and the City" (Entire HBO series and both films), and Showtime’s "The Big C, Rounders, Boiler Room, 16 Blocks", Producer and DP - documentary "Finish Line: The Rise and Demise of Off-Track Betting".

He is also the creator of "Moving Portraits," an iPhone app, and the Founder of Visseon Inc. a film equipment rental company. Matthew has a life-long passion for science, technology and design and for creating elegant solutions to solve everyday problems.

Matthew has a Bachelors of Fine Arts in Film and Photography from Syracuse University. 

 

 

We are grateful for your contribution and support of our campaign. Thank you for becoming a part of this amazing journey!

 

Remember to SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN with your friends and family and visit us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.
