story:
Bad things love to collect inside our pillows and sheets...

Bad things love to collect inside our pillows and sheets in the form of Dead Skin Cells, Oils, Sweat, Mold, Yeast, and Bacteria. Dirty bedding can cause Acne, Diarrhea, Asthma, and Bronchitis. By the way, when was the last time you washed your pillow? If you have never washed your pillow, you may want to consider throwing it away and getting a new one.

SilverBorn pillows and sheets resist 99.9% bacteria, odors, and stains to stay clean and fresh longer.

As featured on

Introducing SilverBorn, the first silver-infused bedding to use hypoallergenic, naturally-sourced corn fiber for sheets and pillows that are smoother and more durable than anything you’ve seen before. Our smooth sateen weave makes a fabric that is cool, breathable, and luxuriously soft for year round comfort.

Corn Fiber Tested Significantly Better Than Soy & Bamboo

Although soy and bamboo fibers are made from renewable resources, they are out performed by fabrics from corn fiber for: Washing Shrinkage, After Wash appearance, Drying Time, Pilling, Wicking, and Flammability.

Pillows

A Better Pillow for a More Restful Night’s Sleep - The medium-density SilverBorn pillow helps back sleepers, side sleepers, and everyone in between enjoy a restful night’s sleep. Made with SilverBorn fabric, they contain 100% corn fiber for a superior fill power. That’s another way of saying they hold their shape longer than most pillows you can find in stores.

The Pillow You Sleep On

You use your pillow for over 2500 hours every year.  Sleeping on the wrong pillow can be harmful to your health and productivity. Have you ever woken from a deep sleep feeling sweaty, tense, or oppressed by the odors on your pillow? You're not alone. 

We designed the medium-density SilverBorn pillow with 100% corn fiber fill to fix all the problems we had with pillows previously:

  • Down Pillows are magnets for mold and bacteria because the feathers absorb moisture. Most people sweat about one liter of fluid at night. Feathers are known to aggravate allergies. 
  • Polyester Pillows feel rigid and inflexible. They don't contour to support your head and neck while you sleep. Low-quality fibers wear unevenly and get lumpy, sometimes within 6 months of use.
  • Memory Foam Pillows are not breathable and don't provide cool temperature regulation throughout the night. They off-gas formaldehyde slowly over time and can create a chemical odor. Plus, it's a petroleum product that contributes to our fossil fuel dependency. 

What the Experts Say About SilverBorn Pillows

Naturally-sourced and durable, the corn fiber fill inside SilverBorn pillows is hypo-allergenic, resists the buildup of odors and bacteria, and does not require washing. Independent tests by the Société Générale de Surveillance/U.S. Testing concluded that corn fiber offers “outstanding” fill power even after three years of continuous use. The silver-infused fabric blocks the spread of harmful bacteria on the surface of the pillow. The fluffy fill contours to the shape of your head and neck to provide all-night comfort. 

Sheets & Pillowcases

Sheets and Pillowcases to Keep You Cool and Comfortable All Night Long!

Are Your Sheets Cotton, Polyester, or Bamboo? It May Be Time To Upgrade

  • Cotton absorbs odors faster and needs to be washed frequently--and washing causes the fabric to shrink.
  • Polyester and nylon manufacturing produces approximately 80% more greenhouse gases than corn fiber. Plus, polyester and nylon attract gross body odors and musty smells. 
  • Soy and bamboo fabrics often lose their beautiful texture to pilling, wicking, and shrinkage in the wash. Our corn fiber blend outperformed soy and bamboo in all the following categories: Washing Shrinkage, After Wash Appearance, Drying Time, Pilling, Wicking, Flammability.

What the Experts Say About SilverBorn Sheets

The corn fiber we use has been given a Class 1 Comfort Rating by Hohenstein Institute, a world-renowned test laboratory. The bacteria-fighting silver in our sheets has been tested with the highest antimicrobial standards--AATCC 100. 3rd party lab tests show a 99.9% reduction in bacteria on the fabric even after 100 vigorous washings. The result is effectiveness that will last the lifetime of the product.

 

How It's Made

The fiber we use is made from abundant, locally available, and sustainable sources. Our fiber is primarily sourced from corn but any plant with a high sugar content can produce the same fiber. Other plant sources of our fiber include cassava, sugarcane, and beets. Sugars are transformed and processed into pellets. We extrude fiber from these pellets and weave it into fabric.

We infuse the fabric with silver during the manufacturing process. Unlike other silver embedded fabric, the silver we use does not chemically react with the fabric and is evenly spread across the entire fabric surface. It doesn't change the nature, color, feel, or any other properties of the fabulously soft corn fiber. 

The next-generation silver polymer technology we use is durable and approved by US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) and International Oeko-Tex associations. 

Years from now, when your SilverBorn sheets and pillows reach the end of their usefulness to you, they can safely be composted. Our corn fiber fabric and fill will go back to the earth to help feed the next generation. 

Testimonials

Measurements

Rewards

US shipping is FREE. For international shipping, please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable to your region. If you have questions on the rewards or shipping, please contact us at hello@sattvas.com. 

Colors

We have 3 colors available: Light Gray, White and Dark Gray.

Our Vision 

With SilverBorn, we want to give you a guilt-free way to enjoy the cleanest sheets while spending as little time as possible doing laundry.

Adding silver to block 99.9% of harmful bacteria wasn't enough. SilverBorn creator Sri Lueth set out to improve the existing fabrics we sleep on. With the superior durability and softness of corn fiber and the antimicrobial properties of silver, Sri had found the winning combination.

Meet the Team

 

Sattvas, LLC, was founded by Sri and James Lueth. Their twin girls were born in 2014 and Sri was concerned that their sheets and pillows would need constant cleaning to stay fresh and tidy. Children often enjoy putting fabric in their mouths, creating a moist, ideal environment for bacteria. Sri and James wanted to find bedding and pillows that would do a better job staying clean between washings. Sattvas, LLC, was founded with this goal in mind. Sri came up with SilverBorn as a soft and safe fabric that anyone could use to keep their sleeping area cleaner and more restful.

James Lueth Born and raised in South Dakota, James is a QA Engineer, Manager, and UAT Coordinator in Software Services. He’s our finance, communications, and quality control expert. James sleeps on a prototype SilverBorn pillowcase and was quite reluctant to share it when we needed to take photos for the campaign.

Sri Lueth Sri has worked as a consultant across Healthcare, Manufacturing, eCommerce, Consumer Durables, and Banking Industries. She was born and raised in India and now lives in Minnesota. Sri is the creator of SilverBorn.

Hari Vittaldevara Born and raised in India, Hari is an ERP Architect in the Healthcare Industry. An Angel investor for small to medium businesses, Hari is an aspiring entrepreneur. The amazing qualities of SilverBorn bedding drew him to the project, where he assists with product development and marketing strategies. He also serves as a pivotal tie-breaker when Sri and James do not agree.

Please contact us at hello@sattvas.com with any questions. 

Access our PRESS KIT here. 

Timeline 

  • March 2017 - Sateen Fabric Samples Produced 
  • April 2017 - Pillow Fabric with Green Leaf Print Arrives in MN Warehouse 
  • May 2017 - Prototypes Developed 
  • June-September 2017 - User Testing 
  • September 2017 - Sateen Fabric Manufacture Start 
  • October 2017 - Kickstarter Campaign Launch 
  • December 2017 - Indiegogo Campaign Launch
  • December 2017 - Pillows Manufacture Complete
  • February 2018 - Sateen Fabric Manufacture Complete 
  • March 2018 - Pillows, Sheets, and Pillowcases Shipped

Risks and challenges

We’ve taken necessary steps to ensure efficient and timely delivery of the highest quality rewards. With backgrounds in e-commerce, business analysis, and quality assurance, we believe our project will exceed your expectations. The SilverBorn fabric with the printed leaf is already manufactured and in the MN warehouse. The sateen fabric in white and grey is under production as we speak.

Despite our expertise and careful planning, there are always challenges with any creative and manufacturing process. For example, high demand could lead to more orders than we initially planned for. We have good relationships with our suppliers and manufacturers. We will be working closely with our manufacturing partners to ensure the highest quality standards for our backers and on-time deliveries. We will also work on-site with them as needed. Quality is a priority for us. Production will occur as fast as possible; however, we will always hold our manufacturers to the highest quality standards.

Throughout the production process, we will keep our backers informed. If we encounter setbacks that affect our timeline, we will maintain transparency through backer updates.
story_txt:
Bad things love to collect inside our pillows and sheets...Bad things love to collect inside our pillows and sheets in the form of Dead Skin Cells, Oils, Sweat, Mold, Yeast, and Bacteria. Dirty bedding can cause Acne, Diarrhea, Asthma, and Bronchitis. By the way, when was the last time you washed your pillow? If you have never washed your pillow, you may want to consider throwing it away and getting a new one.SilverBorn pillows and sheets resist 99.9% bacteria, odors, and stains to stay clean and fresh longer.As featured onIntroducing SilverBorn, the first silver-infused bedding to use hypoallergenic, naturally-sourced corn fiber for sheets and pillows that are smoother and more durable than anything you’ve seen before. Our smooth sateen weave makes a fabric that is cool, breathable, and luxuriously soft for year round comfort.Corn Fiber Tested Significantly Better Than Soy & BambooAlthough soy and bamboo fibers are made from renewable resources, they are out performed by fabrics from corn fiber for: Washing Shrinkage, After Wash appearance, Drying Time, Pilling, Wicking, and Flammability.PillowsA Better Pillow for a More Restful Night’s Sleep - The medium-density SilverBorn pillow helps back sleepers, side sleepers, and everyone in between enjoy a restful night’s sleep. Made with SilverBorn fabric, they contain 100% corn fiber for a superior fill power. That’s another way of saying they hold their shape longer than most pillows you can find in stores.The Pillow You Sleep OnYou use your pillow for over 2500 hours every year.  Sleeping on the wrong pillow can be harmful to your health and productivity. Have you ever woken from a deep sleep feeling sweaty, tense, or oppressed by the odors on your pillow? You're not alone. We designed the medium-density SilverBorn pillow with 100% corn fiber fill to fix all the problems we had with pillows previously:

Down Pillows are magnets for mold and bacteria because the feathers absorb moisture. Most people sweat about one liter of fluid at night. Feathers are known to aggravate allergies. 

Polyester Pillows feel rigid and inflexible. They don't contour to support your head and neck while you sleep. Low-quality fibers wear unevenly and get lumpy, sometimes within 6 months of use.

Memory Foam Pillows are not breathable and don't provide cool temperature regulation throughout the night. They off-gas formaldehyde slowly over time and can create a chemical odor. Plus, it's a petroleum product that contributes to our fossil fuel dependency. 
What the Experts Say About SilverBorn PillowsNaturally-sourced and durable, the corn fiber fill inside SilverBorn pillows is hypo-allergenic, resists the buildup of odors and bacteria, and does not require washing. Independent tests by the Société Générale de Surveillance/U.S. Testing concluded that corn fiber offers “outstanding” fill power even after three years of continuous use. The silver-infused fabric blocks the spread of harmful bacteria on the surface of the pillow. The fluffy fill contours to the shape of your head and neck to provide all-night comfort. Sheets & PillowcasesSheets and Pillowcases to Keep You Cool and Comfortable All Night Long!Are Your Sheets Cotton, Polyester, or Bamboo? It May Be Time To Upgrade

Cotton absorbs odors faster and needs to be washed frequently--and washing causes the fabric to shrink.

Polyester and nylon manufacturing produces approximately 80% more greenhouse gases than corn fiber. Plus, polyester and nylon attract gross body odors and musty smells. 

Soy and bamboo fabrics often lose their beautiful texture to pilling, wicking, and shrinkage in the wash. Our corn fiber blend outperformed soy and bamboo in all the following categories: Washing Shrinkage, After Wash Appearance, Drying Time, Pilling, Wicking, Flammability.
What the Experts Say About SilverBorn SheetsThe corn fiber we use has been given a Class 1 Comfort Rating by Hohenstein Institute, a world-renowned test laboratory. The bacteria-fighting silver in our sheets has been tested with the highest antimicrobial standards--AATCC 100. 3rd party lab tests show a 99.9% reduction in bacteria on the fabric even after 100 vigorous washings. The result is effectiveness that will last the lifetime of the product. How It's MadeThe fiber we use is made from abundant, locally available, and sustainable sources. Our fiber is primarily sourced from corn but any plant with a high sugar content can produce the same fiber. Other plant sources of our fiber include cassava, sugarcane, and beets. Sugars are transformed and processed into pellets. We extrude fiber from these pellets and weave it into fabric.We infuse the fabric with silver during the manufacturing process. Unlike other silver embedded fabric, the silver we use does not chemically react with the fabric and is evenly spread across the entire fabric surface. It doesn't change the nature, color, feel, or any other properties of the fabulously soft corn fiber. The next-generation silver polymer technology we use is durable and approved by US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) and International Oeko-Tex associations. Years from now, when your SilverBorn sheets and pillows reach the end of their usefulness to you, they can safely be composted. Our corn fiber fabric and fill will go back to the earth to help feed the next generation. TestimonialsMeasurementsRewardsUS shipping is FREE. For international shipping, please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable to your region. If you have questions on the rewards or shipping, please contact us at hello@sattvas.com. ColorsWe have 3 colors available: Light Gray, White and Dark Gray.Our Vision With SilverBorn, we want to give you a guilt-free way to enjoy the cleanest sheets while spending as little time as possible doing laundry.Adding silver to block 99.9% of harmful bacteria wasn't enough. SilverBorn creator Sri Lueth set out to improve the existing fabrics we sleep on. With the superior durability and softness of corn fiber and the antimicrobial properties of silver, Sri had found the winning combination.Meet the Team Sattvas, LLC, was founded by Sri and James Lueth. Their twin girls were born in 2014 and Sri was concerned that their sheets and pillows would need constant cleaning to stay fresh and tidy. Children often enjoy putting fabric in their mouths, creating a moist, ideal environment for bacteria. Sri and James wanted to find bedding and pillows that would do a better job staying clean between washings. Sattvas, LLC, was founded with this goal in mind. Sri came up with SilverBorn as a soft and safe fabric that anyone could use to keep their sleeping area cleaner and more restful.James Lueth Born and raised in South Dakota, James is a QA Engineer, Manager, and UAT Coordinator in Software Services. He’s our finance, communications, and quality control expert. James sleeps on a prototype SilverBorn pillowcase and was quite reluctant to share it when we needed to take photos for the campaign.Sri Lueth Sri has worked as a consultant across Healthcare, Manufacturing, eCommerce, Consumer Durables, and Banking Industries. She was born and raised in India and now lives in Minnesota. Sri is the creator of SilverBorn.Hari Vittaldevara Born and raised in India, Hari is an ERP Architect in the Healthcare Industry. An Angel investor for small to medium businesses, Hari is an aspiring entrepreneur. The amazing qualities of SilverBorn bedding drew him to the project, where he assists with product development and marketing strategies. He also serves as a pivotal tie-breaker when Sri and James do not agree.Please contact us at hello@sattvas.com with any questions. Access our PRESS KIT here. Timeline 
March 2017 - Sateen Fabric Samples Produced 
April 2017 - Pillow Fabric with Green Leaf Print Arrives in MN Warehouse 
May 2017 - Prototypes Developed 
June-September 2017 - User Testing 
September 2017 - Sateen Fabric Manufacture Start 
October 2017 - Kickstarter Campaign Launch 
December 2017 - Indiegogo Campaign Launch
December 2017 - Pillows Manufacture Complete
February 2018 - Sateen Fabric Manufacture Complete 
March 2018 - Pillows, Sheets, and Pillowcases Shipped
Risks and challengesWe’ve taken necessary steps to ensure efficient and timely delivery of the highest quality rewards. With backgrounds in e-commerce, business analysis, and quality assurance, we believe our project will exceed your expectations. The SilverBorn fabric with the printed leaf is already manufactured and in the MN warehouse. The sateen fabric in white and grey is under production as we speak.Despite our expertise and careful planning, there are always challenges with any creative and manufacturing process. For example, high demand could lead to more orders than we initially planned for. We have good relationships with our suppliers and manufacturers. We will be working closely with our manufacturing partners to ensure the highest quality standards for our backers and on-time deliveries. We will also work on-site with them as needed. Quality is a priority for us. Production will occur as fast as possible; however, we will always hold our manufacturers to the highest quality standards.Throughout the production process, we will keep our backers informed. If we encounter setbacks that affect our timeline, we will maintain transparency through backer updates.

story:
Do  you know indoor spaces contain more allergens, VOCs(volatile organic compounds) than outdoors?

Do you know how much toxic pollutants and allergens you breathe in every day?

There are mold spores in your bathroom, VOCs in your car and cigarette small in your office.  There is also dust mites in your bedroom. That is why purification of indoor quality is crucial to your health.

 

However, the tradition HEPA purifiers offered in the market are not able to  destroy harmful chemicals in the air, which may cause headache, asthma, heart disease and cancer. More importantly the only filter those harmful pollutants but not able to destroy them.  That may lead to secondary pollution.

 

Cyairnova started out 5 years ago to develop air purifier that really remove VOCs, allergens, odors and more.  By employing the most advanced and highly effective nano photocatalytic purification process, it remove the above problem totally.

Cyairnova latest model XP3000 comes with a washable and durable stainless steel filter, you never need to spend money to replace filter again. 

 

PNPO® Technology employed a patented nano-particle coating for air purification. It is designed for completely removing pollutants in the air. PNPO®  filter works when a carefully chosen UV light shines on the nano-particle coated filter.  A reaction that oxidize the pollutants in the air.

In the process occurred in the Filter surface produce a lot of free hydroxyl free radicals. The hydroxyl free radicals oxidize pollutants at the filter surface and convert them into harmless elements like tiny amount of water and carbon dioxide.

According to third party independent testing, the efficacy of this nano coating shown great efficacy in removing volatile organic compounds(VOCs), mold and harmful micro infection sources.  No residue was found on the surface of the nano-coated filter surface.
 

In short, the conventional technologies, such as  HEPA, carbon and electrostatic filters, they do not destroy these pollutants at all.

 

In our comprehensive testing process, we found that the XP3000 had an impressive efficiency rate. Impressive as that may seem, there’s more the XP3000 can do. It can remove VOCs quickly and is a major feature that’s passed down from our previous models.

We’ve received praise from pilot users who were satisfied with the XP3000’s performance, particularly removing allergens, VOCs and pollutants in the air.

In the following table, it shows a the major difference among different types of air purification technology.

 

 The following image is the magnified portion of the stainless stain filter. The whole porous surfaces are coated with nano Photo-catalytic compounds. It is designed to be washed to avoid buying expensive filter replacement periodically.

The XP3000 has manual controls that comes with the bundle. It’s also has an app you can download on your iPhone or Android device.

The XP3000 app makes operating the air purifier super easy. For one, you can have the unit ready to purify the air when you’re minutes away from home. You’ll be greeted by fresh, clean air the moment you step in the front door.

Length of operation can be set to 1, 4 or 8 hours depending on the time of day and need. The product houses a 3-speed fan that auto-adjusts according to air quality. Manual fan control is also available.

A single long LED light bar at the air purifier’s front panel shows you the VOC condition status of the room. Red light means that it detects high levels of VOCs, while green means indoor air quality is at an optimal level.

Near the top of the unit is the carbon-based filter that can remove unwanted odors. Keep in mind that we took the steps to ensure that the XP3000 won’t generate ozone. You can save money with our air purifier since you won’t have to buy extra filters- ours is washable stainless steel!

Mass Production formally started.

 

The idea to create an air purifier product that’s better than traditional ones out there began in 2015.

We assembled a small team of researchers and designed the XP3000 from the ground up. The core stainless steel filter deserves special mention here, as it underwent an exhaustive testing process and several design changes.

As it stands, the XP3000 is 95 percent complete and all that’s left is mass production. Our team has brought prototypes to conventions and exhibits with the same response- we’re on the right track!

If the sound of an air purifier that can get rid of the pollutants, VOCs and odor in your home sounds good, here’s your chance to contribute. We’re right in the cusp of completion and soon, the world will get to see a new and innovative product at an affordable price.

We designed the XP3000 to be user-friendly and intuitive. Anyone in your house should be able to operate it quickly and with minimal trouble.

One, you can control the air purifier remotely via the XP3000 app. Simply download it on your phone and open it up so you can make the XP3000 start the purification process minutes before you arrive.

Two, you can use the included remote control and operate the XP3000 from a distance. If you don’t want to fuss, just press the AUTO button and the air purifier will know what to do. Then, set the amount of time you want the XP3000 to run- 1, 4 or 8 hour timer, and you’re all set.

The XP3000 air purifier will remember the last settings and automatically start the process after 24 hours. So you won’t have to guess the current settings the unit has a front panel that displays the timer you chose last.

The AUTO mode has a several more nifty features. It automatically adjusts the internal fan speed depending on what the VOC sensor detects. The front of the air purifier has a single LED light that shows the VOC air quality- red for bad and green for good. When the sensor finds that there are plenty of VOCs in the atmosphere, the fans work harder to bring air quality to optimal. When the quality is brought to optimized levels the fans adjust and work in the background.

Cyairnova XP3000 is very powerful in Efficiency.  In this third-party laboratory test, this Air purifier shown a very high value in the efficiency for the air.

Virus Removal Rate 99.99%

Bacteria Removal Rate 99.5%

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risk and Challenges

Every great and ambitious project won’t be without risks and challenges.

In our case, what we constantly had trouble in was manufacturing and engineering. Luckily, we have a team that has more than 20 years’ worth of experience. More than that, we’ve worked closely with partners to ensure the project is a resounding success.

We have a partner working in the manufacturing industry for 15 years. This proved to be integral to the XP3000’s success and helped the manufacturing stage move as smoothly as it could.

We’re really proud of the work we’ve done with the air purifier’s core. It’s the central element that made the product possible. We faced the challenge of creating a suitable nano photocatalytic reacting surface that’s reusable, but with the help of our engineering team we finally came up with one that we were all satisfied with. It was their idea to use stainless steel and coat it with the compound.

After five long years, we’re happy to present the Cyairnova XP3000 Air Purifier, a product that can destroy pollutants that can cause health problems. We want to point out that our stainless steel filter is washable and saves you the trouble of buying and replacing them every now and then.

Pilot production of the air purifier has been recently concluded.  The XP3000 is environment-friendly and won’t cause any harm to your home. It’s smart enough that you can use a smartphone to activate the purifier and come home breathing clean air.

As mentioned, everything is just about done. We’re ready for mass production and we hope you are too!

story:
YOUR DOG’S FOOD & WATER BOWLS ARE THE FOURTH GERMIEST SURFACES IN YOUR HOME

We all love our pets and wash their bowls thoroughly every day… right? But did you know that this is not enough to kill the germs; as microbes, such as bacteria, mould and fungi continue to grow and multiply rapidly even after a thorough wash. Interestingly, we learned that 67% of bowls coming out of the dishwasher still have Salmonella bacteria present on their surfaces. A study has shown they are the fourth dirtiest surfaces in our homes after the kitchen sponge, kitchen sink and our toothbrush holder (According to the NSF - National Sanitation Foundation)

Example of an unprotected surface, showing the effects of a water bowl in constant use
without antimicrobial protection. 

WHY CLEANING OUR PET’S BOWLS EVERY DAY IS NOT AS EFFECTIVE AS WE THINK

A while back, a team of microbiologists explained to us that the effects of cleaning are short lived, and once the effects have worn off, our dog bowls are subject to recontamination, leaving bacteria to thrive unchecked until the next clean.

It’s sort of like the antibacterial hand sanitizers or surface sprays we’ve become accustomed to using. If a surface isn’t continuously resistant to bacteria, the germs continue to thrive and multiply. The fat found in pet food for example is breeding-ground heaven for bacteria! Customers often tell us that they have to keep cleaning the face area of their dogs after they have eaten or been drinking out of their regular water and food bowls because of the bacteria that builds up in their fur which can lead to skin irritations and even dog acne. Just imagine a solution that would keep your dog’s water bowl clean and germ free….

INTRODUCING THE HERO BOWL 

The HERO Bowl is a superior alternative to stainless steel, glass or ceramic products. It is made from recyclable polypropylene and has 24-hour protection from a technology that works constantly to reduce microbes, such as bacteria, mould and fungi, by up to 99.99% on the protected surface. Like all pet bowls, the HERO Bowl should be cleaned regularly, but unlike on an unprotected bowl, the risk of microbial cross contamination from the HERO Bowl is actively reduced as the built-in BioCote® technology continues to perform against the colonisation of bacteria, perfectly complementing existing hygiene practices. We partnered with BioCote® - a world leader in proven antimicrobial technology - to bring to you the world’s most hygienic dog bowl.

DISCOVER WHAT MAKES THE HERO BOWL UNIQUE

The HERO Bowl is the most hygienic germ-busting bowl on the market and the smartest for you, your family, and your four-legged friend.

BioCote® Patented silver ions technology in action

 

 

 

SO MUCH MORE THAN JUST A BOWL... 

TESTED BY FURRY EXPERTS

In line with our core ethos to create products for dogs that keep them happy, healthy and safe, the HERO Bowl is made from recyclable polypropylene and has a tapered ergonomic design. It has a non-slip base; twin side cut outs for easy handling; a high curve interior with angular corners for easier feeding and shifting of food; and is dishwasher safe. It is available in two sizes: Small (S) 18cm / 7.08 inch (450 ML / 1.90 US Cups) and Large (L) 23 cm / 9.05 inch (1.0 Litres/ 4.23 US Cups). It will come in a range of HOWND matt brand colours with a gloss logo to suit any home decor. 

 

 

WITH 25 YEARS GUARANTEED ANTIMICROBIAL PERFORMANCE THE HERO BOWL IS THE ONLY DOG BOWL YOU WILL EVER NEED

It’s a bold statement we know! The silver ions technology is present throughout the HERO Bowl, providing protection even if it becomes scratched or is chewed by your dog. Because the antimicrobial protection cannot not wash off or wear away, it will last for the expected lifetime of the bowl. Biocote technology is proven to last 25 years! The patent-pending HERO Bowl is simply a must-have product for pet owners that care as much about their pets’ hygiene as they do their own.

 

THE TECH BIT

The BioCote® additive has been proven to reduce up to 86% of bacteria in just 15 minutes, 99.5% in two hours and has even been proven to inactivate the H1N1 virus.The technology is resistant to microbes, such as bacteria, mould and fungi, and may also prevent the formation of biofilms - a defence mechanism from certain bacteria that is a secretion of mucus which builds up until visible to the naked eye. You know, that slimy stuff lurking in your water bowl.

 


A superior alternative to a stainless steel or ceramic products, the HERO Bowl is made from recyclable polypropylene and has 24-hour protection from a technology that works constantly to reduce microbes by up to 99.99% on the protected surface. Like all pet bowls, the HERO Bowl should be cleaned regularly, but unlike on an unprotected bowl, the risk of microbial cross contamination from the HERO Bowl is actively reduced as the BioCote® technology continues to perform against the colonization of bacteria, perfectly complementing existing hygiene practices. The BioCote® additive has been proven to reduce up to 86% of bacteria in just 15 minutes, 99.5% in two hours and has even been proven to inactivate the H1N1 virus.

 

IN SAFE HANDS WITH ESTABLISHED MULTI AWARD-WINNING PET CARE BRAND

We’re Mark & Jo and we are passionate about creating cruelty-free and innovative pet products. We’ve been working together in the pet industry for 5 years, and have won industry awards for innovation, excellence, entrepreneurship, and our cruelty-free initiatives. Our brand HOWND is a leading pet care company in the UK and our products are sold in 15 countries worldwide.  We manufacture a range of ethical, Cruelty-Free International certified pet care products for dogs, and the HERO Bowl which is our first accessory and has been in development for the last 2 years. We are super excited to finally be giving pet parents around the world the food and water bowls our beloved dogs deserve. They are perfect for single as well as multiple pet households, dog grooming salons, vet surgeries, rescue centers, kennels, cafes, and any place where dogs share communal bowls. Many people have told us that they wash their dogs' bowls every day, which is great. However, bacteria continue to grow and multiply as soon as the bowls come out of the wash, and our innovation literally halts the colonization of bacteria. Thank you doggy community for your support. Let’s get the HERO Bowl into production!  

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS & DIMENSIONS

Small (S) 18cm (450ml / 1.90 US Cups) Large (L) 23cm (1.0 Litres / 4.23 US Cups)

EXCLUSIVE INDIEGOGO OFFERS 

TIMELINE 

DEVELOPMENT & PROTOTYPES 

 

 

ARE YOU A DOG OWNER? A GROOMER? A DOG FRIENDLY CAFÉ? A VET SURGERY? A BOARDING KENNEL?

With modern day dog owners taking more interest in the health and hygiene of their pets than ever before, the HERO bowl - is ideal for single and multiple pet households, as well as vet surgeries, grooming salons, rescue centres, kennels and dog friendly cafes where bowls are often shared and hygiene is of the utmost importance.

FAQ

Q1: I wash my dog bowl every day, so why do I need an antimicrobial product?
A1: Bacteria will continue to thrive rapidly as soon as your bowl comes out of the wash. The HERO Bowl has 24-hour protection from a technology that works constantly to reduce microbes by up to 99.99% on the protected surface. It will still require cleaning but in  between washing, microbes will not be able to grow and fester. 

Q2: What is the warranty of the HERO Bowl 
A2: The HERO Bowl comes with a 10 year industry leading world wide warranty.

Q3: Will my HERO Bowl really offer antimicrobial protection for 25 years? 
A3: Yes. Biocote technology is proven to last for 25 years. Analysis certificates are available upon request. 

Q4: Is shipping included in the prices?
A4: Yes

Q5: Is Duty / Import / VAT included in the price?
A5: Duty & VAT costs are covered by the shipping cost added for backers outside of USA. 

Q6: What material is the HERO Bowl made from? 
A6: Recycable Polypropylene 

Q7 What sizes are available?
A7: Small (S) 18cm / 7.08 inch (450 ML / 1.90 US Cups) and Large (L) 23 cm / 9.05 inch (1.0 Litres/ 4.23 US Cups)

Q8: When do I select the color I want?
A8: As soon as the campaign finishes, we will send out a survey for you to select your color option and confirm shipping.

Interestingly, we learned that 67% of bowls coming out of the dishwasher still have Salmonella bacteria present on their surfaces. A study has shown they are the fourth dirtiest surfaces in our homes after the kitchen sponge, kitchen sink and our toothbrush holder (According to the NSF - National Sanitation Foundation)

Example of an unprotected surface, showing the effects of a water bowl in constant usewithout antimicrobial protection. 
WHY CLEANING OUR PET’S BOWLS EVERY DAY IS NOT AS EFFECTIVE AS WE THINK
A while back, a team of microbiologists explained to us that the effects of cleaning are short lived, and once the effects have worn off, our dog bowls are subject to recontamination, leaving bacteria to thrive unchecked until the next clean.
It’s sort of like the antibacterial hand sanitizers or surface sprays we’ve become accustomed to using. If a surface isn’t continuously resistant to bacteria, the germs continue to thrive and multiply. The fat found in pet food for example is breeding-ground heaven for bacteria! Customers often tell us that they have to keep cleaning the face area of their dogs after they have eaten or been drinking out of their regular water and food bowls because of the bacteria that builds up in their fur which can lead to skin irritations and even dog acne. Just imagine a solution that would keep your dog’s water bowl clean and germ free….
INTRODUCING THE HERO BOWL 
The HERO Bowl is a superior alternative to stainless steel, glass or ceramic products. It is made from recyclable polypropylene and has 24-hour protection from a technology that works constantly to reduce microbes, such as bacteria, mould and fungi, by up to 99.99% on the protected surface. Like all pet bowls, the HERO Bowl should be cleaned regularly, but unlike on an unprotected bowl, the risk of microbial cross contamination from the HERO Bowl is actively reduced as the built-in BioCote® technology continues to perform against the colonisation of bacteria, perfectly complementing existing hygiene practices. We partnered with BioCote® - a world leader in proven antimicrobial technology - to bring to you the world’s most hygienic dog bowl.
DISCOVER WHAT MAKES THE HERO BOWL UNIQUE
The HERO Bowl is the most hygienic germ-busting bowl on the market and the smartest for you, your family, and your four-legged friend.

BioCote® Patented silver ions technology in action
 

 

 
SO MUCH MORE THAN JUST A BOWL... 

TESTED BY FURRY EXPERTSIn line with our core ethos to create products for dogs that keep them happy, healthy and safe, the HERO Bowl is made from recyclable polypropylene and has a tapered ergonomic design. It has a non-slip base; twin side cut outs for easy handling; a high curve interior with angular corners for easier feeding and shifting of food; and is dishwasher safe. It is available in two sizes: Small (S) 18cm / 7.08 inch (450 ML / 1.90 US Cups) and Large (L) 23 cm / 9.05 inch (1.0 Litres/ 4.23 US Cups). It will come in a range of HOWND matt brand colours with a gloss logo to suit any home decor.   WITH 25 YEARS GUARANTEED ANTIMICROBIAL PERFORMANCE THE HERO BOWL IS THE ONLY DOG BOWL YOU WILL EVER NEEDIt’s a bold statement we know! The silver ions technology is present throughout the HERO Bowl, providing protection even if it becomes scratched or is chewed by your dog. Because the antimicrobial protection cannot not wash off or wear away, it will last for the expected lifetime of the bowl. Biocote technology is proven to last 25 years! The patent-pending HERO Bowl is simply a must-have product for pet owners that care as much about their pets’ hygiene as they do their own. THE TECH BITThe BioCote® additive has been proven to reduce up to 86% of bacteria in just 15 minutes, 99.5% in two hours and has even been proven to inactivate the H1N1 virus.The technology is resistant to microbes, such as bacteria, mould and fungi, and may also prevent the formation of biofilms - a defence mechanism from certain bacteria that is a secretion of mucus which builds up until visible to the naked eye. You know, that slimy stuff lurking in your water bowl. A superior alternative to a stainless steel or ceramic products, the HERO Bowl is made from recyclable polypropylene and has 24-hour protection from a technology that works constantly to reduce microbes by up to 99.99% on the protected surface. Like all pet bowls, the HERO Bowl should be cleaned regularly, but unlike on an unprotected bowl, the risk of microbial cross contamination from the HERO Bowl is actively reduced as the BioCote® technology continues to perform against the colonization of bacteria, perfectly complementing existing hygiene practices. The BioCote® additive has been proven to reduce up to 86% of bacteria in just 15 minutes, 99.5% in two hours and has even been proven to inactivate the H1N1 virus. IN SAFE HANDS WITH ESTABLISHED MULTI AWARD-WINNING PET CARE BRANDWe’re Mark & Jo and we are passionate about creating cruelty-free and innovative pet products. We’ve been working together in the pet industry for 5 years, and have won industry awards for innovation, excellence, entrepreneurship, and our cruelty-free initiatives. Our brand HOWND is a leading pet care company in the UK and our products are sold in 15 countries worldwide.  We manufacture a range of ethical, Cruelty-Free International certified pet care products for dogs, and the HERO Bowl which is our first accessory and has been in development for the last 2 years. We are super excited to finally be giving pet parents around the world the food and water bowls our beloved dogs deserve. They are perfect for single as well as multiple pet households, dog grooming salons, vet surgeries, rescue centers, kennels, cafes, and any place where dogs share communal bowls. Many people have told us that they wash their dogs' bowls every day, which is great. However, bacteria continue to grow and multiply as soon as the bowls come out of the wash, and our innovation literally halts the colonization of bacteria. Thank you doggy community for your support. Let’s get the HERO Bowl into production!    SPECIFICATIONS & DIMENSIONSSmall (S) 18cm (450ml / 1.90 US Cups) Large (L) 23cm (1.0 Litres / 4.23 US Cups)EXCLUSIVE INDIEGOGO OFFERS 
TIMELINE 
DEVELOPMENT & PROTOTYPES   ARE YOU A DOG OWNER? A GROOMER? A DOG FRIENDLY CAFÉ? A VET SURGERY? A BOARDING KENNEL?With modern day dog owners taking more interest in the health and hygiene of their pets than ever before, the HERO bowl - is ideal for single and multiple pet households, as well as vet surgeries, grooming salons, rescue centres, kennels and dog friendly cafes where bowls are often shared and hygiene is of the utmost importance.FAQQ1: I wash my dog bowl every day, so why do I need an antimicrobial product?A1: Bacteria will continue to thrive rapidly as soon as your bowl comes out of the wash. The HERO Bowl has 24-hour protection from a technology that works constantly to reduce microbes by up to 99.99% on the protected surface. It will still require cleaning but in  between washing, microbes will not be able to grow and fester. Q2: What is the warranty of the HERO Bowl A2: The HERO Bowl comes with a 10 year industry leading world wide warranty.Q3: Will my HERO Bowl really offer antimicrobial protection for 25 years? A3: Yes. Biocote technology is proven to last for 25 years. Analysis certificates are available upon request. Q4: Is shipping included in the prices?A4: YesQ5: Is Duty / Import / VAT included in the price?A5: Duty & VAT costs are covered by the shipping cost added for backers outside of USA. Q6: What material is the HERO Bowl made from? A6: Recycable Polypropylene Q7 What sizes are available?A7: Small (S) 18cm / 7.08 inch (450 ML / 1.90 US Cups) and Large (L) 23 cm / 9.05 inch (1.0 Litres/ 4.23 US Cups)Q8: When do I select the color I want?A8: As soon as the campaign finishes, we will send out a survey for you to select your color option and confirm shipping.

story:
My Background:

I have been a professional fine artist since 1986, showing and selling my watercolour paintings.

Art collectors in 19 countries have enhanced their quality of life by acquiring over 600 of my original watercolour paintings, and over 400 limited edition reproductions, during the last 30 years.

Many art students attend my popular watercolour workshops and benefit from my award-winning painting instruction book Watercolour Toolbox.

My husband and I love to explore new horizons, and our travels provide inspiration for my realistic landscapes and nature studies. My artistic goal is that viewers of my artwork experience the same awe and wonder I felt when exploring those remarkable places. This video sums up my artistic lifestyle in just 30-seconds:

The Inspiration for Elora Doors:

A few years ago, our travels took us to the quaint Ontario town of Elora, and on a side street I found an extraordinary privacy fence made from antique doors.  I took lots of photos and last summer, worked on a large painting inspired by this scene.

When I posted a photo of my work-in-progress on Facebook, I got a huge response, and the piece sold before the paint was dry. I realized that this image had mass appeal and deserved a wider audience, in the form of reproduced prints.

Why Crowdfund this project?

Throughout my career, I have produced nine series of prints (five as bulk runs of offset lithography and four as on-demand giclées). The last series was released in 2001. For an artist trying to make a living, there is a difficulty inherent in each technology.

With bulk runs, the unit cost is low, but I must invest in a large quantity of inventory and possibly take years to sell it off, if ever.

With print-on-demand products, the unit cost is high, and to get volume discounts, I again take the risk of having very expensive excess inventory.

My Indiegogo campaign will predict accurately how much inventory to order, and will fund the initial bulk printing, packaging, and distribution of my Elora Doors products, in a cost-effective manner.

How Can You Help?

Please join me on this joyful journey. In return for your support, I promise to send some happiness your way. And please, share this message with your friends.

Depending on the level of support, each backer will choose an Elora Doors Limited Edition Giclée Print (available in two sizes printed on paper, and one size on canvas, as shown above), or other perks such as art cards and small photo prints. I am open to suggestions for additional 'Elora Doors' perks, so let me know your ideas.

No matter what level of funding I reach, I will be able to fulfill my campaign perks by this spring and secure enough inventory to support my estimated future sales. To make my time spent on the project worthwhile, I would like to see crowdfunding reach the $10k level at a minimum, but I hope to surpass $20K.

Take Advantage of Excellent Value and a Limited Time Offer

Elora Doors Limited Edition Giclee Prints are offered here at 10% less than MSRP. Once the campaign is over, the regular retail value will take effect.

For Early Bird supporters, and exclusively to Indiegogo, I offer five Artist Proofs for each size of Giclee. Once the campaign is over, no Artist Proofs will be offered. Reserve yours before they are gone.

I look after the sales tax for shipping perks within Canada. 

I offer free shipping of Giclee's to destinations within Canada and the US, and reduced shipping rates for international destinations. Supporters are responsible for local duties and taxes for shipments to destinations outside of Canada.

More About the Giclee Prints

The Giclee's are printed using Epson Archival HDR inks, which provide exceptional colour accuracy and long-lasting depth of colour. My printing company uses Epson cold press archival watercolour paper and Breathing Color archival canvas. Both substrates provide the look and feel of an original painting. All prints come with certificate of authenticity and artist's story. The edition sizes will be determined by the response to the Indiegogo campaign, with the intention that the editions will sell out completely in the next year.

Paper Giclee's come in two sizes and will ship rolled in a protective tube. The medium size is 21" x 16.5" and, once you have it framed, will suit a medium-sized wall space. The large size is 28" x 22" and, once you have it framed, will suit a large-sized wall space. I recommend acid free mats and backing materials, UV-resistant glass, and the frame style of your choice.

    

Canvas Giclee's are gallery-wrapped on a 3/4" deep wooden cradle with outside dimensions of 26" x 20" and will suit a medium-sized wall space. The canvas is protected with matte finish UV-resistant varnish, and needs no additional framing, but can be framed if you choose to do so. Canvas Giclee's will ship flat in a carton.

Would you like me to ship you an 'Elora Doors'? It comes with a free helping of joy. ;-)

With heartfelt thanks,
Karen

story:
Light, foldable, inflatable, you can use it in any means of transportation. It is the perfect travel companion !

 Instant deflating. Ready to fold in 2 seconds.

Sleeping well is a matter of good position.
In airplanes you have to remain seated to sleep and gravity will always pull your head forward. While most of the cushions try to prevent this natural movement, we thought that we should follow it, and lean forward with a pillow supporting the head and upper body, like in a portable massage chair.

Now, with Woollip you can relax and enjoy your flight, we know by experience that you’ll find your own ideal sleeping position.

With the cabin luggage restrictions, who would want another bulky pillow? Woollip is inflatable, light as a smartphone, so you can take it anywhere.

 

 “Woollip helps to relax your neck muscles : no more stiff neck or back pains after a long trip!"

 « It works in a very Yogaic way, helping a full relaxation by supporting your upper body. »

Before patenting our new travel pillow, our designers asked Physiotherapists to help find the best sleeping position while seating down. We also worked with Yoga teachers to ensure that Woollip will help you relax.

In fact, we discovered that Woollip works better that what we imagined. It provides sensation of relaxation, as explained by our experts.

The physiotherapists confirmed the diagnosis: Woollip supports the upper body and allows the shoulders and the head to fold forward, relieving back pain and sore neck. That helps you to fall asleep.
At that time, we knew we had achieving our goal.

Every day, millions of air passengers dream of finding the solution.
That is why we created Woollip, the "flipped pillow"!

 

 

 

 

Thank you for having followed us this far. It’s very encouraging for us.  We now need your support to make this dream a reality. If you believe in our product, spread the word around you, share with all your friends. Your financial contributions will help us manufacture the pillow and be successful in selling it. Order it for you or offer it to your friends and parents or to your best clients. It will show you care about them. We can package and ship Woollip all over the world and, thanks to our manufacturing partners, we can meet any demand.

Woollip started as a family project and over time the family got bigger! Designers, manufacturers and engineers, physiotherapists, yoga experts and aviation specialists have been involved.
It takes great skills to carry out such an ambitious and innovative project and to make it real.
We couldn’t have done it without them and they joined us because they believed in the idea and the product.
We hope you will be as enthusiastic as we are.

 Special thanks to Pascal Durand, owner of Acett.net, who masterfully designed and prototyped the first Woollip.

Your new travel pillow will be manufactured by Manudo, one of the leading suppliers of the airplane seat industry.

After months of work, Woollip is ready for take-off. But we need your help to launch it throughout the world.  Each contribution will help us and encourage us in our challenge.
Your support will help us manufacture it.
We are already thinking about adding new features and products to be soon available at airport Duty free stores around the world.
There is much to do to improve air travel comfort. It’s just the beginning of the Woollip story.

It was a long journey. Two years from the initial idea to creation. It was an amazing adventure, with ups and downs, but at the end extremely satisfying and exciting. We would like to share it with you. Welcome backstage!
story_txt:

www.woollip.com

story:
The secret to ervet™ with Sanitized® protection comes from two of nature’s antimicrobial agents: Zinc and Bamboo. Zinc pyrithione is woven into our bamboo blend during the manufacturing process. 

Customize it your way!

Sizing Details

Queen: Flat sheet: 92x104" | Fitted sheet:60x80x15'' | Pillowcases:20x30" | Split-Comforter: 100x90" (50x90" halves)

King: Flat sheet:110x104" | Fitted sheet: 76x80x15'' | Pillowcases: 20x37" |   Split-Comforter: 120x90" (60x90" halves)

Cal-King: Flat sheet:110x104"| Fitted sheet: 72x84x15'' | Pillowcases: 20x37" | Split-Comforter: 120x90" (60x90" halves)

Split-Comforter Sizing: International Backers, take note! Our Split-Comforter (Queen) sizing is 100x90"/ 254x228cm and we recommend this size for your bed sizes. Unless you prefer extra-large blankets, we do not recommend you choose the Split-Comforter (King) as this size is 120x90" / 305x229cm.

Sheet Sets: International Size Comparison Chart  

We launched ervét™ because, quite simply, we didn't agree on bedding. For starters, we like to sleep at different temperatures. Not to mention, one of us is a bit of a cover hog. Sharing one comforter turned into a constant battle of tug-of-war every night, and buying bedding left one of us compromising on sleep temperature preference.

After launching ervét: A Two-Duvet Bedding System Designed for Couples on Kickstarter last year (and receiving amazing press, reviews, and award) we've been busy developing a performance bedding set that is more affordable, fresher, longer-lasting yet still customizable… to help our backers have their best night sleep yet and never go to bed mad.

With ervét’s Sanitized® treated Sheet Sets and Split-Comforter, you won’t have to worry about odors building up in your sheets, your partner stealing your blanket in the night or compromising on your preferred sleep temperature.

today_show_ervet from Crowdfunding We Love on Vimeo.

 

sanitized_ervet from Crowdfunding We Love on Vimeo.

story:
Stars & Stripes Soirée

Celebrate this 4th of July in style with the Stars & Stripes Soirée box! Everything you need to celebrate - from near or far. Have everything delivered to your door for up to 12 guests. Or, celebrate virtually and send a box to each of your guests. We'll even include patriotic e-vites and virtual backgrounds to add to the fun!

 

What's In The Box

Each Stars & Stripes Soirée box comes with:

  • Disposable place settings for each of your guests, incl. paper plates, bowls, napkins and plastic cutlery and glasses.
  • Festive decor: a table runner, tin pail candle holders with tea lights, a red pail vase (to add your own flowers), silver sparkler stirs, and hanging paper fans.
  • If you opt for a "virtual party", we'll email you a patriotic evite design and virtual backgrounds.
  • A party guide, including simple set-up instructions, hosting tips and photography tricks for an easy, post-worthy party!

 

The Posted Party Co

Posted Party is on a mission to make every at-home celebration post-worthy!  We are working hard to bring you our second holiday box offering this year. We loved hearing your feedback on our Valentine's Day Box offering - and we've used it to bring you our all-new summer celebration boxes, starting with the Stars & Stripes Soirée.

 

Our Business Goals

Posted Party was founded by Samantha Scinta in 2020 and was born out of many virtual events and an effort to make at-home celebrations extra special during the pandemic. Samantha's goal with Posted Party is to make at-home, post-worthy parties easy and accessible to all (especially her friends & fam)! Posted Party is currently in a "proof-of-concept" phase. We're so excited to have you try out our brand-new celebration box concept. Posted Party is not profitable - so we are offering our boxes at the lowest price we can, while still sourcing all of the contents at lower quantities. We hope to scale to higher volumes in the future as we build out this business - and lower our prices in the process.

Posted Party is on a mission to make every at-home celebration post-worthy!  We are working hard to bring you our second holiday box offering this year. We loved hearing your feedback on our Valentine's Day Box offering - and we've used it to bring you our all-new summer celebration boxes, starting with the Stars & Stripes Soirée.
 
Our Business Goals
Posted Party was founded by Samantha Scinta in 2020 and was born out of many virtual events and an effort to make at-home celebrations extra special during the pandemic. Samantha's goal with Posted Party is to make at-home, post-worthy parties easy and accessible to all (especially her friends & fam)! Posted Party is currently in a "proof-of-concept" phase. We're so excited to have you try out our brand-new celebration box concept. Posted Party is not profitable - so we are offering our boxes at the lowest price we can, while still sourcing all of the contents at lower quantities. We hope to scale to higher volumes in the future as we build out this business - and lower our prices in the process.

story:
The Rosendale Pool has been a staple of community life in Rosendale for generations.  It is closed this summer because of safety issues.  The structural engineering report is back and the fix will cost $1.5 million.  In fact, we are lucky that no one was injured by the severly degraded structural integrity.

See the local YNN news story about the pool closure:  http://hudsonvalley.ynn.com/content/top_stories/578780/rosendale-pool-shut-down-this-summer/?MP4=&ap=1

Our pool is used by 20,000 people a season, provides swim lessons, swim team opportunities, disabled swimming access for kids and adults.

Although there are NYS Parks grants available, the grants require a dollar for dollar match by the community.  The next grant deadline is July 16th.  The Town is applying for a NYS Parks grant of $500k.

The NYS Parks grant requires a 100% match.  We are embarking on a year long effort to raise moneys to match that grant.  Everything collected here will be transferred to our newly created Community Foundation fund which will be live very shortly.

Help us raise funds to create a match the Town can rely upon when making their application for grant funding. Donations through Indiegogo are not tax deductible, however we are also setting up an Ulster County Community Foundation account that will allow tax deductible donations and the Community Foundation can be reached at http://cfdcny.org/page30001.cfm  We hope to have our account active there shortly.

Please help us break through our fundraising goal so the Town can match state grant funding and fix the Rosendale Pool!  This is just the beginning.

story:
Made of 100% platinum silicone. 

Virtually indestructible and endlessly reusable, these new containers will change the way you store, cook and even eat.

 

Plastic ends up in landfills where it can take hundreds of years to break down. And if the plastic doesn’t end up in a landfill, it could end up in the ocean, where it can cause pollution and marine animal deaths.

Zip Top® containers don’t require lids! So save your money and save the planet.

 

Traditional plastic containers are petroleum-based and can contain harmful chemicals. These toxins can leach into your food, especially when microwaving.  Every Zip Top® container is made of 100% pure platinum silicone and is completely plastic-free.

 

 

Ideal for meals on the go. Simply pull the zipper apart and you have an open dish with a wide open top. Hold your favorite salad, morning oatmeal, kid's snacks, or fruit. A great storage solution for craft supplies, like crayons. Ideal for travel, use the dish for toiletries, cords, cosmetics or snacks. 

No lids to store, lose, find, lose again, or clean!

 

T

 

The first zippered bag to stand tall and stay open. It's perfect for lunches at work, school or wherever. Best of all, this bag actually gets clean in the dishwasher with its open rounded interior.  

Goodbye, floppy bags!

 

 

Designed for versatility. Soups, chilis and sauces can all go from freezer to microwave to table. 

But don't stop there, Zip Top containers are wonderful on the go for leftovers, dry snacks, veggies, fruit, nuts, etc.

Get creative!

Get creative!
























 
 



 

 




 
 
__________________________
 

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION
Our prices DO NOT include VAT, GST or other country taxes.
Our terms of sale for international orders are FOB destination. This means that you pay all freight and duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Kickstarter.
If you would like to estimate your duties, you can use this online tool (remember to convert the U.S. dollars to your local currency):
https://www.simplyduty.com/import-calculator/
For international customers who are required to pay customs, you will receive an email from your local customs authorities asking for payment to have your order processed through customs. Unfortunately, there is no legal way around customs (including marking an order as a gift, which we cannot do). Once you make that payment to the customs broker your order will be processed for final delivery.
SHIPPING POLICY
It is critical that you enter your correct, valid address when placing your order. If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address or moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.
POTENTIAL SHIPPING DELAYS
The current timeline is to begin shipping all perks in May 2019. If we experience any unforseen delays we will notify you in a timely manner so you can plan for the contingency.
